Bank account ke figure mein jitne shunya badhte jaate hai ... zindagi ka shunya utna bada hota jaata hai
Pehle din inkaar kiya ... duje din iqraar ki ... teeje din pyar kiya
Jab pyar karne waale apne jazbaato ko dabakar ... rishto ko koi doosra naam dete hai ... toh kabhi na kabhi, kahin na kahin jazbaat phoot phootke rone lagte hai

Is duniya mein aaisa koi nahi bacha jisse kabhi na kabhi, kahin na kahin, kisi na kisi se mohabbat na hui ho ... aur us mohabbat mein kuch mile toh kuch bhichad gaye ... par unki mohabbat hamesha zinda rahi hai
Tum jaisi ladkiyan jab pyar mein padti hai na ... toh great love stories banti hai
Duniya mein yun aana, duniya se yun jaana ... aao toh le aana, jao toh de jaana ... yaadein, yaadein, yaadein
Ghar ki izzat sanskaro par khadi hoti hai ... daulat ke dherro par nahi
Public stage par aate hi shaitan bhi devtaon ki tarah bolne lagta hai
Ishwar ko matlab se nahi ... dil se puja jaata hai
Badhon se baat badhe hi kiya karte hai
Joh maa baap apne bachchon ke kyun aur kab ka jawab nahi de sakte ... woh kabhi unke dost bhi nahi ban sakte
Sacha dost toh woh hota hai ... joh dost ki galati ko apni galati samajhkar maaf karde
Achcha dost khushiyan deta hai ... cheenta nahi
Yaar hoon, humdardo ka saaya hoon ... aaj yeh mat kehna, ke bewaqt aaya hoon
Ajab hai yeh taqdeer ka lekha ... maa aaisi hoti hai ... aaj pehli baar hai dekha
Khushi se uchal jayega didi tera jee ... upar jaake dekh, behte hai jijaji
Arre thairo thairo thairo, zaara tham toh jao ... kahe ki hai yeh dhoom dhaam, zaara mujhe toh batao
Beti ka sasural hi hai uska sansar ... rasmo rivaaz nibhati rahoongi, ab toh jaane dijiye ... aati rahoongi
Joh beet gaya woh sapna hai ... joh aaj hai woh apna hai
Chal door ho ja, nazar ke samne se door ho ja ... doorbeen ke andhar bhi nazar nahin aane chahiye
Tera itna chota chota tukda banayega ki ... agle janam mein na tu powder banke janam lega
Ban rahi hai anjaan, teri khata nahi hai ... aaise keh rahi hai, jaise kuch pata nahi hai
Prem ki aag dono taraf lagi ho toh jalti rehti hai ... varna bhuj jaati hai
Sau chaand bhi chamkenge toh kya baat banegi ... tum aaye ho toh is raat ki aukaad banegi
Chehra mera tha, nigaahein uski ... khamoshi mein bhi woh baatein uski ... mere chehre pe ghazal likhti gayi ... sher kehti hui aankhen uski
Ab ke hum bichre toh shayad kabhi khwabon mein mile ... jis tarah sookhe hue phool kitaabon mein mile
Prem ke do hi roop hote hai ... kisi ko apna kar lena ya kisi ka ho jaana
Hamari zindagi ke do pehlu hai ... ek adhikar ka doosra kartavya ka ... ek ke bina doosra mumkin nahi
Ungli mat kar mere ko mohabbat ke beech mein ... nahi toh dafna doonga tere ko Juhu ke beach mein
Na main hoon nikamma, na tu hai nikammi ... shaadi karke hum dono banenge daddy aur mummy
Main tere saath lagane ko tayaar hoon saat chakkar ... kyun ki mera dil bechain hai tere dil se lene ko takkar
Vapas karde mera meter mujhko ... nahi toh ek jhappad mein bhej doonga Punjab tujhko

Hathyar uthane waala kabhi saahasi nahi hota ... kyun ki usse apne se zyada bharosa uske hathyar par hota hai ... job kabhi bhi dokha de sakta hai ... lekin aapka saahas, aapki taqat, aapko kabhi dokha nahi degi
Petrol ka daam badta hai litre ke hisaab se ... auto waala kaise chalayega meter ke hisaab se
Machhar agar neend mein bhi hamara khoon choosta hai ... toh hum usse maar dete hai ... magar yeh gunde hamare jaagte huye hamara khoon bahate hai ... aur hum kuch nahi karte
Main apne motape par is qadar hairaan ho gaya hoon ... bar bar aate jaate pareshaan ho gaya hoon
Niyam aur kanoon insaano ke liye hota hai ... insaan niyam aur kanoon ke liye nahi hote
Galat ko galat na kehna ... sabse badi galati hai
Makkai ki roti sambhar se khayenge ... Dharmendra Hema ke mafit hum bhi shaadi banayenge
Jab tak meri saansein chalengi ... mera inteqam zinda rahega
Mere bayaan ka ek ek lafz ... Gita aur Ramayan ki tarah pavitra aur sach hai ... aur sach ke sivah kuch nahi hai
Maut se kiski rishteydari hai ... aaj meri toh kal teri baari hai
Gaadi mein aur biwi mein kya farak hai yaar ... chalte chalte gaadi bighad jaati hai, behte behte biwi bighad jaati hai
Tere liye yeh kehna bahut mushkil hai ... ki tu zyada gira hua baap hai ... ya zyada gira hua insaan
Khula paisa aur khuli aurat samne ho ... toh aadmi ka dimaag kaam karna bandh kar deta hai
Gun haath mein lene ke baad ... dil aur dimaag poori tarah se shikaar pe hona chahiye
Aadmi ko maarne ke liye ek hi goli kaafi hoti hai ... agar woh goli sahi jagah pe lage
Nasha sukoon deta hai, yeh bharm hai ... nasha maut deta hai, yeh sach hai ... zindagi se pyar karo aur nashe pe vaar karo
Power kisi ko bhi maar sakta hai
Apne mulk ki hasti ko hargiz na mitne denge ... apne pyare jeevan mein yeh zehar na ghulne denge ... agar jeevan hai drugs ke shikanje mein ... toh tum ho maut ke panje mein
Neeli chatri waale, agar tu hai toh meri fariyad sun ... is duniya mein kahi ladkiyan hai ... ek toh, arre ek toh mere liye chun
Yeh aasoon joh hai na, beh jaye toh pani hai ... andhar reh jaye toh zehar hai
Tujhe chahiye desi ilaaj aur woh ilaaj karega yeh desi haath
Tumhare aur mere beech hamesha ek foot ka fasla reh jaata hai ... jaanta hai kyun? ... kyun ki tu hamesha ek foot neeche se sochta hai (from the heart) ... aur main ek foot upar se (from the mind)
Yeh pao kilo ka bheja bhi ajeeb cheez hai ... theek ho tab bhi takleef deta hai ... aur agar na theek ho, tab toh aur bhi takleef deta hai
Service hai, salary hai, sapna hai ... settle ho ja
Yeh kaunsi manzil hai, yeh kaunsa makaam hai ... aankhon mein koi chehra, hothon pe koi naam hai
Jitna tum karti ho mujhse pyar ... us mein 10% aur jodh lo yaar
Aurat ke dil ke andar joh jhankkar uske har khwab ko dekh sake ... wohi uska asli haqdaar hota hai
Dil ko rokta hoon toh aankhen bhatak jaati hai ... aankhen band karta hoon toh khwab bhatak jaate hai ... khwabon ko todta hoon toh yeh haath bhatak jaate hai
Dar pe phir sawaali aaya hai ... woh kis se pyar karti hai, yahi sawaal laya hai?
Raja ki ek rani thi, yeh kahani toh suni thi ... deewane ki ek deewani hai, yeh aaj ki kahani hai
Ishq ki chot ka kuch dil pe asar ho toh sahi ... dard kam ho ya zyada, magar ho toh sahi
Usne dekha hi nahi apni hatheli ko kabhi ... us mein dhundli si kahin, meri bhi lakeer toh hai
Hoga, na jaane kaisa hoga ... kahin na kahin, koi na koi, uparwaale ne meri kismat mein bhi likha hoga

Pyar kabhi kabhi door hoke bhi itna paas hota hai ... aur kabhi paas hoke bhi kitna door ki mann usse dekhne ke liye itna tarasta hai jaise ... tapta reghistan baarish ki pehli boond ko tarasta hai ... kabhi bhaad ki tarah aata hai toh sab kuch baha le jaata hai ... kabhi os bankar girta hai, sab toot jaata hai ... par pyaas nahi bhujti ... aaisa anokha hota hai pyar
Andhere mein insaan pal do pal ke liye tehar toh sakta hai, aaram kar sakta hai ... par zindagi jee nahi sakta
Pyar ko pyar mein pade bina samjha nahi ja sakta
Log pyar ko kahan kahan talash nahi karte hai ... par pyar apne aashiqon ko khud dhoond leta hai

Haan mera dil keh raha hai main sar se leke paon tak, tere sandali badan pe mohabbat likh doon ... mera dil keh raha hai main tere surkh taraste hoton ki lali pe, apne labon ki shabnami shararat likh doon ... haan mera dil keh raha hai tere pajeb ki jhankar pe, tere bahon ki chandan haar pe, apni bechaini ki halat likh doon ... mera dil keh raha hai tere uljhe kesu savar in aankhon ke aaine mein, tera dulhan sa roop niharon ... is mahekti zameen ki sej pe apne armano ki chahat likh doon, mohabbat likh doon, mohabbat
Yeh modern shaadi hai ... court mein jake dastakhat karo shaadi, dastakhat karo talaak ... woh din bhi door nahi ki dastakhat karte hi bache pehda ho jayenge
Main tumhe bhool jaon yeh ho nahi sakta ... aur tum mujhe bhool jao yeh main hone nahi doonga

Joh izzat, shradha, pyar ek beti de sakti hai ... woh ek beta kabhi nahi de sakta ... lekin main yeh bhool gaya tha ... joh sharmindgi, joh zalalat ek beti de sakti hai ... woh bhi ek beta kabhi nahi deta
Kyun main jeet ke bhi haar gaya ... aur woh haar kar bhi jeet gaya?
Meri kismat mujhpe kya rohegi ... tumhari mohabbat joh mere saath hai
Is janam toh kya ... woh saat janamon tak jeet nahi sakta
Nafrat ko sirf mohabbat se jeeta ja sakta hai ... sirf mohabbat se
Bahut waqt ke baad ... yeh waqt aaya hai
Koi bhi mazaak karlo ... lekin apne se bichadne ki baat mazaak mein bhi mat karna
Tumhare haathon mein woh rekhayein hai, joh mere haathon mein nahi hai ... tumhare maathe pe woh lakeerein hai, joh mere maathe par nahi hai
Kaun saala marta hai ... aur agar marr bhi gaya memsaab ... toh hamesha ke liye dhadkunga tumhare seene mein ... tumhari dhadkan bankar
Tum log sab jhoot bol rahe ho ... najane kitne din, kitne mahine, kitne saal jhoot pe jhoot pe jhoot bolte aaye ... aur main chup chap bardaasht karta raha
Tu kal bhi badtameez tha ... tu aaj bhi badtameez hai
Main tumhari har baat manne ko tayaar hoon, lekin yeh baat manne ko tayaar nahi ki iske charitra pe daag hai
Syana woh hota hai joh waqt ke rukh ko dekhkar, jhukna seekhe ... aur rukh badalte dekhkar, dushman ko jhukana seekhe

Duniya mein shayad hi aise koi maa baap honge joh apni aulaad ko zakhm dena chahenge ... lekin na jaane kitni aisi anginat aulaadein hai ... joh apne maa baap ka seena zakhmon se challi kar dalti hai aur uff tak nahi karti
Achchai se hi burai ko maara ja sakta hai ... neki se hi baddi ko mitaya ja sakta hai ... shanti se hi kisi ki mann ki jalan ko hataya ja sakta hai
Hamare gehre vishvas ke rishtey mein ... tumne apne dil mein kuch gehre raaz chupaye hai
Rishteydari ki keemat toh chukani hi padti hai is desh mein
Iski subah suna rahi hai iske raat ka fasaana
Duniya badi baawari, patthar pujan jaye ... ghar ki chakki koi na puje, jaako piso khaye
Shakahari bhojan khane se dil, dimaag aur aatma teeno shaant rehte hai
Pothi padh padhkar jag mua, pandit bhaya na koi ... dhai aakhar prem ka, padhe so pandit hoye
Jin gharon par Allah meherbaan hota hai ... wahan betiyan paida hoti hai
Jeena koi majboori nahi, ek maqsad hai
Harra rang aur bhagwa rang, green and saffron ... Hindustan ke jhande ka ek hi hissa hai ... usse ek hissa hi rehna chahiye ... poora jhanda banne ki koshish nahi karni chahiye
Bimaari ko chupane se rog kam nahi hota ... badh jaata hai
Asli imaan sirf mohabbat hai
Insaaniyat is duniya se bas laapata si ho gayi hai
Hasee nahi hai toh is duniya mein kuch bhi nahi hai ... haste raho, haste raho, haste raho
Chhot toh budhape ki hoti hai ... ek baar lag jaye, toh dard marte dam tak hota hai
Dard jitna zyada hota hai ... cheenkh utni hi lambi hoti hai
Kalam ki taqat talwaar se zyada hoti hai
Duniya mein saharon ki sabhi ko zaroorat hoti hai ... kisi ke pyar se badkar duniya mein koi sahara nahi hota
Maa ki bad-dua bhi dua bankar lagti hai
Woh mere paas hota hai goya ... jab koi doosra nahi hota
Yeh kyun, kya, kahan ke uljhan mein kyun pade ... bas yeh kya kam hai ki hum sab hai aur saath hai
Soz jab dil mein utar aata hai ... nagma aankhon se nazar aata hai

Bahut soch samajh kar samajh samajh kar samajhdari ke saath hum dono milke duniya ko kuch aaisa samjhayenge ... ke soch samajh kar samajh samajh kar samajhdari ke saath duniya bhi yeh samajh jayegi ... ke soch samajh kar samajh samajh kar samajhdari ke saath hum dono ki samajhdari saath saath chal rahi hai ... aur soch samajh kar samajh samajh kar samajhdari ke saath hum dono ko joh bahut pehle kar dena chahiye tha ... woh soch samajh kar samajh samajh kar samajhdari ke saath hum dono ne baad mein kiya ... magar kiya zaroor ... samajh rahi hai na main kya samjhana chah raha hoon?

Joh karte hai woh bolte nahi ... joh bolte woh karte nahi ... joh garajte hai woh baraste nahi ... joh baraste hai woh garajte nahi ... lekin main karoonga bhi, bolunga bhi, garjunga bhi, barsunga bhi
Maine tujhe dhoonda yahan vahan sara jahan kahan kahan kahan ... tu mujhe mili yahan yahan yahan?
Woh ek ko pakadti hai, doosre ko lipatti hai, teesre ko dekhti hai ... aur chauthe ko chedti hai

Aap log isse poochiye, iske dhadakte dil se poochiye ... zameen se poocho, aasman se poocho, hawaon se poocho, fizaon se poocho, andheron se poocho, ujalon se poocho, chaand se poocho, sitaron se poocho, aandhi se poocho, toofan se poocho ... mujhe se poocho, mere baap se poocho, isse poocho, iske baap se poocho, mere ghar ke char char cartoon se poocho ... arre main kehta hoon aur toh aur in pattiyon se poocho, in pattiyon ke peeche jalti hui battiyon se poocho, is bikhare hue kaleen se poocho, girre hue tambu se toote hue bamboo se poocho ... poocho us zarre zarre tinke tinke se kitna pyar kiya hai main ne isse?
Hum court mein dimaag se lade hai toh Baazigar ka Shah Rukh Khan hoon ... mukka laat se lade hai toh Judwaa ka Salman Khan hoon ... aur jazbaat se lade hai toh Sarfarosh ka Aamir Khan hoon
I feel every day is a valentine day ... every hour is a valentine hour ... every minute is a valentine minute ... every second is a valentine second
Is naari ki aaisi tarkari banata hoon ... ke sarkari gaadi mujhe izzat se lene aaye
Na rahega bambu, na rahega tambu ... na rahega tent, aur na hogi engagement
Main haddi nahi hoon hadda hoon ... apne daddy ka dadda hoon ... divorce karane ka adda hoon
Is boyfriend ko usne pehle se bhi zyada lift diya aur pehle se bhi zyada bada gift diya
Aksar log safar mein humsafar ban jaate hai
Kabhi kabhi hoothon ka kaam aankhen kar deti hai
Aankhon ne kar diya kaam tamaam ... kya hai aap ka shubh naam?

Abbe teri patni hai ki batate vade ki chutney hai ... jis tarah se chutney har thali mein batti rehti hai, har batate vade ko patti rehti hai ... us tarah se tumhari patni ka har station pe boyfriend hai yaar
Auron se poora fees leta hoon ... magar tum se pachas ki jagah tees leta hoon
Meri apni khud ki ek personal biwi hai
Itni beizzati maine zindagi mein ek saath kabhi nahi jheli hai
Tum mard zaat ke naam pe ek dhabba ho ... dhabba toh kya dhabba ke abba ho
Khushkismati sirf ek baar darwaza khatkhatati hai ... lekin badkismati tab tak darwaza khatkhatati hai jab tak darwaza khul na jaye
Izzat koi patni ko diya hua koi necklace nahi hai, college mein diya hua koi certificate nahi hai, locker mein chupakar rakhi koi jewellery nahi hai ... joh gava dene se chali jaati hai
Sukh aur dukh wohi samajh sakta hai jispar beetti hai
Joh log khudse nahi darte ... yeh samaaj ussi se darta hai
Ek umar si jee rahi ho, magar adhoori ... agar woh mil jaye, toh zindagi ho jaye poori
Kal tak joh ajnabi tha, dil aaj ussi ko chahta hai ... zindagi dene waale tujhpe, mar jaane ko jee chahta hai
Kyun mere pyar ka tum imtehaan lete ho ... tum meri jaan ho, kyun meri jaan lete ho
Insaan ka is duniya mein aana is baat ka signal hai ... ke koi hai joh sirf uski khatir is duniya mein aaya hai
Life mein doosron ke liye itna karna ... ki kabhi kam na pade
Humne tumhari yaad mein ro roke tub bhar diye ... aur tum bewafaa aaye aur usmein naha ke chal diye
Jinke paas pyar ki daulat ho ... unhe kabhi gareeb nahi samajhna chahiye
Naya aashiq purane sharaabi ki tarah hota hai ... har jagah usse botal nazar aati hai
Mumbai shehar dikhave ka shehar hai ... yahan jiske paas gaahi ho, uski gaadi fatafat chalti hai
Yeh Baburao ka style hai
Saala, rakh diya toh bhi baat karta hai
Woh main mast tel mein fry karke, woh main kha gaya
Kutriya saala, dekh ke number dial kar!
Utha le re baba, utha le ... mereko nahi re, in dono ko utha le
Devi ka prasad mandir mein milta hai ... garage mein nahin
Pehle mereko yeh samjha ki ... isko samjhana kya hai
Sunday ko aa ... Sunday ko mast naha do ke aa
Agar subah subah sandaas jana hai toh singer banna padega
Pressure aa gaya ... pressure aa gaya ... haai pressure aa gaya
Meri kundli mein khoon likha hai ... maloom hai na?
Chai se zyada saala kitli garam hai
Gandhi is the only sanity in this country
Dharm aur raajneeti ka combination bahut khatarnak hai ... ekdum jaise ki sex aur violence ka
Ek mujrim kanoon se bhaag sakta hai ... lekin doosre mujrim se nahi
Aaj apna pehla mulaqat, khane ke liye daal bhat ... khana khale aaj mere saath, khana khale bill ka kya baat
Tum toh un jaali noton se bhi zyada jaali nikle ... joh bazaar mein chalte hai

column2: Jis Desh Mein Ganga Rehta Hai
column3: Joh log maaf kar dete hai na woh kabhi udhas nahi hote

column2: Jis Desh Mein Ganga Rehta Hai
column3: Gaon ki shudh hawa khai hai maine, cigarette ha dhuan nahi ... faulad ka seena hai mera, haddiyon ka pinjra nahi
Saaya andhere mein saath chhod deta hai ... aur naseeb bure dino mein saath chhod deta hai
Ladkiyon ka asli ghar unka mayka nahi ... unka sasural hota hai
Kutte ko ghee aur chor ko izzat ... kabhi hazam nahi hoti
Insaan is duniya mein insaan bankar rahe ... yahi uske liye kaafi hai
Jis baap ki char jawan betiyan bin biyahi ghar mein baithi rahe ... us baap ki misaal us laash ki tarah hoti hai ... jisko na jalaya ja sakta hai, na dafnaya ja sakta hai
Beti ki shaadi baap ke liye swarg jaane ki seedi hoti hai
Chehra dil ka aaina hota hai
Har daaku mein ek Valmiki hota hai
Darke bhaag jaane waale darpok hote hai ... par binah wajah maar peet karne waale bahadur nahi ... ullu-ke-patthe hote hai
Saala kharcha pani todh pani kare apun ... aur maal pani le jaye yeh saala
Bata kya lega ... thanda, chai garam ... Bacardi, beer, rum
Every Sunday is not a day
Meri nazar mein teri haisiyat is paan ke barabar hai ... jisse jab chahun chabakar, tookh sakta hoon
Barsega pani aur hum sab nahayenge ... promotion ki khushi mein nachenge gayenge
Is aurat ke mann mein chupa hai paap ... bachche ka woh padosi hai baap
Mai ke doodh aur majboor insaan ke aasunyon mein milavat nahi hovat hai
Insaan jab janam lene waala hota hai toh uske duniya mein aane ka paata pehle se hi chal jaata hai ... lekin maut ke aane ki khabar kisi ko nahi hoti
Dukh jab zindagi ka hissa ban jaye ... toh usse haskar gale laga lena chahiye
Jis tarah aag lakdi ko jalakar raakh kar deti hai ... ussi tarah gussa insaan ki akal ko nighal jaata hai
Politics aur underworld mein agar opposition na ho ... mazaa hi nahi aata
Dushman agar taqatwar ho ... toh usse talwar se nahi balki dimaag se maarna chahiye
Ek ladki ki aabroo sheeshay ki tarah nazuk hoti hai ... is par ek badnaami ka chota sa patthar bhi gir jaye ... toh tootkar chaknachur ho jaata hai
Dukh ke baad sukh hi aata hai aur raat ke baad savera
Vardi ko khel aur kanoon ko rakhail samajhne waalon ko ... Jwala maarta nahi, maar deta hai
Nabhe crore Hindustan ki janta ko tabah karne waalon ko tabah karne ke liye ... sirf ek Hindustani kafi hai
Aye main Shankar dada ... baat karne nahi ka zyada ... poora ka poora aadmi ka kar doonga aadha
Dukh mein peeyo daru, sukh mein peeyo soup ... ameer aadmi ki party mein, gareeb aadmi chup
Swarg mein uparwaala premiyon ki jodi banata hai ... aur yahan dharti par unhe milata hai
Jodi toh hoti hai gajar aur mooli ki ... red and white absolutely bright ... log kahenge dekho inka pyar, inka laad ... just like a salad
Khubsoorati saadgi mein hi hai
Tumhe dekhne ke liye mujhe in aankhon ki zaroorat nahin hai
Jahan paisa hota hai wahan jurm hai ... jahan jurm hota hai wahan khauff ... aur jahan khauff hota hai wahan mere jaisa mujrim
Haath mein pistol lekar joh jeete hai ... unka anth pistol hi likhti hai
Aaj tumhe maut sirf dekhni hi nahi ... mehsoos bhi karni padegi
Jaise daur badalte hai, mausam badalte hai ... vaise hi har kutte ke din badalte hai
Shuruvat unhone ki thi ... anjaam main doongi
Phooti hui taqdeer aur tezz dimag bahut hi khatarnak combination ho sakta hai
Bhagwan ke saath khel, sentimental hai maaf kar dega ... bhai mental hai, cheerke rakh dega
Teen cheezon ki wajah se rishtey bante bighadte hai ... aapke dil mein kya hai, aapki kismat mein kya hai aur aapki jeb mein kya hai
Kayi baatein is chewing gum ki tarah hoti hai ... jab tak mooh mein rehti hai achcha lagta hai ... bahar aate hi pareshani ban jaati hai
Aadmi ke paas taqat ke saath saath dimaag ka hona bahut zaroori hai ... aur jiske paas dono cheezein hoti hai usse kehte hai complete man
Samundar kitna hi bada kyun na ho kisi ki pyaas nahi bhuja sakta ... aur kuvaan kitna hi chota kyun na ho ... pyaas bhujane ke liye kuven ke pani ki hi zaroorat padti hai
Jahan satya hai wahan vijay hai

Dhanda shuru karne se pehle teri jahan jahan bhi pahunch hai na, un sabse meri report manga lena ... agar kisi ek ne bhi mere area mein dhanda shuru karne ki salah di na tujhe ... toh vardi ki kasam tere dhande ka ribbon kaatne main khud aaonga
Zindagi mein sirf ek hi aadmi se daro ... jise maut ka darr nahi
Jis din police aur fauj tum logon ki rakhail ban jayegi na ... us din yeh saara mulk ek randikhana ban jayega ... aur jaise chakle chalte hai na ... ussi tarah tum is desh ko bech daloge
Rishwat dene waale se zyada bada gunehgar rishwat lene waala hai
Main apne area mein pehle gair kanooni dhande band karta hoon ... aur phir dhande karne waalon ko
Woh itna kamina hai ki faltu mein apni arthi par bhi nahi letega
Maa banna duniya ka sabse bada saubhagya hai ... ishwar ka sabse bada vardaan
Sachche aasunyon mein bahut taqat hoti hai
Jab bhi koi samaaj ke niyam todta hai ... maryada ki rekha ka ulanghan karta hai ... toh sach much uske paas ek hi rasta bachta hai ... prayashchit
Uske gaal, uske baal arre kya kamaal ... aur uski chaal karde halaal ... uski kalai hai ram duhai, pure malai ... aur uska badan phoolon ka chaman ... aur uski aankhen sone ke button
Joh aurat ki hifazat karta hai woh sirf pati ya aashiq nahi hota ... mard ka ek aur roop bhi hota hai ... jisse bhai kehte hai
Dost dost na raha, pyar pyar na raha ... daru ke sivah zindagi mein koi karobar na raha
Bade beabroo hoke unke kooche se hum nikle ... humne toh ki wafaa pe wafaa pe wafaa non-stop ... phir bhi woh bewafaa nikle
Agar tujh mein dum hai saaki toh Qutub Minar ko hilake dikha ... agar dum nahi hai toh mere naal beht, do goont maar ... aur Qutub Minar ko hilta dekh
Dekhi zamane ki yaari ... bichade sabhi bari bari
Sheesha ho ya dil ho aakhir toot jaata hai ... lab tak aate aate haathon se sagar choot jaata hai
Yeh sach hai ki maine tumse jhoot kaha ... par yeh bhi sach hai ki maine tumse mohabbat ki hai
Waqt, jihad aur maut ... kisi ka intezar nahi karta
Pathan ko toh sirf do hi baatein aati hai ... hadh se zyada pyar aur behadh nafrat
Neki aur badi mein, haiwaniyat aur insaaniyat mein, kehar aur Kashmir mein kya zinda rahe ... yeh tumhe tay karna hai ... sirf tumhe
Duniya mein kitni hai nafratein ... phir bhi dilon mein hai chahatein ... mar bhi jaaye pyar waale ... mitt bhi jaaye yaar waale ... zinda rehti unki mohabbatein
Main aaj bhi usse utni hi mohabbat karta hoon ... aur is liye nahi ki koi aur nahi mili ... par is liye ki usse mohabbat karne se fursat hi nahi milti
Izzat darr se nahi ... mohabbat se jeeti jaati hai
Mohabbat bhi zindagi ki tarah hoti hai ... har mod aasaan nahi hota, har mod par khushi nahi hoti ... par jab hum zindagi ka saath nahi chhodte ... phir mohabbat ka saath kyun chhodein
Mohabbat mein shartein nahi hoti ... toh afsoos bhi nahi hona chahiye
Zindagi pyar dene aur pyar lene ka naam hai ... aur kuch nahi
Maine aaj tak sirf ek hi ladki se mohabbat ki hai ... aur zindagi bhar sirf us hi se karta rahoonga
Koi pyar kare toh tumse kare, tum jaise ho waise kare ... koi tumko badal ke pyar kare, toh woh pyar nahi woh sauda kare ... aur saheba, pyar mein sauda nahi hota ... right?

Jab choti choti baaton mein hum haste the rote the, tabse tumse pyar kiya hai ... jab bin mausam barsaaton mein hum jhoom jhoom ke gaate the, tabse tumse pyar kiya hai ... jab chup chupke aadhi raaton mein chatt pe taare ginte the, tabse tumse pyar kiya hai ... ab toh khud bhi bhool chuka hoon main ki kabse tumse pyar kiya hai ... bas itna hi keh sakta hoon main ...  ki sirf tumse, tum hi se pyar kiya hai
Mohabbat bahut khoobsurat hoti hai ... toh kya hua agar woh apne saath thoda sa dard laati hai
Mohabbat aur sangeet ka bahut gehra rishta hai ... kyun ki dono ka janam dil se hota hai ... aur dono ki kismat bhi dil ke kehne par nirbhar hai
Aap zindagi ki har jung jeette chale aaye ... par zindagi ke saare sahare haarte chale gaye
Main yahan par surya ki roshni itni tezz kar doonga ... ki woh aadmi joh pachaas saalon se surya ko ghoorta aa raha hai ... us he bhi apni palkein jhukani hogi
Har badi kamyaabi ke peeche ... ek bahut bada balidaan hota hai
Duniya mein kitni hai nafratein ... phir bhi dilon mein hai chahatein ... jao kehdo is jahan se, is zameen se, aasman se ... rok na sakenge ab yeh mohabbatein
Main har din dua karta hoon ki mujh jaisi kismat kisi ki bhi na ho
Kuch rishton ki taqdeer sirf dosti tak hi likhi hoti hai
Yeh business waale kisike dost nahi hote ... yeh sirf paise ke dost hote hai
Kutta paalo, billi paalo, yahan tak ki saanp paalna ... par galatfahmi mat paalna
Rajneeti mein sabse ahem cheez hoti hai timing
Humse garmi aur garibi bardaasht nahin hoti
Puttar, puttar, puttar ... now you give me uttar
Hamara har jawaan ek nuclear bomb hai
Mere desh ke liye mera jazba, meri vardi mein nahi ... meri ragon mein daud raha hai
Itni laashen bicha doonga ... ki log Jallianwala Bagh ko bhool jayenge

column2: Raja Ko Rani Se Pyar Ho Gaya
column3: Soyi hui kismat ko jagana ... wohi himmat ka kaam hai

column2: Raja Ko Rani Se Pyar Ho Gaya
column3: Sapno ki duniya mein safalta pana aasaan hai ... par asli zindagi mein mushkil
Jhooth ko sach banane ke liye saboot ki zaroorat hoti hai ... sach toh khud ek saboot hai
Woh bache jinke mummy pappa nahi hote na ... God ke sabse special bache hote hai
Tere labon pe inkaar hai, mere labon pe ikraar hai ... haan yahi toh hai sab nishaaniyan, haan issi ka naam toh pyar hai
Shaadi ke bagair mohabbat gunaah hai
Janwaro pe bharosa kiya ja sakta hai ... insaano par nahi
School kabhi gaya nahi ... par zindagi har roz ek naya sabak sikhati hai
Tumne mujhe zindagi ke woh haseen khwab kyun dikhaye ... jiske tootne par mere andhar ka insaan hi toot gaya
Mohabbat karne waale ... kabhi mohabbat ke dushman nahi hote
Haddiyan toh kabhi na kabhi judh hi jayengi ... magar mere andhar joh kuch bhi toota hai na ... woh kabhi nahi judhega
Insaan itna ghatiya janwar hai ... ki waqt padhne par khuda ki zaat se bhi inkaar karde
Insaan duniya ka sabse ghatiya janwar hai
Fauji ka ek haath pada na ... toh che foot ka aadmi dedh foot ka hokar reh jaata hai
Zindagi bas ek safar hai ... sacha ghar toh sabka ek hi hai ... upar waale ka
Gham aur thakaan ka mel ... jaanlewa hota hai
Gehre pani mein utarne ke baad ... doobne se ghabrana bekaar hai
Main awaara aur badmaash bardaasht kar sakta hoon ... lekin gaddar kabhi nahi
Aadmi jab bahut khush hota hai ... roh deta hai
Tere huzoor se sab sharmsar hokar chale ... shikar karne ko aaye the, shikaar hokar chale
Dosti ki tarah dushmani bhi ek tarfa nahi hoti ... dono taraf se hoti hai
Pyar ki aahuti hi pyar ko amar bana deti hai
Bahut khoobsurat hai aankhen tumhari ... bana dijiye inko kismat hamari ... usse aur kya chahiye zindagi mein ... jisse mil gayi hai mohabbat tumhari
Hamere baad mehfil mein afsane bayan honge ...  baharen humko dhoondengi, na jaane hum kahan honge
Meri nigaah ne yeh kaisa khawab dekha hai ... zameen pe chalta hua mehtab dekha hai
Yeh businessman bade matlabi hote hai ... inka hasna ya rona business hota hai, inka bolna ya khamosh rehna business hota hai, inka yaad rakhna business hota hai, bhool jana business hota hai
Hum businessman kisi ko maarte hai toh business ke liye ... aur kisi ko zinda rakhte hai toh business ke liye
Kya haath paya hai, saare ke saare devi devtaon ka saath hai ... rahu ketu ka ghulam hai, wahan shani ka kya kaam hai
Pasand cheez hi aaisi hai joh waqt ke saath badal jaati hai ... lekin pyar kabhi nahi badalta
Ishq agar sacha ho toh qayamat tak zinda rehta hai

Is duniya mein woh log bahut badkismat hote hai jinhe kisi ka pyar nahi milta ... lekin usse bhi zyada badkismat woh log hote hai jinhe pyar toh milta hai ... lekin uski kadar nahi karte, usse kho dete hai
Gaane toh ban jaate hai ... halaat se sur janam lete hai aur jazbaat se bol ban jaate hai
Kabhi usse shaadi nahi karni chahiye jisse tum pyar karti ho ... balki shaadi usse karni chahiye joh tumhe pyar karta ho
Jiska dil gham ki tanhaiyon mein ujadh gaya ho ... woh bahar se kitna hi sehatmand lagta ho, lekin andar se toh bimaar hi rehta hai
Joh sacha pyar karte hai woh zindagi bhar ke liye naraaz nahi hote ... kuch derr ke liye rooth jaate hai
Aao ab hum laut chale apne logon mein, apni basti mein ... jahan pyar hai, apnapan hai, sukoon hai

Ek bachcha anath ashram mein palkar bada ho sakta hai ... baap mar jaye toh maa ke sahare jee sakta hai ... lekin ek aurat ka pati chala jaye toh woh kiske sahare aur kaise jeeti hai ... woh takleef main samajhta hoon
Bhagwan chadawe se nahi ... chadane waale ki neeyat se khush hota hai
Dard agar insaan ke apne daire mein rahe toh saha ja sakta hai ... magar joh dard doosron ka dard ban jaye ... usse apno mein baant lena hi behtar hota hai
Zindagi ki raftar jitni tezz hai ... traffic utni hi rukavatein daal deta hai ... kai baar raaste badalne padte hai ghar pahunchne ke liye
Apna toh sidhaant hai shaan se jeeyo aur shanti se ludhak jao
Tumhara nishana toh chook gaya aur ab humne is goli par tumhara naam likh diya hai ... aur jis din yeh goli hamari bandook se chalegi ... hamara nishana nahi chookega
Yeh chehre ki rangat gulabi gulabi ... yeh mausam ki halat sharabi sharabi ... mera dil machalke keh raha hai ... something, something, something, something
Nadaani mein tumne joh kadam uthaya hai ... woh sirf tumhe hi nahi, poore khandan ko ek aaise modh par le aaya hai ... jahan se har raasta barbadi aur zillat ki taraf jaata hai
Maa duniya ek aaisi daulat hoti hai ... joh insaan ko sirf ke baar naseeb hoti hai
Hamari asli jaidaat, hamari asli daulat toh hamare yeh rishtey hi hote hai ... joh hum mein virasat mein milte hai
Agar police ke paas jaakar shaanpatti karne ki koshish ki ... toh kaan ke neeche capsule laga doonga
Zindagi mein agar apne bal par aage badna ho toh ... sabse pehle doosron ki naukri karna seekhna chahiye ... isse insaan hunar bhi seekhta hai aur tameez bhi
Kya pyar hai, kya dulaar hai ... kitna sukhi pariwar hai, mera toh dil nisaar hai
Bheje ka dahi kiya toh dhood bana daloonga ... kaan ke neeche capsule laga daloonga
Jab tak paise nahi mil jaate, Tiger kisi ko maarta nahi ... aur paise mil jaane par, Tiger kisi ko chhodta nahi
Chehre par bholapan hai aur aankhon mein pagalpan ... aise log bahut khatarnak hote hain ... bahut khatarnak
Jaise purana cricketer commentator banta hai na ... waise purani gadi museum mein jati hai
Aise kaam ke liye himmat ki zaroorat nahi hoti ... sirf iraada hona chahiye
Hathyar becha jata hai ... koi apni taqat nahi bechta
Haldi bahut hi kaam ki cheez hoti hai beta ... doodh mein milakar pee jao, toh shareer ka poora dard khatam ho jata hai ... aur chune mein milakar zakhm pe lagao, ghav bhar jata hai
Bina patte ke is shehar mein sirf keede makaude milte hain ... aadmi nahin
Mumbai mein inka koi mandir nahi hai, lekin puja sabhi karte hain inki
Humara bhala karke woh hum mein bata gaye hain ... ki waqt aane par woh humara kitna bura kar sakte hai
Kabhi kabhi dil jodne ke liye dil todna padta hai ... aur dil todkar jodne waale ko ... pata nahi kya kehte hai
Jinki zindagi choti hoti hai ... unhe bade bade vaade nahi karne chahiye
Badshah ke paas badshah nahi aayega toh kya ghulam aayega
Shandaar jagahon par jaana aur jaandaar logon se dosti karna ... mera shaunk hai
Yeh aadmi hai ki mutton ki dukaan
Agar tumne hamara kaam nahi kiya ... toh hum tumhari beti ki zindagi bounce check ki tarah phaadkar ... tudke tudke kar denge
Police ki maar aur talwar ki dhaar se aaj tak koi nahi bacha
Bhai logon ka nikal jaata hai oil ... police ki bandh ho jaati hai file ... naam hai Munna mobile
Chokri samajh ke chhod raha hoon ... doobara nazar aayi na toh Sridevi ka poster bana ke deewar pe chipka doonga
Hamare dhande mein hamare saaye ko bhi pata nahi chalna chahiye ... ki hum kya karte hai
Looteron ki loot aur police ki choot ... ko janta kabhi maaf nahi karti
Munna mobile kaan pe lagta hai, toh sab sun leta hai ... jab aankh ki TV kholta hai, toh sab dekh leta hai
Premika banna bahut aasan hai ... biwi banna utna hi mushkil hai
Nasha chahe kitna hi zyada kyun na ho ... ek din utarta zaroor hai
Patni har cheez ka batwara bardaash kar sakti hai ... lekin apne pati ka nahi
Har nakamyab aadmi ke andar ek kavi chupa hi hota hai ... aur har kamyab kavi doosri sab cheezon mein nakamyab rehta hai
India mein woh bahut kuch hai joh America mein nahi ... sirf hum jaison ko dikhta nahi hai
Jis din tu isse zindagi dega ... main isse maut doonga, maut, sirf maut!
Tum saans leti ho, toh mera dil dhadakta hai
Agar main marr gaya toh tu jee gaya ... agar main jee gaya toh tu marr gaya
Bahadur toh sab hote hai ... main zara sa lucky hoon
Har baimaan aur bure aadmi ke seene mein khauff bhar dena chahta hoon main
Agar ye sach hai ... toh main isse jhoot sabit kar doonga
Hum amir is liye hain ki kyun ki ... hum mein gareebon ko gareeb banaye rakhne ki technique aati hai
Humne chidiya ka naksha manga tha, chidiye ke ghosle ka nahi
Zindagi achche burre tajurbon ka silsila hai ... burre ko toh bhool jaana chahiye aur achche ko seene se lagake rakhna chahiye
Jab mohabbat ki aag dahek uthti hai na toh woh mandir aur masjid ki taraf nahi dekhta hai ... un aankhon mein sirf dekhta hai jinhe woh pyar karta hai

Tumko kya malum Shabnam guzarti kaisi hai meri raatein ... teri tasveer aankhon mein basaye bhatakta rehta hoon, karta hoon bas tumhari baatein ... tum shama ho Shabnam aur Manzoor parwana ... tumse lipatkar jalne ko tayaar hai deewana
Jahan jahan hum mohabbat karne waalon ka khoon girega ... hazaron deewane pehda honge
Aag lagane ke liye sirf ek maachis ki teeli bahut hoti hai ... magar usse bhujane ke liye shehar ka saara pani bhi kam padh jaata hai
Dharam aadmi ko khuda se aur aadmi ko aadmi se jodhta hai

Koi bhi baat agar zor zabardasti se manvayi jaye ... chahe woh mazhab ke baare mein ho, apne aqeeday, apne imaan ke baare mein ho ... ya phir apne usoolon ke baare mein ho ... uska asar zyada der nahi rehta aur nateeja tabahi hi hota hai
Galati sab karte hai ... lekin galati sudhaarne ka mauka sabko nahi milta
Pyar doosro ki jaan lena nahi hota ... pyar doosro ko jeene dena hota hai ... zindagi hota hai pyar, doosro ko khushi dena hota hai pyar
Jab sapne aur haqeeqat takrate hai ... toh sapne toot jaate hai
Main tumhe bahut pyar karta hoon ... itna jitna suraj karta hai apni kiranon se, chand karta hai apni chandni se, phool karte hai apni khushboo se
Prayashchit insaan ke paapo ko mitta deta hai ... woh buzdil hote hai joh apne paapo ko mittane ke bajaye khud ko mitta dete hai
Jeet ki khushi zahir karna achi baat hai ... lekin maghroor hona munasib nahi
Dobara agar isne mere beete hue kal mein jhaankne ki koshish ki ... toh isse aane waala kal dekhna naseeb nahi hoga
Main "gaa" bajhata hoon toh "saa" bajhta hai, main "paa" bajhata hoon toh "maa" bajhta hai ... yane ki main kuch bhi bajha saku, usse pehle meri bajh jaati hai
Teri zulfon ke pech-o-kham teri zindagi se kam nahi ... jitni sawariye utni ulajhti chali jaati hai
Jab tak tum jaisi auraten is dharti par zinda hai ... kalyug mein bhi satyug zinda rahega
Koi rishta pakka nahi hota ... maut aati hai toh pakke se pakka rishta bhi kachi maati ki tarah toot jaata hai
Kom toh bas ek hai ... insaan ki
Tum logon ne mere pe vishvas kiya aur maine tumhare saath vishvasghat kiya ... tum logon ne meri jai-jai-kaar ki aur maine tumhari peeth mein chura bhaunka
Thoda roothegi, thoda cheekhegi, thoda chilayegi ... dil kehta hai ek din haseena maan jayegi
Tareef toh us khuda ki hai jisne yeh jahan banaya ... jisne aapko ladki waala aur hum mein ladke waala banaya
Yeh duniya gham toh deti hai, lekin sharikh-e-gham nahi hoti ... aur is duniya mein kisi ke door jaane se na, mohabbat kam nahi hoti
Joh kaam maine itni umar mein nahi kiya ... tune itni si umar mein kar liya?
Chaar kilo alu kha gaya bhalu ... tu bhi chalu aur main bhi chalu
Agar tu sudhar gaya toh isse fighting ka the end samajhna ... varna yeh interval hai ... agli mulaqat mein climax kar doonga

Aapko kahan kahan nahi dhoonda ... Japan ki jail mein, America ki rail mein, khatte meethe bhel mein, khopre ke tel mein ... samose mein dhoonda, alu mein dhoonda, pyaz mein dhoonda ... magar na mila baap ... mila ghaas mein chupa saanp
Share bazar mein lute huye vyapari ki tarah roiye ... club mein haare huye juari ki tarah roiye ... signal pe bheek maangte huye bikhari ki tarah roiye ... magar roiye, please roiye
Hamare dhande ke andar khoon ke rishtey ki keemat pani se bhi kam hoti hai
Tumhare bin life lunch plate without rice hai ... baby hum tumhari right choice hai
Yeh meri Laila hai ... hum inke Majnu hai ... yeh choli hai toh hum inke daaman hai ... yeh phool hai toh hum aangan hai
Jab tak tum hum mein apna nahi manogi hum yunhi aadhi raat ko aate rahenge ... hum tumhare dil par apne pyar ka chewing gum chipkakar rahenge ... prem patra ke patthar maarte rahenge
Maine tumhe samjha tha badam, nikle moongphali ... ab bol Jai Bajrang Bali aur todh us tapori ki nali
Aap achche achchon ko hila daalte hai ... naak ke baal jala daalte hai
Main tumhari pungi bajaonga!
Roshanara beti hai ek Musalman ki ... jisse pehchaan hai apne imaan ki ... pyar toh kya jaan tak loota doongi ... mujhe kasam hai apne Hindustan ki
Woh toh meri saanson mein hai, meri dhadkanon mein hai, meri aankhon mein hai, mere khwabon mein hai ... sach toh yeh hai ke mera dil unke paas hai aur unka dil mere paas
Woh khudgarz joh jung chahte hai unka kuch nahi jaata ... tabah toh woh log hote hai ... jinki subah roti ki talash mein shuru hoti hai aur raat thakaan ke bistar par

Hamare liye sona hai hamare kheton mein leharti faslein ... apne bachche ke liye ek maa ki chaati mein umarti hui mamta ... bhai ke kalai ke liye ek behen ke rakhi ka pyar ... ek patni ke liye uski maang mein damakta sindoor ... pyar, mohabbat aur rishton ka yeh sona kabhi dokha nahi de sakta ... is liye Bharat sone ki chidiya tha, hai aur hamesha rahega
Maut ka sadma toh insaan bardasht kar leta hai ... lekin jab koi apna kho jaata hai toh usse paane ki tadap ko bardasht nahi kar paata
Meri zindagi maut ke naam ho sakti hai ... lekin mere purkhon ki zameen tumhare naam nahi ho sakti
Aurat apne pati mein ek achcha insaan dhoondti hai ... joh usse pyar de sake, usse samajh sake, marte dum tak uska saath nibha sake
Ek din aayega main tere ghamand ke tukde tukde kar doonga ... aur teri zid ke bhi tukde tukde ho jayenge
Main usko aaisa dasna chahti hoon ki woh pal pal marne ke liye tadapta rahe ... aur tadap tadapkar jeeta rahe
Sache pyar ke beech kabhi mat aana ... kyun ki uski jeet hokar hi rehti hai
Aaj usse uski bhool yaad dilane ka samay aa gaya hai ... uski bhool ki keemat chukane ka samay aa gaya hai
Aapki aankhon se bahe ek ek aasoon ki, hamare pariwar ke bahe ek ek khoon ke boond ki keemat ... Thakur Gajendra ko apne khoon se chukani hogi
Mere shareer ke hazar tukde bhi ho jaye na ... tab bhi tujhe us zameen ka tukda nahi milega
Politics naukri nahi hai ... business hai, bahut bada business
Pichle pachaas saalo mein hamare desh ne sirf mantri aur minister paida kiye hai ... ek neta paida nahi kiya
Is generation ke paas sawal bahut hai ... jawab koi nahi

column3: Jis aadmi ka dil achcha na ho ... uspar kuch achcha nahi lagta

column2: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
column3: Bhaisaab dete hai gali pe gali ... lagta hai jana padega mujhe Kullu Manali

column2: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
column3: Kardo aaisi ghatna ... woh seedhe pahunche Patna

column2: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
column3: Khana khane ke liye pati ka nahi ... bhook lagne ka intezaar karna chahiye

column2: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
column3: Aaisi ki uski dhulai ... ki seedha pahucha diya Bhilai

column2: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
column3: Kaat dete hai iska patta ... pahuncha dete hai isse Calcutta

column2: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
column3: Sabzi kharab ho toh usse phek dete hai ... lekin aadmi kharab hai kaike, usse phekte nahi ... sudhaar lete hai

column2: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
column3: Ban toh raha hai Birla ... par pahunch na jana Kerala

column2: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
column3: Aye param pita parmeshwar ... maar maar ke pahucha diya Mahabaleshwar

column2: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
column3: Baja toh rahe ho dunka ... par jana na padhe Sri Lanka
Agar tum mujhe yun hi dekhti rahi ... toh tumhe mujhse pyar ho jayega
Sameer hawa ka jhoka
Kabhi kabhi insaan kuch nahi kehkar bhi ... sab kuch keh deta hai
Chahane aur haasil karne mein bahut phark hai ... pyar sirf haasil karna nahi ... pyar dene ka naam hai
Pyar apni khushi mein nahi ... balki jinhe tum pyar karte ho, unki khushi mein hai

Kaise bataon main tumhe mere liye tum kaun ho ... kaise bataon main tumhe tum dhadkanon ka geet ho, jeevan ka tum sangeet ho, tum zindagi, tum bandagi, tum roshni, tum taazgi, tum har khushi, tum pyar ho, tum preet ho, manmeet ho ... aankhon mein tum, yaadon mein tum, saanson mein tum, aahon mein tum, neendon mein tum, khwaabon mein tum ... tum ho meri har baat mein, tum ho mere din raat mein, tum subaah mein, tum shyaam mein, tum soch mein, tum kaam mein ... mere liye paana bhi tum, mere liye khona bhi tum, mere liye hasna bhi tum, mere liye rona bhi tum aur jaagna sona bhi tum ... jaaon kahin, dekhon kahin, tum ho wahan, tum ho wahin ... kaise bataon main tumhe tum bin toh main kuch bhi nahi ... kaise bataon main tumhe mere liye tum kaun ho
Destiny bahut beraham hoti hai ... yeh apne doston se mooh pherne par aur dushmanon se baat karne par majboor kar deti hai

Kaise bataon main tumhe mere liye tum kaun ho ... yeh joh tumhara roop hai, yeh zindagi ki dhoop hai ... chandan se tarsha hai badan, behti hai jis mein ek agan ... yeh shokhiyan, yeh mastiyan, tumko hawaon se mili, zulfein ghataon se mili ... hooton mein kaliyan khil gayi, aankhon ko jheele mil gayi ... chehre mein simti chandni, awaaz mein hai ragini ... sheeshe ke jaisa ang hai, phoolon ke jaisa rang hai, nadiyon ke jaisi chaal hai, kya husn hai, kya haal hai ... yeh jism ki rangeeniyan, jaise hazaaron titliyan, baahon ki yeh golaiyan, aanchal mein yeh parchaiyan ... yeh nagriyan hai khwaab ki, kaise bataon main tumhe haalat dil-e-betaab ki ... kaise bataon main tumhe mere liye tum kaun ho

Kaise bataon main tumhe mere liye tum kaun ho ... kaise bataon main tumhe mere liye tum dharam ho, mere liye imaan ho ... tum hi ibaadat ho meri, tum hi to chaahat ho meri ... tum hi mera armaan ho, takta hoon main har pal jisse tum hi to voh tasveer ho, tum hi meri taqdeer ho ... tum hi sitaara ho mera, tum hi nazaara ho mera ... yudhyan mein mere ho tum, jaise mujhe ghere ho tum ... purab mein tum, paschim mein tum, uttar mein tum, dakshin mein tum, saare mere jeevan mein tum, har pal mein tum, har chin mein tum ... mere liye rasta bhi tum, mere liye manzil bhi tum, mere liye saagar bhi tum, mere liye saahil bhi tum ... main dekhta bas tumko hoon, main sochta bas tumko hoon, main jaanta bas tumko hoon, main maanta bas tumko hoon, tum hi meri pehchaan ho ... kaise bataon main tumhe, devi ho tum mere liye, mere liye bhagwaan ho ... kaise bataon main tumhe mere liye tum kaun ho

Sansar ne aurat ko maa ke roop mein dekha hai, bahen ke roop mein dekha hai, beti ke roop mein dekha hai ... magar chandi ke roop mein nahi dekha
Tumhare liye sindoor ki keemat chahe kuch bhi na ho ... magar yeh ek suhagan ke liye anmol hai
Aurat ki sehan-shakti dharti ki tarah hoti hai ... joh har zulm seh leti hai, magar jab uske khroad ka jwalamukhi phatta hai ... toh woh sabko tabah kar deti hai
Duaon se swarg aur narak ke faisle hote hai ... kanoon ke nahi
Jurm ki chataan ko kranti ki lehren takra takrakar todh deti hai
Jab samne waala garam hota hai na ... toh khud ko naram rehne ka
Ab tak tum is vardi ki ahmiyat ko samajh nahi paye ho ... kyun ki tum ek aaise dimak ho jisne is police station ki deewaron ko itna khokla kar diya hai ... ki koi mamuli sa ladka isse todh sakta hai
Ab tak tera muqabla buzdilon se hua hai ... jab samna is mard se hoga na ... toh teri yeh sher banne ki galatphami door ho jayegi
Paap ka ghinauna rang main teri aankhon mein dekh raha hoon ... yeh rang maut ka elaan hai ... tu hi nahi, tujh jaise har paapi ka anth ab bahut hi nazdeek hai
Padhe likhe logon ke saath mein hai na, kabhi likha padhi ka kaam nahi karna chahiye
Main jaanta tha ek na ek din yeh ladka meri izzat ki bajjiyan talega ... woh bhi mitti ke tel mein
Bookh aaisi cheez hai joh achche achchon ki zid ko bhula deta hai
Jab hum muskurate hai ... toh dushmano ke dil dahil jaate hai
Jab do sher aamne saamne khade hoon ... toh bhediye unke aas paas nahin rehte
Auron ki zameen khodoge, toh usme se matti aur patthar milenge ... aur hamari zameen khodoge, toh usme se hamare dushmano ke sar milenge
Hum apne kadmo ki aahat se hawa ka rukh badal dete hai
Ya toh tum neeche aa jao yah phir hum upar aate hai ... ya thoda neeche tum aao aur thoda upar hum aaye
Aap aag ke paas rehkar shaant nahi hai ... aur hum dil mein aag rakhkar bhi shaant hai
Hamari sultanat ki sadak ... insaaniyat ki dehleez se shuru hokar, reham aur imaandari ke ilaake se guzarti hui ... dil ke darwaaze par khatam hoti hai
Bhadki hui aag ko bhujane ke liye joh phoonk marne ki koshish karta hai ... uska chehra jal jaata hai
Joh tumhari baat nahi manega ... woh upar se nau inch chota kar diya jayega ... yaane ki sar dhar se alag
Doosre ka khota sikka bhi agar kichad mein gira ho toh usse uthakar apni jeb mein rakha ja sakta hai ... lekin apna khara sikka jaan moochkar kichad mein nahi phenka ja sakta
Hum woh pandit hain ... joh shaadi bhi karate hain, aur shraadh bhi
Jinke badan kagaz ke hote hai woh agni devta ki puja nahi karte
Aaj kal ka ishq janamo ka rog nahi hai ... waqti nasha hai shaam ko hota hai, subah utar jaata hai
Jung mein pyar nahi hota ... lekin pyar mein jung hua karti hai
Bade se bade zaalimon ke zulm se bada hota hai ... ek gareeb ka inteqam
Aurron ki zameen sirf zameen hai ... aur hamari zameen ek gardish
Gadhaa kitna bhi imported sabun lagaye ... woh ghoda nahi ban jaata
Kuch saanp itne zehreelay hote hai ... ki agar woh kaat le toh palak jhapakte hi zindagi kat jaati hai ... woh karvat badalne ka mauka tak nahi dete
Hum uss mukaam par hai ... jahan tumhare sarr se zyada oonchai par ... hamare paon rehte hai
Pyar se gale lag ja toh rani bana doonga ... nahi toh pani pani kar doonga
Khatmalo ko maar maar kar khoon jaama karne se ... blood bank nahin ban jaata
Aapne hamare haath mein taash kya de di ... yeh samajhiye baazi de di
Jis tarah bewafaa mehmoob kabhi ek dil mein nahi reh sakte ... us hi tarah choohe kabhi ek bil mein nahi reh sakte
Tumne hamare badan pe kharashein lagayi ... hum tumhare badan pe anginat zakhm banayenge
Dekh sakta hai bhala kaun yeh pyare aasoon ... meri aankhon mein nah aa jaaye tumhare aasoon
Jab hum kash lagate hai ... toh hamare dushman gash khakar gir jaate hai
Lamho ka bhanwar cheer ke insaan bana hoon ... ehsaas hoon main waqt ke seene mein ghada hoon
Woh chahe hazaaro ghadiyaan khareed le ... magar unmein woh sirf waqt ko dekh sakte hai ... waqt ko ghulam nahi bana sakte
Tarikh is baat ki gawahi deti hai ke baghavat ki kahaniya ... kabhi gulab jal se nahi likhi gayi ... yeh hamesha garam khoon se likhi gayi hai
Aulad ke aasoon baap ke dil pe tezaab ke boond ki tarah girte hai ... aur usse challi kar dete hai
Majboori mein daya ki bheekh maangi jaati hai ... koi shart nahi rakhi jaati
Jab hum dushmano ka khayal karte hue apne paon neeche rakhte hai ... toh hamare dushman maut ka tasavur karte hue zameen se upar uthne lagte hai
Sher ki dumm bankar jeene se achcha hai ... kutte ka mooh bankar jeena
Hum jab saamne waale ko paani pila dete hain ... tab paani peete hain
Hamari yaadash achchi bhi hai aur tezz bhi hai
Hum apni zubaan mein faulaad rakhte hai ... joh halaat ki garmi se na toh phigalti hai aur na hi lachakti hai
Woh us chaand ki tarah hai jismein gareebi ka daag toh hai magar ... bahut sari khoobiyon ki chamak bhi hai
Mohabbat janwar ko bhi insaan bana deti hai ... lekin kuch insaan aaise hote hai jinhe mohabbat bhi insaan nahi bana sakti ... woh zindagi bhar janwar bankar reh jaate hai
Girre hue aasunyon ke katre ... vapas nahi uthaye ja sakte
Prithviraj woh tairakh hai joh nadi naale nahi ... sailaabi dariya leharon se khelta hua paar kar jaata hai
Main toh tumhe apni rani bana loonga ... agar tumne meri baat nahi maani toh zabardasti gale lagake tumhe pani pani kar doonga
Khandaan, maan maryada, shaan-o-shaukat, rutba aur vakaar ... sadiyo ki mehnat aur mushakat ke pasine aur zindagi ki kash-ma-kash ke baad banta hai
Khoon ke rishtey kabhi saboot ke ghulam nahi hua karte
Aaj ka daur mazdooron ka daur hai ... aur aaj ka mazdoor apne paon ki thokaron se bade bade badshahon ki taqdeer likhta bhi hai ... aur mitata bhi hai
Nadi shokh, chanchal aur khoobsurat hoti hai ... lekin badnaseeb insaan ki gandagi is mein behti rehti hai
Aag aur barood se doosre toh darr sakte hai ... lekin mohabbat nahi darrti
Mera farz is vardi ka mohtaj nahi hai ... yeh vardi toh mehaz ek mayaan hai jis mein main apne farz ki talwar mehfooz rakhta hoon
Jis din kisi ghar ki deewaron ke kaan nikal aate hai ... us din us ghar ki buniyaad mein dimak lag jaati hai
Shaadi karne ka sirf ek hi faiyda hai ... ki agar aadmi markar narak mein bhi jaaye ... toh lagta hai swarg mein aa gaya
Tum gareeb ki izzat cheen sakte ho ... uski kismat nahi

Pati ek bank balance hota hai, ek tijori hota hai ... jis mein se paise nikaal nikaalkar gehne banwao, sareeyan khareedo, mauj karo mauj ... lekin unka dil rakhne ke liye kabhi unka sar dabao, kabhi unke pair dabao ... haala ki dil toh karta hai ki unka gala dabao, taaki jhanjhat hi khatam
Achchi soorat bhi kya buri shai hai ... jisne daali buri nazar daali
Aadmi ke dil aur maut ka koi bharosa nahi hai ... kab, kispar, kis waqt aa jaye time nikalke ... bata nahi sakta
Duniya mein bhale aadmi sirf do hai ... ek woh joh mar gaya aur doosra woh joh abhi pehda hi nahi hua
Duniya ke rachaita Brahma ne har insaan ka bhagya likhkar hi usse is duniya mein bheja hai ... sukh aur dukh uske zaroori ang hai ... is baat ko samajhkar joh jeeye us hi ka naam zindagi hai
Hindustani nariyan joh hoti hai chikni machliyon ki tarah hoti hai ... haath se phisal jaati hai
Insaan chahe zaalim ho ya masoom ... woh atyachar karne ke liye bandook uthaye ya atyachar mitaane ke liye ... kanoon ki nazaron mein mujrim ban jaata hai
Aag petrol ko nahi chhodti ... nevla saanp ko nahi chhodta ... aur jab main paison ka hisaab jodhta hoon toh main apne baap ko nahi chhodta
Joh main dikhai deta hoon woh main nahi hoon ... aur joh hoon woh dikhai nahi deta

Meri aankhon ko gaur se dekh ... in mein tujhe teri chitta ki jalti hui aag dikhai degi ... tujhe teri astiyon ki raakh dikhai degi ... teri zindagi ko maine jis khaak mein mila diya tujhe woh khaak dikhai degi
Kisi ke kaan mein heera, kisi ki aankh mein heera ... mujhe heeron se kya lena, mera mehboob hai heera
Ladki ke dil mein vishvas ka diya jalane ke liye sirf Shammi Kapoor style mein ganaa gana kaafi nahi hota ... Dilip Kumar aur Raaj Kumar ki tarah emotional scene bhi karne padte hai
Hamari nazaren hamesha aasmaan ke sitaaron pe rehti hai ... zameen ki dhool hum mein pasand nahi
Joh samundar mein gotha lagate hai woh bheegkar jaate hai ... aur joh bar mein aate hai woh do-do peg peekar jaate hai
Lover ko pareshan karna Hindustani nariyon ki adayen hoti hai
Bure waqt se badi khatarnak koi cheez nahi hai is duniya mein
Main jis file ko kholta hoon na ... woh mujrim ko jail mein bandh karne ke baad hi bandh karta hoon
Kagaz phadne se likhai mitt sakti hai lekin sachai nahi
Raajneeti ke mandi mein joh sabse sasti cheez bikti hai ... woh hai police
Aankh ka andha toh laathi ka sahara lekar tedhe-medhe raaston par bhi chal sakta hai ... lekin akal ka andha seedhe raaste par bhi thokar ka jaata hai
Hum hai police ki naak ke baal, insaaf ki dhaal, havaldar Bankelal ... chal do rupai nikaal
Jab hum pehda hue the toh raat ke barah bajhe the ... aur raat ke barah bajhe sirf shaitan pehda hua karte hai
Gunahghar us waqt tak mashoor rehta hai jab tak police dheel deti hai ... lekin jab police kanoon ki rassi kheenchti hai toh bade bade mujrimon ke gale mein phasi ka phanda hota hai
Main bhi kitna harami hoon, dono taraf dhol bajhata hoon ... udhar se maal kamata hoon, idhar se naam kamata hoon
Yahan ki fikar wahan ka khayal rakha hai ... badi ada se dono jahan sambhal rakha hai
Doobara is basti mein Baba Bhatti jab aayega toh zulm ki woh haddi bankar aayega ... joh tumhare gale mein aaise phasegi ... ki na tum usse nighal sakoge, na tum usse ughal sakoge
Meri fitrat hai goongo se bulvana, bhairon ko sunane ke liye majboor kar dena aur jhooton ki zubaan se sach ughalvana

Pachees se tees baras tak ki umar ka pyar ... pukhta, sanjeeda, kisi bade maidan ke seene par behte hue dariya ki tarah gambhir aur shaant hota hai ... aur bees se ekkees ki umar mein ... kisi oonchi pahadi se girta hua apsar ki tarah gungunata hua, athkeliyan sa karta hua ... aur pandra se solah ki umar mein ... paakh, bechain, apne ird-gird ki har cheez se laparwah ... bilkul aapki tarah
Dushman ko maarne ke liye hosh aur awaaz chahiye ... josh aur junoon nahi

Insaan ko zindagi mein sab kuch mil toh nahi jaata ... tamannayein toh bahut hoti hai lekin sabhi poori nahi hoti ... fark sirf itna hai ki kuch log aansoon bahakar jeete hai aur kuch log apne dil ka dard chupakar jeete hai
Balle O balle ... mujrimon ki anjar panjar dhille ... mooh peele te kapde geele
Hamara yaar toh kanoon ke liye jeeta hai ... vardi ke andar kanooni cheetah hai
Paon utne hi phailane chahiye jitni chaddar ho ... aur farz bhi utna hi nibhana chahiye jitni uski hadh ho
Mera usool hai joh kanoon todne ki koshish kare uska haath todh doon ... joh kanoon ko challenge kare uske jabde todh doon ... taaki woh phir kabhi kanoon todne ki jurrat na kare
Jazbaat ki chhot aur dil ka ghaav bahut gehra hota hai ... bahut dard hota hai us mein
Duniya mein insaan sirf apne liye pehda nahi hua hai ... doosron ke liye jeekar dekho ... zindagi ka matlab samajh jaogi
Hum mein toh apno ne loota, gairon mein kahan dum tha ... meri kishti thi doobi wahan, jahan pani kam tha
Yeh desh sirf do hi logon pe hasta hai ... hijhron par aur hum policewaalon par ... kyun ki nah hi woh kuch kar sakte hai, aur nah hi hum kuch kar sakte hai
Dilwale toh bahut dekhe, lekin pyar mein joh pagal ho jaye ... aise dilwale ko aaj pehli baar dekha
Hum Hindustani policewaale jahanum tak us shaksh ka peecha nahi chhodte ... joh is vardi ki beizzati karta hai
Yeh aankhen, yeh chehra, yeh noor ... insaan ho ya pari ho tum
Mujhe aaina na dikhao, ismein koi pagal nazar aata hai ... yeh main nahin, ismein sara jahan nazar aata hai
Pyar toh usne kiya, humne to bas dillagi ki
Mohabbat mere dost, aag bhi lagati hai un dilon ko ... jin mein mohabbat ke chirag jalte hai
Yeh duniya hum mein milne nahi degi ... lekin main bhi ab is duniya ko jeene nahi doonga
Main bahar dhamki dekar aaya hoon ki joh aadmi pehle andar aayega ... main uski taange todh doonga
Amir toh duniya mein nafrat hi faylata hai ... par gareeb pyar laata hai
Uska toh main aisa hashar karoonga ... ki sunne waalo ki rooh kaanp uthegi
Humne wahan apna khoon bahaya jahan tera pasina nikla ... bade bhai se bhi badhkar samjha tujhe ... par saale tu toh bada kamina nikla
Isne tumhe dekha angle badal badalke ... aur tumne isse maara sandal badal badalke
Jhoot ek vaishaya ki tarah hai ... jisse lakh parde mein rakho, magar uski asliyat nahi chupti
Woh copy hi kya jiska koi cover na ho ... aur woh ladki hi kya jiska koi lover na ho
Woh mooch hi kya jisse phera na jaye ... aur woh husn hi kya jisse cheda na jaye
Jhoot ke haathon se khodi gayi kabar mein sachchai dafnayi nahi jayegi
Court ka ghar mein deri hai ... magar Bandra aur Andheri nahi
Daulat itni daulatmand nahi joh sacha pyar khareed sake
Ekka bhale hi sabse bada ho ... magar rani hamesha raja ki hoti hai
Falak ko zid hai jahan bijliyan girane ki ... hum mein bhi zid hai wahin apna aashiyan banane ki
Judai ke dard ka mol kabhi chukaya nahi ja sakta ... usse sirf samjha jaata hai
Main tumhe bada aadmi samajhta tha ... magar tum sirf amir nikle ... main tumhe apna bhai samjha ... magar tum sirf is shehar ke bhai nikle
Mere do do baap ... mere do do baap!
Aapki kalai ka naap le raha tha ... hathkadi ka order dene ke liye
Main marne se nahi darta ... is liye ki maut is zindagi se zyada bhayanak nahi ho sakti
Zaroori nahi hai ki jail mein rehne waala har insaan ... mujrim hota hai
Bhale zindagi mein mujhe koi medal na mile ... magar main is medal lagne waale vardi par, ek medal jitna chota daag bhi lagne nahi doonga
Jurm hi uska pesha hai ... aur daulat uska dharm
Saanp ke bil mein haath dalne waala ... uska zeher bhi uttarna jaanta hai
Log kehte hai khoobsurat ladkiyan jab jhoot bolti hai ... toh aur bhi khoobsurat lagti hai
Kyun ... hum aapke hain kaun?
Aaj pehli baar koi ladki ... hamari car ke front seat pe behti hai
Zindagi ki khasiyat hai yeh kabhi jhukti nahi ... saanse ruk jati hai magar zindagi rukti nahi
Roop rang mein gori ho chahe kaali ho ... khushnaseeb woh jija hai jiski saali ho

Bane chahe dushman zamana hamara, salamat rahe dostana hamara ... na bechre marke bhi hum doston, hum mein dosti ki kasam doston ... pata koi pooche toh kehte hai hum, ek dujhe ke dil mein rehte hai hum ... nahi aur koi thikana hamara, salamat rahe dostana hamara
Jab hum aapse kuch poochna chahe toh aap hum mein rokti hai ... aur jab chup ho jaye toh tokti hai
Arre kaka main toh kaka ban gaya
Jitni himmat mujh mein goli chalane ki hai ... usse kahi zyada himmat goli khane ki hai
Sher jab ghayal ho jaata hai ... toh shikari ke liye maut ban jaata hai
Tutisha ka record hai ... uske tamachon ke nishaan gaal par se mitt jaate hai ... lekin dimaag par se nahi mittate
Hamare dhande mein dushman khatam nahi hote ... mehmaano ki tarah ek jaata hai toh doosra chala aata hai

Avesh ho ya dukh ho, gussa ho ya khushi ... apni bhavnaon ko paanch minute tak roke rakho ... un paanch minuton mein mann shaant ho jayega ... aur shaant mann se lena waala har ek faisla achcha hi hoga
Pyar mein woh divya shakti hai joh patthar ko bhi maum bana de
Jab tumhari bhatakti hui rooh tumhare mulk pahunche ... toh ek ek shaitan se kehna ki dobara hamare desh ki taraf aankhen uthane ki jurrat na kare
Uthho jawaan-e-watan, bandhe huye sar se kafan ... uthho dakkhan ki aur se, Gang-o-Jaman ki aur se ... Punjab ke dil se uthho, Satluj ke sahil se uthho ... awaaz do hum ek hai, hum ek hai, hum ek hai
Yeh thappad tune mujhe nahi apni naukri ke mooh par maara hai ... apne khandan ke ek ek aadmi ki khushiyon par maara hai ... apni zindagi par maara hai
Ek baar jab rishtey kho jaate hai ... toh woh dhoondne se bhi nahi milte
Girte hain sher savaar hi maidan-e-jung mein ... woh tiflya kya girega joh ghutno ke bal chale
Jahan kanoon ke haath pahunchne mein der ho jaye ... wahan kanoon ki laat pahunch jaya karti hai
Kuch parinde aaise bhi hote hai joh halaat ke pinjre mein qaid toh hote hai magar majboor nahi hote ... unki baazuon mein itni taqat hoti hai ki woh pinjra samet udh jaate hai
Kathin pariksha mein pass ho jaana meri buri aadat hai

Jab dus kamine marte hai toh ek kutta pehda hota hai ... jab sau kutte marte hai toh ek soovar pehda hota hai ... aur jab ek hazaar soovar marte hai toh ek bhadwa pehda hota hai ... aur jab ek lakh bhadwe marte hai tab tujh jaisa ek ganda neta pehda hota hai

Yeh bhashan nahi yeh meri warning hai ... aur meri warning tumhare is cigarette case ke upar likhi hui warning ki tarah nahi ... jisse tum bhoolkar cigarette ke kash lagaya karte ho ... meri warning kanoon ke kitaab ke us full stop ki tarah hai ... jiske baad kuch bhi karne ya sochne ki jagah nahi bachti
Agar tu ghar mein chupa raha toh chuhe ki maut maara jayega ... aur agar bahar nikal aaya toh geedar ki maut ... bol tujhe kaunsi maut chahiye?
Vidyarthi woh hote hai joh vidya ka arth nikaalte hai ... magar aap log toh vidya ki arthi nikaal rahe hai
Aadmi ke paas jis prakaar ka astra shastra ho ... ussi prakaar ka yudh ladna chahiye ... tabhi usko safalta milti hai
Main tumhare jism ko vardi ki jagah zakhmon ka libaaz pehna doonga ... aur phir tum dard se itna tadpoge ke uske baad maut ko bhi chakhoge toh yahi kahoge ke ... maaza nahi aaya
Duty ek aaisi cheez hai joh kabhi kabhi rote huye bhi nibhani padti hai
Joh log waqt ke dhaare mein kagaz ki naav ki tarah beh jaate hai ... unhe ek mamuli si lehar bhi dooba deti hai
Imaandari woh ganja sar hai jispar noton ke baal kabhi ugh hi nahi sakte ... thodi si baimaani ki tel ki malish karte rehna chahiye
Log toh sirf rupaiya aur izzat par daaka dalte hai ... magar tumne hamare vishvas par daaka daala hai
Woh shaadi hi kya teri dawat nahi jis mein ... aur woh aag hi kya teri soorat nahi jis mein
Mere nasson mein khoon ke saath saath barood bhi behta hai ... aur aaj tujhe is barood ke dhamake bhi sunne padenge
Joh imaandaron se gaddari karega ... woh gaddaron se imaandari karega
Tumhe is baat ka koi haq na pahunchta ki police ki farz ki Ganga joh ki kanoon ki Gangotri se nikalti hai ... usse tum apni gandi aadaton ke gutter mein dal do
Jab logon ki bahaduri baanjh ho jaati hai ... tabhi Kapali jaise gunde pehda hote hai
Tum meri zindagi mein full stop toh kya comma bhi nahi laga sake ... lekin main tumhari zindagi mein full stop zaroor lagaonga
Har woh kadam joh kanoon todne ke liye aage badega ... main usse apahij kar doonga
Zaat duniya mein sirf do tarah ki hoti hai ... ek woh joh aasoon peeta hai, ek woh joh khoon peeta hai ... ek woh joh insaaniyat ko aabad karta hai, ek woh joh insaaniyat ko barbaad karta hai
Tum ghadi ki keemat toh jaante ho ... magar waqt ki keemat nahi jaante
Chola aur kursi badal jaane se aadmi ki janam kundli nahi badalti
Main nafrat ke mohron se dushmani ka shatranj ussi ki bisaat pe khelonga ... aur aaisi maat doonga, aaisi maat doonga ki maut bhi roo padegi
Agar aap log yeh chahte hai ... ki aap logon ki khuddi ko mittane ke liye agar gundon ki khudai bhi aa jaye aur mitta na sake ... toh aap logon ko khuddar banna padega
Jab shehar ki taqdeer harami ho jaati hai ... tab Kapali jaisa ek haramzada pehda hota hai
Gundon ka rakhail kabhi gareebon ka rakhwaala nahi ban sakta
Kutte ki tarah jeene ki aadat padhi hai sabko
Aa gaye meri maut ka tamasha dekhne
Saale apne khud ke desh mein ek sui nahin bana sakte ... aur hamara desh todne ka sapna dekhte hain
Yeh Musalman ka khoon yeh Hindu ka khoon ... bata is mein Musalman ka kaunsa Hindu ka kaunsa, bata!
Upar waala bhi upar se dekhta hoga toh usse sharam aati hogi ... sochta hoga maine sabse khoobsurat cheez banayi thi, insaan ... neeche dekha toh sab keede ban gaye ... keede!
Hum bhale hi upar waale ko alag alag naam se pukarte hai ... lekin hamara dharam ek hai mazhab ek hai ... insaniyat
Tumse toh woh vaishyan achchi hoti hai joh bechti zaroor hai, magar apna jism bechti hai ... apne desh ko, apni aatma ko, apne imaan ko nahi bechti
Hum tumhe aaise jalayenge ... ke tere chahne waalo ko Ganga mein bahane ke liye teri raakh bhi naseeb nahi hogi
Insaaf nahi mangne se milta hai aur nahi cheenne se ... aaj toh insaaf bikta hai, sirf bikta hai
