Kabhi veerane the, abhi gul-o-gulzaar nazar aate hai ... badle badle dar-o-deewar nazar aate hai
Yeh ek aam aadmi ka khoon hai ... yeh jab behta hai, toh achche achchon ki kundli palat deta hai
Main itni oonchai par khada hoon ... ki mujhe dekhne ke liye gardan itni oonchi uthani padti hai ... ki reed ki haddi toot jaati hai
Agar yeh haath gunahon ke khaatme ke liye uthe ... toh inki pakad mein sabse pehli gardan teri hogi
Yeh khoon gaur se dekh ... yeh khoon nahi tezaab hai tezaab ... zameen pe gira iska ek ek katra, ek jwalamukhi ko janam deta hai
Tera aakhri faisla meri adalat mein hone waala hai ... jahan ka vakil bhi main hoon, gawah bhi, judge bhi ... aur tujhe phasi dene waala jallad bhi
Jab hum kisi ko retire karte hai toh woh seedha upar chala jaata hai
Tu ek aaisa shaitaan hai jisse upar waale ne galati se insaan ki shakal mein neeche bhej diya ho
Aaj kal sunne mein aa raha hai ... ke vilayat se yeh maal aa raha hai, vilayat ko woh maal ja raha hai ... arre kisi ko hosh hai ki Bharat varsh kahan ja raha hai
Khel mein apni chaal ke saath saath dushman ki chaal pe bhi nazar rakhni chahiye
Maine tumhe apne dil mein qaid kar rakha hai aur us dil ki chabi us samundar mein phekh di hai
Main Trishanku ki tarah hoon ... chahe mere haath pair cheer daalo, tukde tukde kar dalo ... main phir ek ho jaonga ... yahi meri fitrat hai
Thane mein daayan pair aage rakho toh kehte hai tumhare baap ka ghar hai ... aur baayan rakho toh kehte hai bura shagun hai
Tumhare aur hamare beech sirf ek hi cheez ka batwara ho sakta hai ... aur woh hai tumhare hisse ki maut
Baap ke kandhe ke barabar jab bete ka kandha ho jaata hai ... toh woh baap ki zimmedari aur jawabdari dono ka bhoj uthane ke kabil ho jaata hai

Bambai mein kaam kam hota hai hartaalein zyada hoti hai ... kabhi taxi waalon ki hartaal, kabhi bus waalon ki hartaal, kabhi mill waalon ki hartaal ... aur kabhi hartaal ka kaaran na milne par hartaal ko practice karne ki hartaal

Hamare raston par charon taraf petrol hi petrol bicha hua hai ... kaun, kab mauke ka fayda uthakar uspar jalti hui maachis uchaal de ... aur kis modh par hamari zindagi ka safar khatam ho jaye ... yeh hum bhi nahi jaante
Kal yeh inaam dekh sari duniya baimaan ho jayegi ... toh harjai ko yakeen hai, kal sari khudai be-imaan ho jayegi
Tu toh meri umeedon ka junction hai ... dil se dil ka relation hai, connection hai, attraction hai, action hai, reaction hai ... yane ki tu meri mohabbat ka main station hai
Shaq ka kaante bahut zeharilay hote hai ... joh do dilon ke beech dooriyan bhi pehda kar dete hai aur dushmani bhi
Pehankar police ki yeh vardi hum ghalib tamasha-e-ahle-karam dekhte hai ... chaman ko ujhadte kahi baar dekha, par aaj is club ka hashar dekhte hai
Baimaani ke dhande mein imaandari se kaam nahi karne waalon ka anjaam bahut bhayanak hota hai
Aadmi janam se juari hota hai ... taqdeer ki baat hai ki kuch log jua mein sab kuch haar jaate hai aur kuch log crorepati ban jaate hai
Har crorepati apni zindagi ek rupai se shuru karta hai ... aur har bikhari bhi
Ek maa ke dil se nikli hui dua ... uske bete ko zameen se aasman ki bulandi tak pahuncha sakti hai ... aur ussi maa ke dil se nikli hui baddua ... tere in mahalon ko jalakar raakh bhi kar sakti hai
Do kisam ke log zaroorat se zyada imaandari ka dhol peetate hai ... ek woh joh imaandar hote hai aur doosre woh joh puri tarah se baimaan hote hai
Aksar business mein pehli galati aakhri galati ban jaati hai
Rehmat-e-khuda ki jis par ho barasti ... uski kya mitta sakega koi hasti
Nishana meri pistol ka hi nahi ... meri dimaag ki soch ka bhi bahut pakka hai
Agar upar waale ne maut likhi hai toh zindagi kuch nahi kar sakti ... aur agar zindagi likhi hai toh maut kuch nahi kar sakti
Is umar mein aaisa hi hota hai ... dil atak jaata hai, mamla khatak jaata hai aur neeyat phisal jaata hai
Musibaton ka saamna himmat se karna chahiye ... aasunyon se nahi
Mera naam hai Ghorpade ... aur mere samne achche achche ghidpade
Agar mujhe woh heere nahi mile ... toh main tum dono ko zameen mein aadha zinda ghaadkar ... aadha hissa bomb se uda doonga
Bhagwan jiske chehre pe aankhen nahi deta ... uske dil mein aankhen de deta hai
Wafaadari par note ke dher lagata hoon ... toh gaddari pe gaddaron ke seene par maut ke medal bhi laga deta hoon
Kabhi kabhi bachcho ko samjhane ke liye khud bachcha banna padta hai
Yehi toh problem hai aaj kal ke young logon ke saath ... kaam chor bann gaye ho, kaam chor
Har ek aashiq ke dil mein darr hai apna ... ki har mashooq ab dilbar hai apna ... hatheli par liye phirte hai sar hum ... haseeno ke dilon mein ghar hai apna
Is dharti par paapi pehda toh hote hai ... lekin un paapiyon ka anth karne waalon ko yeh dharti maa pehle hi janam de chuki hoti hai
Jab khoon tapakta hai toh jamm jaata hai ... apna nishaan chhod jaata hai ... aur phir cheek cheekar pukarta hai ki mera inteqam lo, mera inteqam lo
Delhi jeetne se zyada mushkil hota hai kisi ka dil jeetna
Agar dil mein hai mohabbat toh izhaar kyun nahi karte ... mere pyar se nahi jab inkaar toh ikraar kyun nahi karte
Har aakhri shabd ke baad ek full stop hota hai ... aur woh full stop hum hai
Deewane aashiq zindagi ka saath chhodte hai ... lekin haath nahi chhodte
Jab jab dharti par paap badha ... tab tab uska vinaash karne ke liye swayam Krishna ne janam liya
Jis tarah bina sone ke zevar nahi ban sakta ... us hi tarah bina pitte koi aashiq nahi ban sakta
CID waale shaq ke dhaagon se hi yakeen ka ghar banate hai ... joh baad mein mujrim ke liye qaid khana ban jaata hai
Manju ... mere khawabon ki rani, mere pyar ki nishani, meri mohabbat ki biryani
Idhar ja rahe ho yah udhar ja rahe ho ... kidhar bhi ja rahe ho ... sab raasta God ke paas jata hai
Yahin kahin aas paas koi saala bahut sad hai re ... very sad, very sad
Arrey tu sad hota hai na ... main double sad hota hai re
Humko maloom hai heaven bahut beautiful jagah hai ... par wahan jaane ka humko itna jaldi nahi hai
Note mat karo, feel it ... feel karo, feel karo
Jaldi mein ho yah deri mein ho ... aadmi ko apna manners kabhi nahi bhoolna chahiye
Tumko meetha sochna bhi mana hai
Insaaf na kanoon de sakta hai na police ... agar koi insaaf de sakta hai ... to ek insaan doosre insaan ko de sakta hai
Itni si umar aur itne jurm?
Aap kaam karte rahe ... aur main sota raha, sota raha, sota raha
Zindagi ke har natak mein ek hota hai nayak ... aur ek hota hai khalnayak
Har khalnayak mein ek nayak chupa hua hota hai
Hota hai, chalta hai, duniya hai
Aurat ka dil toh itna vishal hota hai ... ki sari duniya ki khushi us mein samaa jaye
Dosti bhulayi ja sakti hai ... dushmani nahi
Dushmani ki talvar ki dhaar ek taraf nahi hoti hai ... dono taraf hoti hai
Jab khushi itni zyada hoti hai ki dil mein nahi samaa paati ... toh aankhon se jhalak jaati hai
Maut toh har kisi ko aati hai ... nahi aati toh bas pyar ko maut nahi aati ... kabhi nahi aati
Insaan halaat ke bas mein hota hai ... halaat insaan ke bas mein nahi hote hai
Meetha bol bada anmol!
Main gareebi ka woh nivala hoon ... joh amir ke gaale mein atak jaye toh uska halak cheer ke rakh de
Ittihas yeh nahi dekhta kya sahi tha, kya galat ... kya mushkil tha, kya aasaan ... yaad toh yahi reh jaata hai ki kaun jeeta aur kaun haara
Shaheedon ke mazaaron par diye zaroor jalte hai ... lekin unke gharon mein choolay tak nahi jalte
Zindagi kisi ek ke ho jaane ka naam hai ... kisi ko lootne ka nahi ... kisi pe lut jaane ka naam hai
Maal hai aur malamaal bhi hai!
Mehfil lagi hai yahan mohabbat karne waalon ki ... koi lutta hai toh koi lootta hi hai ... dilon ke khel mein aksar kahin na kahin sheesha tootta hi hai
Zindagi maaze lene ka naam hai ... kuch dene ka naam hai ... aur bahut kuch lene ka naam hai
Deewane se deewangi ka sabak na poochna ... woh khud nahi jaanta ki woh deewana kyun hai
Tumhare haathon ke upar aur haath hai ... aur un haathon ke upar aur kahi haath hai ... aur in sab haathon ki dor mere haath mein hai
Aaj ke zamane mein izzat ussi ki hai ... joh ya toh kisi ka kuch bighad sakta ho ya phir savaar sakta ho
Agar mere bhai ke jism par itni si bhi kharash aayi na ... toh main tumhara aur tumhare bhaiyon ka woh haal karoonga ... ki poore shehar ki police tum logon ke mooh par thookna bhi pasand nahi karegi
Aapke facing, dressing, cutting sab kuch dekh ke mujhe ho raha hai doubting ... issi liye keh diya auraton ko no outing
Pehle tolo ... phir bolo!
Kuch nashe aaise hote hai joh kiye nahi jaate ... ho jaate hai
Aadmi aur aadmi ki badnaami mein koi farak nahi hota ... aadmi pehda hota hai, badnaami janam leti hai ... aadmi bada ho jaata hai, badnaami bhi badi ho jaati hai
Ek dushman ko doosre dushman se lada dena chahiye ... nuksaan chahe kisi ka bhi ho ... fayda hamesha hamara hota hai
Toote hue rishtey aur toote hue dhaage ko jaldi ma jodne ki koshish nahi karni chahiye ... gaanth padh jaye toh umar bhar chubti rehti hai
Roh aur roh, zor zor se roh, tab tak roti raho ... jab tak tumri awaaz dharti aur akash ke beech ki har cheez ko hilla na de
Koi nahi hoga beghar jab talak zinda hai Amar ... maut jise dhoondti hai dar-badar, log usse kehte hai baazigar

Bhagwan rehta hai mandir mein, woh uska ghar hai ... panchi rehte hai amber mein, kyun ki woh unka ghar hai ... amir aadmi rehta hai mehalon mein, kyun ki woh uska ghar hai ... toh phir itni badi duniya mein ek gareeb aadmi kahan rahega?
Pyar ke khatir usko bhi chhodna padta hai ... jiske bina jee nahi sakte
Shuruvat mein hi anth chupa hota hai
Yahan koi kisi ke liye kuch nahi chhodta ... sab kisi na kisi ko chhodkar aage badh jaate hai
Maut se woh log darte hai jinka zindagi se koi rishta ho ... mera toh sirf ek hi rishta hai ... jis se mujhe maut hi mila sakti hai
Len-den mein pehle baad mein nahi hota ... is haath le, us haath de
Mujhko meri awaaz sunai nahi deti ... kaisa yeh mere jism mein ek shor macha hai
Tum woh badnaseeb aurat ho joh pati ke hote hue patni na ban saki ... aulad ke hote hue maa na ban saki ... nawasi ke hote hue nani na ban saki

column2: Roop Ki Rani Choron Ka Raja
column3: Maut ka intezaar maut se kahin zyada bhayanak hota hai

column2: Roop Ki Rani Choron Ka Raja
column3: Mehnat, lagan aur akalmandi ke saath joh baimaani ki jaye ... us baimaani ka duniya ke tamaam imaandar milkar bhi kuch nahi bighad sakte
Sainik hona ek desh ka sipahi hona hi nahi hai ... sainik hona ek shahadat hai, ek qurbani hai, balidaan hai ... aur sainik ke ghar waale sainik se bhi badhe shaheed hote hai
Aap iske khandan ke baare mein nahi jaante ... iska par-dada 009, iska dada 008, iska baap 007  aur yeh zero zero chakka (006) hai
Sirf siddhant ke bal par raajneeti nahi chalti ... iske liye stithi ko samajhna zaroori hai, samay ki chaal ko pehchanna zaroori hai
Raajneeti asambhav ko sambhav bana dene ki kala hai
Aurat woh khushboo hai joh aadmi ki zindagi ko mehka deti hai
Sirf guru hi shishya ko sabak nahi sikha sakta ... waqt padne par shishya bhi guru ko sabak sikha sakta hai
Aadmi pyar chahta hai, aadmi pyar karna chahta hai, pyar paana chahta hai
Agar aurat na hoti ... toh saare mard rishi hote, gyani hote
Aurat nark ka dwar hoti hai
Duniya mein koi aisa insaan nahi hai jise kabhi galati na ho ... lekin sahi insaan woh hai joh sahi waqt par galati ka paschatap karle
Apne ghar mein diya jalane ka matlab yeh nahi ke saare jag mein ujyala ho gaya
Ek ladki ke jazbaat ko theek se wohi samajh sakta hai ... jisne duniya dekhi hai, zindagi dekhi hai, zindagi ke utaar-chadao dekhe hai
Stree maya hai, moh hai, andhakar hai
Pyar dhan, daulat, khandan nahi ... sirf dil dekhta hai
I am a king without a kingdom
Tabaahi ki aandhi aur barbaadi ke toofan ka naam hai Chikara
Woh dil le gayi ek baar dekhkar ... hum kuch na kar paaye lagatar dekhkar
Main zindagi mein bahut kam faisle karta hoon ... lekin ek baar faisla kar loon toh woh pahaad se bhi zyada atal hota hai
Tum jaise logon ko ek baar maaf karna ... doosri baar galati karne ka mauka dena hai

Hum jaise lakhon naujawanon ke bhavishya ke liye, is samaaj ki bhalai ke liye, saare desh ki ekta ke liye ... tum jaise log cancer ho ... sharafat ke libaas mein chupe hue gunde ho ... jinhone aaj ke is raaj ko bana diya hai goondaraaj

America ki police ko khoon hone ke do ghante ke paschat pata chalta hai ... aur Roos ki police ko sadhe-teen ke paschat ... aur Cheen ki police ko che ghante ke pashcat ... magar hamari police ko khoon hone ke chaubees ghante pehle pata hota hai ki ... kab, kahan, kis vyakti ka khoon hone waala hai ... aur kaunsa manushya is shubh kaarya ko sampan karne waala hai
Janam ka pata nau mahine pehle chal jaata hai ... magar marne ka pata nau second pehle bhi nahi chalta
Kriya karam ka samaan koi bhi khareed ke laye ... magar kaam uske aata hai jiska waqt aaya ho
Baap, baap hota hai ... beta dus janam lene ke baad bhi baap ka baap nahi ban sakta
Supari ka paisa kha jaane wale ko ... Shiva supari ki tarah kha jaata hai
Main apne shikaar ko kabhi sote hue nahi maarta ... jagakar maarta hoon ... taki marte waqt usse shikayat na rahe ke maine usse apni zindagi bachane ka mauka nahi diya
Aag, pani aur Bhaiji ke saath nahi khelna ... aag jalata hai, pani doobata hai aur Bhaiji tadpata hai
Kutte kabhi sher ka shikaar nahi karte ... sher jab dahadta hai toh kutte bhaukana bhool jaate hai
Joh Bhaiji ka parda phaash karta hai ... Bhaiji uske pet ka parda phaad dalta hai
Tujhe aaisi maut doonga ... ki teri kriya-karam ke liye tujhe kisi cheez ki zaroorat na padhe
Tujhe imaandari ki khujli lag gayi hai ... zindagi bhar khujate khujate mar jayega ... lekin haath tere kuch nahi aayega
Janbaaz kalakaron se nahi hai duniya khali ... is mard ke liye bajao ek baar zordar taali

Jab apne hi ghar mein ghumshuda naujawan ladka tanhaiyon sargoshiyan karta dikhai de ... jab kisi se baat karte hue uske alfaaz uska saath dene se inkar karde ... kisi ki yaad uski masroofiyat ban jaaye toh samjho ... he is in love
Mummy daddy meri shaadi karva rahe hai ... Sunday ko ladke waale ghar aa rahe hai ... meri baraat mein tum bhi aao ... koi pyara sa tofha lao ... jee na jalao
Yeh daur patthar khane waale Majnu ka nahi ... yeh daur us aashiq ka hai joh apni mehbooba ke liye seene par goliyan kha jaye
Hum us desh ke waasi hai jis desh mein Ganga behti hai ... aur jis desh mein bahu apne saas sasur ke samne sar par pallu daal ke rehti hai
Wah, kya saas ho tum ... abhi tak bahu ke haath ki mehandi nahi chhooti ... aur tumne apna rang dikhana shuru kar diya
Aye buddhe ... pet mein aant nahi hai, mooh mein daant nahi hai ... chumma lega?
Khud laat marte ho aur mujhe gadha kehte ho?
Tu mera dulha toh kya ... kisi ka dalaal banne ke layak bhi nahi hai
Aaj ke baad woh jagega toh maa kahega, soyega toh maa kahega, jeeyega toh maa kahega ... aur marega tab bhi maa kahega
Maine bhi tum logon ka tel nahi nikaal diya ... toh main bhi apne baap ki beti nahi
Hum toh gulaab lene gaye the ... yahan toh guldasta hi haath mein aa gaya
Malik banna hai toh kheto mein kaam kar ... kyun ki asli khazana kitaabon mein nahi, zameen mein chupa hai beta
Saabit kar diya tune aaj ... ki mujh jaisi nagin ki kokh se ... tujh jaisa sapola hi paida ho sakta hai
Itna roye, itna roye ... laga jaise municipality ka gutter phat gaya ho
Insaan toh waqt ki tarah hota hai ... badalte hi rehta hai
Log pyar mein zindagi haar jaate hai, aap ek inkaar se haar gaye?
Ek maa jise doodh pilati hai ... uske saaye tak ko pehchanti hai
Alla re alla inspector Bhinde alla ... haath mein leke kanoon ka tala
Zindagi toh dhoop chaon ki tarah hoti hai ... is mein agar bure log hai, toh achche log bhi hote hai
Jis bete ke sar par apni maa ka aashirwad ho ... usse tum jaise shaitan toh kya bhagwan bhi nahi maar sakte
Prem ki koi seema nahi hoti aur naa hi uska koi wazan hota hai ... prem ka koi hisaab kitaab nahi hota ... is liye toh kehte hai ki prem hi ishwar hai aur ishwar hi prem
Mujhpe aaisa aarop ... ab dekh mera prakop
Tum kya samajhte ho kanoon koi khilona hai, mujrimon ke samne bauna hai? ... arre ab toh wohi hoga joh hona hai
Atyachari, durachari ... tu jaanta hai main hoon bal-brahmachari
Lalach ki zameen par daulat ki fasal kabhi nahi ughti
Daulat insaan ki zaroorat hoti hai ... lekin agar woh kamzori ban jaye, toh phir musibat ban jaati hai
Pyar mohabbat ka rishta ... kisi pabandi ka mohtaj nahi hota
Kehte hai gusse mein ladki ki khubsoorati aur badh jaati hai
Adhikar maange se nahi milta ... usse cheenna padta hai
Shaitaan chahe mahal mein rahe yah jhopde mein ... woh shaitaan hi kehlata hai
Girne waala gehrai thodi dekhta hai
Daulat ki jung mein toh sab jayaz hai
Har kamyab insaan ke dushman zyada aur dost kam hote hai
Rupaiyon mein woh taqat hai ... ki imaandar se imaandar insaan ki bhi neeyat bighadte derr nahi lagti
Jumma aaye, jumma jaye ... lekin is chumme ki nishani kabhi na mitne paye
Jab jab dharm ki haani aur adharm ki vriddhi hoti hai ... tab tab swayam Sri Krishna ji kisi bhi roop mein aakar ... dushton ka naash aur sajjanon ki rashka karte hai
Tum toh aaise zaleel insaan ho ... ki tumhe agar munafa nazar aaye toh dharti maa toh kya ... tum toh apni sagi maa ko bhi bech doge
Duniya ki nazar mein mare hue log kabhi zinda nahi hote ... varna zindagi khud pareshaan ho jaati hai
Rasam nibhane ke liye havan mein ghee dalna hi padta hai ... lekin phir ussi aag se ghar bhi jalaya ja sakta hai
Mohabbat reet rivaaz nahi maanti ... aur na hi woh lafzo ki mohtaj hai
Yeh daulat bhi kya cheez hai ... jiske pass jitni bhi aati hai ... kam hi lagti hai
Main markar bhi na mar saka ... aur na hi jeekar jee sakta hoon
Waqt ke aage kisi ki nahi chalti ... isliye waqt par hi chod dijiye
Jitna bada aadmi, utna hi lamba intezaar
Har tawaif dalle se zyada pyar ke shabd se nafrat karti hai
Haar tab hoti hai jab haar maan li jaye
Bachchon ke liye kitaabein likhna bahut asaan hai ... magar unke liye loriyan gaana bahut mushkil hai
Sar par chhat ho na ho ... paon ke neeche ek zameen ka tudka toh chahiye
Dalle aur pille ke saath ek jaisa suluk karna chahiye ... agar baat se na maane, toh laat maarni chahiye
Aisa hamesha zaroori nahi hai ki jis raaste par maa baap chale ... ussi raaste par aulad bhi chale
Ladki aisi honi chahiye ... thodi si namkeen, thodi si khatti, thodi si meethi ... rang aisa ki chandni ki ujaale mein jaise thoda sa shaam ka andhera shamil ho
Pyar bheek se nahi milta
Khilono aur tohfo ki bachchon ko itni bhook nahi hoti jitni maa baap ke pyar ki
Jalan ka bhi mohabbat mein ek khaas maqam hai
Duniya mein tu aayi hai ashk peene ke liye ... muskurana hi padega tujhe jeene ke liye
Sharton par pyar nahi hota
Jhoot ka bhi rajneeti mein ek khaas maqam hai
Ishq ke saamne zamane waale haarte aaye hai
Khata ek pal ki hoti hai ... lekin uski sazaa saalon saal tak bhugatni padti hai

Race mein daudte waqt khiladi ke paon jitni tezzi se uthte aur girte hai ... utni hi tezzi se naachte waqt kisi tawaif ke paon uthte aur girte hai ... speed barabar hoti hai, par khiladi apni race jeet leta hai ... aur tawaif naachte naachte ek hi jagah par apna dum todh deti hai
Jaane kya badalon ke darmiyan saazish hui ... uska ghar mitti ka tha, uske hi ghar baarish hui
Yaadon ka insaan ki zindagi mein ek khaas maqam hai
Chor jab maal pakadta hai, toh usse tijori thodi yaad rehti hai?
Sharifon ka libaaz pehenne se ... awargi sharafat nahi ban jaati
Unke dekhne se joh aa jaati hai chehre pe raunak ... woh samajhte hai bimaar ka haal achcha hai
Jawani bhi aisi hi car hai jis mein brake nahi hota
Halaat ki majboori se agar insaan keechad mein gir jaaye ... toh uska khoon ganda nahi ho jaata
Yeh zindagi, milna bichadna ... sab lakeeron ka khel hai
Tune ek kadam bhi aage badhaya toh talwarein chal jayengi ... aur tere is saathi ki choti choti botiyan banke hawa mein bikhar jayengi

Chipkali ke bachche kabhi magarmach nahi ban sakte ... woh deewar par rhengte rhengte hi mar jaate hai
Mera naam hai Mahakaal ... Kali ka pujari hoon main ... libaz bhi kaala, dhanda bhi kaala aur dushmanon ko joh kafan pehnata hoon uska rang bhi kaala
Hum mein oonchi awaaz sunna bhi pasand nahi ... hamare samne joh oonchi awaaz mein bolta hai ... uski awaaz hamesha hamesha ke liye band kar di jaati hai
Hum toh woh bhanwar hai jis mein samundar ke samundar doob jaate hai
Krishna Prasad maut ki diary mein ek baar jiska naam likh deta hai ... usse yamraj bhi nahi mitta sakta
Meri pahunch Delhi se lekar shamshan ghat tak hai ... awaaz Delhi tak jaati hai aur dushman shamshan tak chala jaata hai

Is rishwat ke samaaj mein agar izzat ki zindagi guzarni hai ... toh apna seena cheerkar, apne zameer ka katal karke, apni rooh ko maarke ... uski laash ko rishwat ke kadmo mein dalna padta hai ... tab jaakar insaan yeh zindagi guzaar sakta hai
Ya rab kahin se ishq ka bazaar bhej de ... dil bechta hoon, koi khareedar bhej de
Tadbeer ki syahi se insaan apni taqdeer ki likhai ko badal sakta hai
Baimaani, kala bazaari, rishwatkhor log lakh gaaliyan sunkar bhi aasani se is duniya mein jee lete hai ... magar joh log sachche hote hai na ...  woh jhoote ilzaam ka ek shabd bhi nahi sun sakte hai
Pandhra saal ki padhai ke baad university yeh joh degree milne ka certificate deti hai na ... yeh naukri milne ka certificate nahi ... balki thokarein khane ka certificate hai
Is duniya mein agar koi sharif aadmi pakda jaye, toh usse bachane ke liye koi aage nahi aata hai ... lekin agar ek baimaan aadmi pakda jaye, toh usse bachane ke liye hazaaron aadmi khade ho jaate hai
Dukh ke andhere ka seena cheerne ke liye ... mann mein vishvas ke suraj ka hona bahut zaroori hai
Kaale bazaar ke andhere mein kisi ki shakal nazar nahi aati ... na kanoon ki, na sachchai ki, na rishteydaro ki aur na aulad ki
Meri maa ke haath ka banaya halwa ... ajab hai uska jalwa
Jis pyar ko samajhne ke liye shabdon ka sahara lena padta hai na ... woh pyar bahut kamzor hota hai
Aadmi jitna ganja hota hai, utna maaldaar hota hai
Pati patni saath rehte rehte ek doosre ko itni achchi tarah janne lag jaate hai ... ki ek doosre ke liye aaina ban jaate hai
Jab dil mein paap ka andhera ho ... toh koi bhi pooja, kaisi bhi prarthana ujaala nahi kar sakti
Chahe insaan ki gardan ho ya telephone ka taar ... katne mein zyada waqt nahi lagta
Beete dino ki yaad ka sahara toh tab liya jaata hai ... jab sirf yaadein hi reh gayi ho
Kis bedardi se ujhada hai mera chaman ... ab main kahan bechunga dal sabzi aur mutton
Galati toh har insaan se hoti hai ... par maafi ka asli haqdar wohi hota hai joh galati karke pachtaye
Pagalpan bahut khatarnak bimari hoti hai ... jisse ho jaye uske liye bhi aur auron ke liye bhi
Yeh shareer toh mitti ka bana hai ... agar is mein aatma na hoti toh kitna khokla hota
Mard ki nazron mein aurat ka waqt tab tak hi hota hai ... jab tak uska usse dil laga rahe
Mard ka dil aur uski aankhon ki sachchai ... us hi mein basti hai aur us hi mein barbaad ho jaati hai
Usse yeh kaho ki un raasto par chalna chhod de ... jahan par hamari hone waali bahu chalti hai
Katal karna hamara dhanda hai ... aur yeh kaam bhi hum muft nahi karte
Kal uske jism ki har haddi toot chuki hogi
Khwab aur hakikat mein jab bhi jung hoti hai ... khwab haar jaata hai
Hum uski woh beizzati karenge, woh beizzati karenge ... ki saale ki aane waali saath nasale beizzat pehda hongi
Gussa ek bahut badi daulat hoti hai ... usse bhi sooch samajhkar karch karna chahiye
Meri aadat hai, main jis cheez ko ek baar pasand karta hoon ... usse yah toh paa leta hoon ... yah usse is layak nahi chhodta ki woh kisi aur ke layak rahe
Is duniya mein sharifon ki bahumat hai ... lekin yeh sharif kuch hi gundon se sar jhukaye darr darr ke jeete hai
Abhi toh tamasha hoga ... bahut bada tamasha hoga
Aayenda uske aas paas bhi dhikai diya ... toh itni zor se maroonga ki thook bhi nahi ugal sakega

In sarmayedaron ne kanoon ki haisiyat us andhe bikhari ki tarah bana di hai ... jisse apna pet bharne ke liye saboot ki rotiyan chahiye ... phir kyun na woh paap ke aate se bani ho aur gunaah ki bhatti mein pakki ho
Tere is haramipan ki aaisi sazaa doonga ... ki cheel kauve bhi teri laash ko nahi nochenge

Tum sabne milkar apni maa ka dhoodh utna nahi peeya hoga ... jitna is kameez par mera khoon baha hai ... ab tumhare khoon mein maa ka doodh raha nahi ... is liye tumhe chatti ka doodh yaad dilane chala aaya hoon
Woh log jinke kandhon par insaaf aur kanoon ki imaaratein khadi hai ... unke apne hi pair paap ke dal-dal mein dhasse hue hai
Jism ki maut insaan ki maut nahi hoti
Election mein gareebo se vaade aur ameero se saude kiye jaate hai
Aadha sach jhoot se bhi zyada khatarnak hota hai
Itne baazu itne sar, ginle dushman dhyan se ... harega woh har baazi, jab khelein hum jee jaan se
Yeh woh zamanaa hai ki tum aahista se sach bologe, toh koi nahi manega ... aur zor se jhoot bologe, toh sab maan lenge
Raat ke sannate mein jab kisi bhooke bachche ke rone ki awaaz aati hai ... toh raat bahut kaali lagti hai
Tum is samaaj ke liye sivah maut aur andhere ke kuch nahi ho
Udaas hona, yun akele mein rona ... is injurious to health, sehat ke liye hanikarak hota hai
Dosti ka ek oosul hai madam ... no sorry, no thank you
Dosti ki hai nibhani toh padegi hi
Abhi mood nahin hai
Ek ladka ladki kabhi dost nahin hote
Aaj kal darwaaze pe knock karke aane ka zamaana nahin raha
Aaj kal darwaaze ko lock karke rakhne ka bhi zamaana nahin raha
Main tumhari yaadon ki mitti se tumhari murti banakar ... zindagi bhar uski puja karta rahoonga
Aapke haathon bikke hum, uski kudrat dekhiye ... baat ki sholon ki, aur khud pani pani ho gaye
Zindagi subah ki dhoop ki tarah phailti hai ... joh kal andhere mein tha woh tumhe aaj dikhai dene laga ... joh aaj ka andhera hai woh kal ki roshni ke saath door ho jayega
Jab sar ke upar se chatt aur pair ke neeche se naram carpet hat jayega ... tab pata chalega isse ki bahar ki duniya baap ka ghar nahi hai
Kabhi kabhi naam hona bhi badnaami ban jaata hai
Woh bank is duniya mein nahi bana joh pyar ki keemat ka cheque cash kara sake
Tumhara saath ho aur tumhare seene par mera sar ho toh ... aasman ki chatt aur zameen ka bistar hi kaafi hai mere liye
Pyar ki taqat mitti ko sona bana deti hai ... jisse duniya ki koi taqat mitta nahi sakti
Yeh dukh naam ki bimari ka ilaaj kisi doctor ke paas bhi nahi ... iska ilaaj khud dhoondna padta hai ... dukh ko bhoolna parta hai
Dhande mein koi kisika bhai nahi, koi kisika beta nahi
Apne saath kaam karna hai toh usse imtihaan mein toh bethna hi padega
Joh aadmi ek lakh rupaiy mein tujhe yeh khabar de sakta hai ... woh aadmi paanch lakh rupaiy mein tujhe yahan laakar bech bhi sakta hai

Jis tarah tumne doosron ka khoon bahaya hai ... waise hi ek din tumhare apno ka khoon bahega ... kyun ki woh saari goliyaan joh tumne doosron ke seeno par chalayi hai ... koi ek din tumhare apno ke seene par chalayega
Khushi hazar sahi, gham judha nahi hota ... gareeb kitni bhi pee le, nasha nahi hota
Biwi ko achcha khana pakana aur achcha gaana toh zaroor aana chahiye

Aurat ki bewafai ko samajhna duniya ke kisi mard ke bas ki baat nahi
Is haveli mein rehne waala har insaan marega ... yeh haveli nahi maut ka ghar hai
Main kabar khodta nahi hoon ... main kabar banata hoon ... aur ab ek ek karke tum sabki kabaren yahan ban jayengi
Aurat ka sangharsh uske aasuon se nahi ... uske nischay se hota hai
Yeh nyay nahi ... anyay hai!
Dhande aur career ke bare mein bhai, bhai se jal sakta hai
Ho jaye tayaar, jaana hai bahaar, waqt hai kam, manzil hai door ... lekin jaana hai zaroor
Gareeb ka dil agar sone ka hota hai ... toh haath faulaad ke hote hai
Mazdoor ko mazdoori paseena sookhne se pehle mile ... aur mazloom ko insaaf dard mitne se pehle
Haqeeqat chup nahi sakti banavat ke usoolon se ... ki khushboo aa nahi sakti kabhi kagaz ke phoolon se
Inteqam bhi ek tarah ka insaaf hi hota hai ... joh saboot ka mohtaj nahi hota
Kanoon par kabza hamesha amir ka hi raha hai ... woh hamesha amir ke haath ki laathi bana hai ... toh gareeb ke haath ki hathkadi
Sooraj dhalne se pehle tumhare kadamon ke nishaan is gaon ki mitti se mitt jaane chahiye ... varna tum mitta diye jaoge
Gareeb ka muqaddar us par reham karne se nahi ... balki us mein zimmedari pehda karne se badla jaata hai
Akalmand ki pehchan gusse ke waqt hoti hai ... aur bahadur ki maidan-e-jung mein
Khetti kisaan ki hogi joh us par kaam karta hai ... zameendar ki nahi joh us par aaram karta hai
Aaina todh diya khud bhi nazara na kiya ... unke jaisa ho koi yeh bhi gawara na kiya
Jis aurat ka pesha hi kahi mardon ka dil lubhana hai ... woh zindagi mein jitna chahe dhan kama le ... izzat kabhi nahi kama sakti
Humne kya kya usse mehfil mein ishara na kiya ... dekhna bhi hum mein zalim ne gawara na kiya
Kothe ki santan sirf ek raat ke liye dulhan banti hai ... umar bhar ke liye nahi ... woh daulat ke tarazu mein tulkar apni nath utarwaati hai ... byah karke suhagraat nahi manati

Fudak fudak tu chaal chale, naam tera hirni komal ... thumak thumak koole thumke, hum dekh rahe aankhen mal-mal ... daant tere bhutte dane, dil ched rahe hai naina chanchal ... yeh roop tera bhari bharkam, ham pyar kare ki lade dangal
Achcha ladka dhoondne se nahi ... kismat se milta hai
Jab jab zulm ki aandhi badti hai ... usse rokne ke liye ek toofan aata hai
Mohabbat ki maar ka bada meetha meetha dard hota hai
Tujhe Pavan-putra ka vardaan hai ... unka diya hua dhanush baan hai ... teri raksha ke liye toofan hai

Paap se dharti phati, adharm se aasmaan, atyachaar se kaanpi insaaniyat, raj kar rahe haivaan ... jinki hogi taqat apoorv, jinka hoga nishana abhed, joh karenge inka sarvanaash ... woh kehlayenge Tridev!
Joh insaan jurm ke khilaaf awaaz uthata hai ... usko duniya baaghi hi kehti hai
Kam kapde pehenna tujhe pasand hai ... aur teri is ada pe marna hum mein pasand hai
Police ka kaam hai kauwon ki tarah choch marna ... aur hamara kaam hai unhe bajra dalkar gumrah karna
Intezaar kar aur dekh, maut jab dheere dheere aati hai ... toh kitni khaufnak hoti hai
Bade baap ka bigda hua beta aksar galat raaste par hi chalta hai
Gunaah ke keechad mein begunaahi ke kamal kabhi nahi khil sakte
Apne aasoon sukh jaye toh aadmi doosron ke aasoon pochne chala jata hai

Kutte ko izzat di jaye toh use pichli seat pe bithaya jata hai ... par koode ko bori mein daalkar dicki mein patka jata hai
Jo neta desh ko progress ki aur le jaaye, us desh bhakt ko shaheed ho jaana chahiye
Yeh gaon nahi shehar hai ... yahan darindon ko sher ki tarah bahaduri se nahi, shikari ki tarah jaal dalkar maara jata hai
Khoon ke saare rishtey ek sachche police officer ke liye ussi din khatam ho jaate hain ... jis din yeh vardi pehenta hai
Kanoon ki hifazat karte karte, aap khud ek gunahgaar ban gaye
Agar kisi ne tilbhar bhi hilne ki koshish ki ... toh sabke sar jism se alag kar doonga
Hum mein logo ko is hadh tak darrana hai ... ki unhe apni zindagi ka har din aakhri din lage
Farz ki keemat is vardi se shuru hoti hai ... aur kafan ke saath khatam hoti hai
Pita ka hukum manna beti ka farz hai ... lekin patni ko pati se alag rehne ka hukum agar bhagwan bhi de ... toh usse bhi thukra dena patni ka dharam hai
Pyar karne waale jismon ke milan par nahi ... aatmaon ke milan par bharosa karte hai
Badal ki taqdeer mein toh sirf garajna aur aasoon bahana likha hota hai
Jis pyar mein tyaag ho, woh tyaag mahaan hota hai ... aur usse bhi mahaan hota hai, tyaag karne waala
Kaante beejhne waale kaanto par hi chala karte hai ... kaante beejhkar phoolon ki umeed moorkh kiya karte hai
Agar garajne se hi barbadi ka toofan uthne lage ... toh barasne ki zaroorat nahi padti
Joh jeevan de sakta hai ... woh jeevan le nahi sakta
Duniya ke dastoor paon ki zanjeer ban sakte hai, maut ki nahi ... zamana zinda laashon ka milan rok sakta hai, aatmaon ke milan ko nahi rok sakta
Pyar andha hota hai ... usse koi niyam, koi hadd dikhai nahi deti ... woh kisi bhi sulukh ki parwah kiye baigar apni hadd se guzar jaata hai
Patthar par aasoon girne se, patthar pighalta nahi
Insaanon ka paap ya toh aulad bankar samne aate hai ... ya phir aulad ko bhugatne padte hai
Ghamand toh ek sheesha hai joh toot kar hi rehta hai
Jis tarah parayi biwi apne ghar mein laane se apni nahi ho jaati na ... ussi tarah paraya music apne desh mein bajane se apna nahi ho jaata hai
Is duniya mein insaan ki aukaat uski haisiyat uske paise se nahi ... balki uske karamon se pehchani jaati hai
Duniya alag alag ho jayegi lekin hamare desh ke Hindu Musalman ... kabhi alag nahi honge
Bhagwan ka shukar ki jiye ki usne hum mein koi behen nahi di ... varna saala kehne par cheerkar phek deta
Zubaan ki keemat jaan ki keemat se bahut zyada hai
Gareeb ka jaan ka keemat bhi utna hi ... jitna paisa waala ki jaan ka keemat hai
Kabhi kabhi aaise insaan bhi janam lete hai ... joh apna naam apni yaad tareekh mein nahi ... logon ke dilon mein mehfooz kar jaate hai
Dushman chahe chota ho ya bada ... usse nadaan na samajhna
Agar tujh jaise bhai aur pehda ho jaye ... toh is duniya se Rakhi ka tyohar mitt jayega
Insaan ka jab waqt pura ho jaye ... toh kadam khud ba khud wahan pahuncha dete hai ... jahan maut bahen phalye uska intezar kar rahi ho
Jab jab is dharti par Kans ne janam liya hai ... uska sar kuchalne ke liye Krishna bhi pehda hota raha hai
Maut apni jagah aur waqt likhakar aati hai
Shankar jab gale se gaa sakta hai ... kahin khopdi ghumi na ... toh dushmanon ko jalakar khaak bhi kar sakta hai
Tawaif ka muqaddar ... kothe se shuru hokar kothe pe hi khatam hota hai
Kuch badnaseeb musafir aaisi bhi hote hai ... jinki manzil toh samne hoti hai lekin rasta hi khatam ho jaata hai
Jisse hum khareed nahi sakte ... usse hum khatam kar dete hai

column3: Pati rogi ho ya dhogi ho, yogi ho ya dhongi ho ... patni ka farz hai ki pati ke saath jeeye aur pati ke saath mare

Aaj kal maar se nahi, maal se kaam chalta hai

Likhta hoon khat khoon se, shahi na samajhna ... yeh rang hai chahat ka, tabahi na samajhna
Phatta poster ... nikla hero!

Zindagi bharpor jee lene ke baad ... marne ka mazaa hi kuch aur hai
Nakhoon joh uthaya toh khoon kar dega ... kadam joh badaya toh dum todh dega

Rishte sirf teen hote hai ... ek roti ka bhook se, doosra dosti ka dushmani se aur teesra zindagi ka maut se
Apun ki parchai maut ka pehghaam lati hai ... apun ki awaaz jung ka elaan karti hai ... aur apun ki maujoodgi sare bazar dushman ko nanga karti hai
Aaisa dimak bankar khaonga ki kab tootta, kab bhikra aur kab tabah hua ... teri parchaiyon ko bhi pata nahi chalega

First hand samajh mein aata hai, second hand samajh mein aata hai, third hand tak samajh mein aata hai ... lekin yeh aaisa hand hai jiska saala koi "The End" hi nahi hai

Thane aur aspataal na koi apne marzi se jaata hai ... na apne marzi se aata hai
Neta logon ki aadat hi hai ... jab soote hai toh soote rehte hai ... aur jab jagenge toh cheenkhne chilaane lagte hai
Ek murde ko kafan pehnane mein jitna time lagta hai na ... usse bhi kam time mein main tera vardi utaar sakta hai
Duniya jalati hai dil toh kya ... pyar ki thandi chaanv toh hai
Sachai ki chaadar hamesha choti padh jaati hai ... sar dhako toh pair khul jaate hai aur pair dhako toh sar nanga
Insaan ki aukaat hi kya hoti hai ... ek cheenk se shuru hoti hai ... doosri cheenk par khatam ho jaati hai
Aansoon mitkar bhi kahan mittate ... phail jaate hai kabhi dhood bankar ... ubhar aate hai kabhi khoon bankar ... aur yahi khoon jab aankhon mein utar aata hai toh aansuyon ki barsaat ho jaati hai
Main waqt ki aankh se tapka hua aansoon ka ek katra hoon ... jisko mohabbat ki hatheli par agar koi sajaa le toh moti ban jaaye
Har ek zindagi ek cheenk se shuru hokar ek cheenk par khatam ho jaati hai ... in do cheenkho ke beech leti hui zindagi lagatar cheenkhte rehne ka naam hai
Aag se aadmi tabhi bach sakta hai jab woh khud aag ban jaaye
Koi shayar, koi pagal, koi bepeer ban jaye ... teri tasveer joh dekhe woh khud tasveer ban jaye
Aurat aur zevar dono ka sangam is duniya ki sabse badi sundarta hai

Bhagwan ki adalat ka faisla insaan ko pata nahi chalta ... is liye woh gunah pe gunah kiye jaata hai ... aur insaan ki adalat kabhi kabhi faisla karne mein dokha kha jaati hai ... is liye maine banayi hai teesri adalat joh tum jaise hathyaron ko sazaa degi ... saza-e-maut
Tune Maryam ka daaman aur Sita ki gaud dekhi hai ... Durga aur Kali roop nahi dekha
Whiskey mein soda ya pani milane se uska taste kharab ho jaata hai ... whiskey mein whiskey milake peena chahiye

Bhagwan ne mujhe is liye zinda rakha ... ke main tumhare maut ke parwaane par dastakhaz kar sakun
Ladki ka model ho ya gadi ka ... waqt ke saath saath dono purani ho jaati hai
Doosron ki khushi ke liye jeena hi zindagi hai
Dil gaya toh gaya hosh bhi udh gaye, ek naya inquilaab aane ko hai ... apni kafir nighaon ko roko zara, mera imaan dagmagane ko hai
Purani yaadon ke nishan dil ki deewar se aasani se nahi mitte
Zindagi mein kabhi na kabhi toh samjauta karna hi padhta hai
Aurat ki mitti mein pani kam ... jalan zyada hoti hai
Teri zabaan se shadb nahi ... tere zakhm tapak rahe hai ... teri aankhon se aasoon nahi ... inhi zakhmon ka khoon beh raha hai
Zindagi mein jitni zaroori mohabbat hai ... utni hi zaroori daulat bhi hai
Insaan ko na kuch paane ki khushi honi chahiye aur na kuch khone ka gham
Is duniya mein koi kisi ka dost nahi hai ... sab paison ke dost hai
Agar khubsoorat ladki ko na chedo ... toh woh bhi toh uski beizzati hoti hai na
Duniya mein agar kuch hai, toh woh paisa nahi, daulat nahi ... pyar hai, mohabbat hai
Farz ki ibaadat aur usool ke maqaam par pahunchne ke liye ... bahut kuch peeche chhod dena padta hai ... taki farz ke raaste mein koi jazba rukavat na pehda kar sake
Bahut kam baha khoon zameeno ki khatir ... katte sar hazaron haseeno ki khatir

Main tujhe apne nange haathon se maaronga aur woh anjaam doonga ... ki marne se pehle tera dil phat jayega ... aankhen pathrane se pehle bahar nikal aayengi ... cheekte cheekte tere halak ki awaaz sookh jayegi
Kisi ka maara hua shikaar khana mera usool nahi ... aur maal ko baantkar lena mera pesha nahi

Main aandhi hoon joh ek hi saans mein hawa ka rukh badal deti hai ... yehi aandhi tumhe tinke ki tarah udhake maut ke ghat tak pahuncha degi ... aur woh ghat itna sookha hoga ki marte waqt joh tum pani maangoge ... toh tumhe pani ki boond bhi naseeb nahi hogi
Ek achcha insaan banane ke liye aadmi ko puri zindagi bhi kam padti hai ... aur bura insaan banane ke liye sirf ek lamha kaafi hai
Duniya mein ooncha naam kamane waale waqt se pehle apne iraade zahir nahi karte
Duniya mein jis insaan ka zameer zinda hai ... woh maut bardasht kar lega lekin apni beizzati aur apmaan nahi
Hukumat karne waale ke haath se taqat aur aurat ke haath se jab mard nikal jaata hai ... toh woh dono zyada der tak chup nahi reh sakte
Ladki hai ya naram naram double roti ... isko dekhte hi mohabbat ke pet mein bhook lag jaati hai
Zehar ko amrit banaya jaa sakta hai ... lekin aaise insaan ko dus janam tak insaaniyat ka sabak sikhane ke bawajood ... insaan nahi banaya jaa sakta
Kanoon saboot ki nazaron se dekhta hai ... aur gawah ki zubaan ko samajhta hai aur sunta hai
Jiske dil mein aag lagi hoti hai ... uski insaaniyat bhi ussi aag mein jalkar khaak ho jaati hai

column2: Paap Ko Jalaa Kar Raakh Kar Doonga
column3: Tune apni zindagi mein bade bade shaitan dekhe honge ... lekin aaj teri mulaqat shaitanon ke shahenshah Shaadilal se ho rahi hai ... jiske paas insaan toh kya, khud shaitan panah maangne aate hai

column2: Paap Ko Jalaa Kar Raakh Kar Doonga
column3: Sachche pyar mein koi paap punya, achcha bura kuch nahi hota ... pyar bas pyar hota hai

column2: Paap Ko Jalaa Kar Raakh Kar Doonga
column3: Jinke paas sirf pahunch hoti hai, unke paas kabiliyat nahi hoti ... meri pahunch meri wafaadari tak hai, meri imaandari tak hai, meri pahunch meri mehnat tak hai ... aur iske badaulat main apne mukaam par zaroor pahunch jaonga

column2: Paap Ko Jalaa Kar Raakh Kar Doonga
column3: Sharafat se maan jayegi toh phool ki tarah soongunga ... zabardasti karni padi toh kaanton ki tarah kuchal doonga

column2: Paap Ko Jalaa Kar Raakh Kar Doonga
column3: Main is haramzade ki woh halat banaonga ki vaid aur hakeem bhi pareshaan ho jayenge aur soochenge ... ki thopda kaunsa hai aur haath pair kaunse hai

column2: Paap Ko Jalaa Kar Raakh Kar Doonga
column3: Mere baap ne mera naam Premanand is liye rakha hai ... ki main hamesha prem aur anand mein rehta hoon ... lekin jab koi hamara nuksaan karta hai toh hamara kroadh prem par haavi ho jaata hai ... aur hum dushmano ke liye Kroadhanand ban jaate hai

column2: Paap Ko Jalaa Kar Raakh Kar Doonga
column3: Meri kamyaabi ke peeche ... tadbeer meri hai aur taqdeer meri maa ki hai
Ek teer se do shikaar khelne waala khiladi ... kabhi kabhi khud apne hi teer ka shikaar ho jaata hai
Talvar jab tootti hai toh aadmi ki jaan bach jaati hai ... lekin kalam ki nok jab tootti hai toh aadmi ki jaan chali jaati hai
Bada pyara hai pyare yeh ladki ka chakkar ... nahi mili toh shayar, mil gayi toh shohar
Jaan lene se laash pe kabza jamaya ja sakta hai ... dil pe nahi
Doobte huye suraj ki kiranon mein ... har khoobsurat cheez aur bhi khoobsurat lagne lagti hai
Agar hum kisi ke liye deewane ho gaye ... toh yeh koi zaroori toh nahi ... ke woh bhi humare liye deewana ho jaye
Is hi doobte hue suraj ne hum mein pehli baar milaya tha ... dekh lena, yahi doobta hua suraj hum mein ek din hamesha ke liye mila dega
Main duniya ki har musibat ka saamna karne ke liye tayaar hoon ... bas ek tumhara saath chahiye
Isse pyar kaho ya pagalpan ... jawani mein aaisi nadaniya ho jati hai
Main jaanti thi ke tum kaayar ho ... lekin itne kamine, yeh mujhe aaj pata chala
Har nayi cheez ke liye kismat ko aazmana bahut zaroori hota hai
Agar hum pyase bhi marte ho ... toh bhi tumhare ghar se do boond pani peena hum mein manzoor nahi hai
Ek izzatdaar duniya ki har musibat jhel sakta hai ... lekin zaleel hokar jee nahi sakta
Pyar ek jazbaat hai joh kiya nahi jaata ... yeh ittefaq se ho jaata hai
Shaadi toh kabhi na tootne waala ek bandhan hai, ek haqeeqat hai ... yeh woh rishta hai joh saans tootne ke baad hi tootta hai
Phool pyar ki nishani hoti hai aur khushboo uska ehsaas
Ehsaas sirf dil mein yaadon ke diye jalate hai ... dilon ke beech nahi aate
Mujhe malum hota aaisa kalank mere ghar mein pehda hone waala hai ... toh main apne nakhoono se apni kok phad dalti
Rishtey mein to hum tumhare baap hote hai ... naam hai Shahenshah
Main kanoon ka baazu nahi khud kanoon banonga ... aur aaisa kanoon joh khud mujrimo ko pakdega, khud mukadma sunega ... aur unka faisla bhi khud karega
Har reporter ki tarah meri ragon mein bhi khoon ki jagah roshnai behti hai ... aur jab tak woh roshnai behti rahegi ... mera kalam sachai likhte hue kaanpega nahi
Chaand ko apni chaandni sabit karne ke liye ... chiragon ki shahadat ki zaroorat nahi padhti
Shahenshah jahan khade ho jaate hai ... wahin darbar lag jaate hai
Business mein laga hua rupaiya ... saanp ke daanto mein phase hue mendhak ki tarah hota hai
Joh achcha tairakh hota hai na ... woh toofani lehron mein beh nahi jaata ... balki unhi lehron ko apni naav bana leta hai
Duniya ki koi jagah itni door nahi hai jahan jurm ke paon mein kanoon ... apni faulaadi zanjeeren pehna na sake
Joh baant ke khaate hai ... unki sehat achchi aur umar lambi hoti hai
Zakhm dene waala bhi wohi hai, bharne waala bhi wohi hai ... insaan toh sirf marham rag sakta hai
Sachai apna saboot kudh hoti hai
Shehar mein koi aaisa raasta, koi chowk, koi aasia naka nahi bacha tha ... jahan par katilo ne hum par goliyo ki barsaat na ki ho
Desh mein do kanoon nahi ho sakte hai ... ek gareebo ke liye, doosra ameero ke liye
Tum apni haddi pasliyan achchi tarah ginke rakhna ... kahin hawalat ke andhar jaate hue aur hawalat se bahar aate hue ... tumhari ginti mein farak na padh jaaye
Jis din main koi gori titli dekh leta hoon na ... mere khoon mein sehkado kaale kutte ek saath bhaukne lagte hai
Tumne police ki vardi kahan pehan rakhi hai ... yeh toh ek kafan hai joh tumhare zameer ki laash ne pehan rakha hai
Tip baad mein dena toh ek rivaaz hai ... pehle dena achchi service ki guarantee hai
Aaj sharaab ki lehren baha do ... joh bhi aaye tumhare bar mein usse whiskey se nehla do
Main yeh toh jaanta tha ki aurat agar apne makaam se uthe toh devi ban sakti hai ... magar yeh nahi jaanta tha ki agar girne pe aaye toh aap jaisi nagin bhi ban sakti hai
Yeh sachai ka bazaar hai ... yahan usool na beche jaate hai ... na khareede jaate hai
Aaj hum tumhare andhar chupe hue tamaam kaale kutte bahar nikalkar ... tumhara ghost nochne ke liye tum hi pe chhod denge
Budhapa jab jawani ka intezaar karta hai ... toh bahut intezaar karta hai
Jaan hum tumhari aaisi bhikharan bana denge ... ki maut bhi uski jholi mein bheek nahi dalegi
Maine tumhari tarah dikhave ke liye sharafat ka chola nahi audh rakha hai ... balki farz ki vardi pehani hui hai aur is vardi ka daaman saaf rakhne ke liye main apna khoon tak baha sakta hoon
Hamari kitaab mein galati ka lafz hi nahi hai ... hum galat kare toh sahi kehlata hai aur zulm kare toh insaaf kehlata hai
Jis tarah ghoda dabakar bandook se goli bahar nikaal dete hai ... ussi tarah galati manane waale ke sar par haath pherkar hum purani baaton ko dil se nikaal dete hai
Ek se bhale do, do se bhale chaar ... manzil apni door hai, aur rasta karna hai paar

Jin haathon se tune mere bhai ka khoon bahaya hai ... un haathon ka woh hashar karoonga ki zindagi bhar un haathon ko phailakar maut ki bheek maangti rahegi ... aur maut tere kareeb aane se inkaar karegi
Har insaan apne karmon se pehchana jaata hai ... apne baap ke karmon se nahi
Baazuon ki taqat toh uparwale ki den hai
Bhagwan ke prem aur vishvas ka ek hi saboot hai duniya mein ... joh maa ke dil mein mamta bankar palta rehta hai
Pehle khoon ke baad aadmi kanoon se darta hai ... lekin do-char khoon karne ke baad kanoon aadmi se darta hai
Joh kam bolte hai, woh aksar khatarnak hote hai ... is liye chalak aadmi ko khamosh dushman se hamesha hoshiyar rehna chahiye
Aasoon gareeb ki dil ki tijori se nikalne waale keemti moti hote hai
Izzat toh daulat walon ki hoti hai ... bhikhariyon ki toh izzat ko bhi duniya nafrat ki nazar se dekhti hai
Naam lene se umar lambi nahi hoti ... umar lambi hoti hai mehnat se, mushaqat se
Pyar toh rahega ... uske dil mein nafrat ki tarah aur mere dil mein nasoor ki tarah
Nasik ho yah Bambai ... ladkiyan ladkiyan hoti hai, patane ka tarika aana chahiye ... pyar kiya nahin jaata, karvaya jaata hai
Tujh jaise desh drohiyon ko kanoon ke pairon par jhukane ke liye ... na vardi ki zaroorat hai aur na hi is pistol ki ... mere desh ke naujawanon ke sirf do haath hi kaafi hai
Aadmi ko sirf rishtey rokte hain ... aur mera koi rishta nahin
Ab meri baat dhyan se sunle ... varna zindagi bhar kisi ki baat sunne ke layak nahin rahega
Lotia jab deta toh ehsaan nahin karta ... aur jab leta hai toh lihaaz nahin karta
Agar main tere liye mar sakta hoon ... toh tujhe maar bhi sakta hoon
Aankh ke badle aankh, haath ke badle haath, jaan ke badle jaan ... aur bhai ke badle behen
Kabhi kabhi rooh jism se zyada taqatwar hoti hai
Joh haath rishwat lete lete aur apne farz ke saath gadaari karte karte ghis jaate hain ... un mein belt istamaal karne ki kya uthane tak ki taqat nahin hoti
Chhodna mat ... pakadke rakh!
In dono haathon ko milana hi meri zindagi ka maqsad hain ... aur zaroori hua toh meri maut ka maqsad bhi
Uska aur mera toh khoon ka rishta hai ... khoon uska, chaku mera
Jab duty tafri ban jaye aur juari vardi se darne ki bajah vardi ke saath behetkar jua khelne lage ... toh dav par chand sikke nahin ... mulk ki kismat bhi lag jati hai
Mera farz sirf gunahgaron ko rokne ka nahin ... balki gunah rokne ka bhi hai
Tumne apna raasta aur pesha bhale hi badal liya ho ... main ab bhi usse raaste par chal raha hoon aur mera pesha bhi wahi hai
Ghar na toh char deewaron ka naam hai aur na un char deewaron ke andhar rehne waalon ka ... ghar toh us pyar ka naam hai joh hawaon mein ghula hua hai
Hatyare se bada paapi woh hai ... joh kisi masoom ko hatyara banata hai
Tere paap toh itne ghinone hai ... ki daya ka sagar bhagwan bhi tujhe maaf karne se pehle do baar sochega
Farishtay ke ghar mein shaitaan pehda hota hai ... aur shaitaan ke ghar mein farishta
Main tum logon ko aisi sazaa doongi ... ki tum log maut ke liye tarsoge ... aur maut tum tak nahi aayegi
Paap ke khilaaf na ladna ... sabse bada paap hota hai
Suraj ki kiran gandagi par padhti hai toh ... kiran mayli nahi hoti
Ek karsi Gangajal mein agar ek boond sharaab mila di jaye ... toh saara Gangajal apavitra ho jaata hai
Tum mujhe giraftar toh kar sakte ho magar sazaa nahi de sakte ... jis din maine tujhe giraftar kar liya na ... us din kanoon bhi mera hoga aur sazaa bhi meri
Aaise tadpa tadpakar maroonga ... ki maut bhi teri laash ko dekhkar kaanp uthegi
Main tumhare jism ke har ang ko apni mohabbat ke sone se sajja doonga
Mohabbat ke liye mahalon ki nahi ... dilon ki zaroorat hoti hai
Mujhe Raj Mahal ki zindagi chahiye ... aur kisi Taj Mahal ki maut
Raaste badal sakte hai, saathi badal sakte hai ... magar manzil kabhi nahi badalti
Gareeb sapne zaroor sajja sakta hai ... magar usse poora nahi kar sakta
Insaan hi insaan ka sabse bada dushman hai ... insaan hi insaan pe zulm karta hai, usse lootta hai, uska ghar ujhaad deta hai
Gareeb ka jab bheja phirta hai na ... toh usse andook bandook kuch nahi dikhai deti ... chalao goli!
Saanp ke bil mein ghuskar zeharilay phanon se dushmani nahi lete ... varna khoon ke saath zehar bhi dil mein ghus jayega
Apan dada hai gareebon mein fakeeri ka ... lafdebaazon mein vasooli ka ... dada logon mein dadagiri ka
Sau din chor ke toh ek din thanedaar ka ... sau din zalim ke toh ek din mazloom ka
Apna toh aaisa-hich hai ... lade bagair apun zero aur ladke apun hero
Log aasman se girkar bhi bach jaate hai ... aur marne waale hawa ke jhaunke se girkar mar jaate hai
Agar aapne aainda hum mein aap kehkar nahi pukara ... toh hum aapko aaisa girra hua shabd kehkar pukarenge ... ki aap zindagi bhar apni hi nazaron se girre rahenge
Mujhe gaali do, mujhe maaro, chaho toh mere jism se khaal alag kardo ... lekin mujhe apne rishtey se alag mat karo
Main tolta pehle hoon aur bolta bad mein hoon
Mangal ke samne joh zabaan chalata hai ... Mangal uski taqdeer ki linen mitta deta hai
Aurat ke daman par agar ek baar daag lag jaata hai ... toh Ganga ka pavitra jal bhi usse nahi dho sakta
Mangal ka rasta joh rokta hai ... Mangal uske liye maut ka darwaza khol deta hai
Chalo dhabe mein sab kuch milega ... mutton kadi, alu badi, maa ki daal raita naal, fry machhi bachut achchi, shami kabab lajawab, paneer palak ... chalo balak
Bacha apni maa ki maar khake bada hota hai ... lekin apni maa ko maarne waala bacha tabah hota hai
Khoon bahana bahut aasaan hai ... lekin khoon ko bachana bahut mushkil hai
Jis aulaad ke saath maa ka aashirwad aur baap ki dua ho ... woh haathon se nahi laaton se bhi kaam chala sakte hai

Chhoton ko badhon ke samne cigarette nahi peeni chahiye ... aur taqatvar ko kamzor pe zulm nahi karna chahiye ... is liye agar koi cigarette peeye toh usse bhuja do ... aur koi zulm kare toh usse mitta do
Josh mein koi burai nahi lekin usse hosh ke dariye mein hona chahiye
Kanoon ka sipahi, kanoon ki raksha ke liye jab kanoon ke dariye se bahar nikalta hai ... toh woh sar pe kafan bandkar nikalta hai
Khuda toh sabko bacha sakta hai ... lekin jiska khuda na ho, usse koi nahi bacha sakta
Ab na woh zalim rahenge na zulm rahega ... na kanoon se khilwar karne waale woh gaddar rahenge ... ab sirf kanoon rahega

Kanoon aur kanoon ke rakhwaalon ko saboot ki zaroorat us waqt tak padti hai, jab tak woh kanoon ki hadhon mein rehte hai ... lekin jis waqt woh kanoon ki hifazat ke liye un hadhon se bahar nikal jaate hai, toh phir saboot ki nahi ... goliyon ki zaroorat padti hai
Is duniya mein dard bahut hai aur baatne waale haath bahut kam hai ... phir bhi aagaaz hai yeh jisse anjaam tak nibhana hai ... khoon hai jab tak ragon mein, har zulm ko mitana hai

Hindustan par hukumat ek afsar ki nahi, kisi minister ki nahi, in Jamaal Sen jaise darindo ki nahi ... Hindustan par hukumat hai in masoom bachchon ki, Hindustan par hukumat hai Hindustani awaam ki, Hindustan par hukumat hai hum Hindustaniyon ki

Tere teer-e-neemkash ko koi mere dil se pooche ... yeh khalish kahan se hoti joh jigar ke paar hota ... joh nigah ki thi zalim toh phir aankh kyun churai ... wohi teer kyun na maara joh jigar ke paar hota
Muskurate hue yun aaye woh maikhane mein ... ruk gayi saans chalakte hue paimaane mein
Is safar mein isse khoobsurat ghatna aur kya ho sakti hai ... ki tera haath, haath mein aa gaya ... chirag raah mein jal uthe
Jis din mujhe thoos saboot mil gaya ... tumhari zindagi ka aakhri panna main likhonga
Hafta lete lete police waalon ki ungliyan itni ghis gayi hai ... ki unmein na hathkadi lagane ki taqat hai aur na trigger dabane ki
Aaj hum iska boti ka tukda tukda karke ... iska khoon ka ek ek boond choos loonga
Aaj humne tarakki ka pehla seedhi par kadam rakh liya hoon ... aur bahut jaldi itna oonchai pe pahunch jaonga ... ke humko dekhne ke liye tumko aakash ka baadal hatana padega
Is zameen se kabhi nafrat mat karna ... kyun ki aadmi jab oonchai se ludakta hai ... toh usse neeche is hi zameen par aana padta hai
Imaandari se chori karne mein ... chori pakdi nahi jaati
Main pehle sirf kal hi ki soochta tha ... aur ab bahut door ki soochne laga hoon
Beizzati ki chhat ke neeche jeene se behtar hai ... ke insaan bina chhat ke izzat se jiye
Patni ka gawaar hona pati ke liye bhagwan ki dein hoti hai
Kuch baatein patthar ke lakeer se zyada gehri hoti hai ... patthar toot jaata hai lekin lakeerein nahi mitne paati

Aaj ke baad humri bahen ko aaisa ungli se bhi chua na ... toh saala maar maarke, maar maarke tumra pura hadi pasli hum todh doonga ... aur aaisa todhonga saala ki duniya ka kauno haspatal mein tumra ilaaj nahi ho sakega
Hum kutton se baat nahin karte!
Zindagi mein agar kisi ne mere liye dua ki ho ... toh woh bhi tujhe lag jaye
Bootiyan nochne waala geedar ... gala phadne se sher nahin ban jaata
Khoon jab bolta hai toh maut ka tandav hota hai
Dada toh is duniya mein sirf do hain ... ek upar waala aur doosre hum
Hum tumhe aisi maut maarenge ... tumhari aane waali nasalon ki neend bhi uss maut ke khauf se udh jayegi
Duniya mein mard lakh imaandar hoga toh sadak pe padhe hue pachaas yah sau rupaiy ki note chhod dega ... lekin ek akeli, jawaan, anaath ladki ko koi nahi chhodta
Rana ki maut itni choti nahi ... joh tumhari mutthi mein ho
Bazaar ke kisi sadak chaap darzi ko bulakar apne kafan ka maap de do
Telephone uthakar khamosh rehna mardo ka kaam nahi hai
Suna hai Bambai shehar mein insaan aur haivaan ... dono ko chupne ki jagah milti hai
Badle ki aag woh pyas hai joh kisi doosre ke peene se nahi bhujti ... aur toofan ko kisi aur sahare ki zaroorat nahi padhti
Yeh toh sher ki guffa hai ... yahan agar tumne karvat bhi li toh samjho maut ko bulava diya
Hamare dhande mein aasunyon ke saath koi rishta nahin hota
Hamare kaan na nahin sun sakte ... agar na sunle ... toh hamare kaanon se angaray nikalne lagte hain
Dushmani aur dosti agar ghaadi na ho ... toh us mein koi rang nahin aata
Hum uss sipahi ki tarah hai ... jiske haath mein sirf mayan hai ... talwar nahi
Rana karz aur farz dono ko ... ek hi nazar se nibhata hai
Hum mein amiron ki taqat ka nahin ... garibon ki kamzori ka ehsaas hai
Gunaah ke samundar ki koi bhi machli ... tumhare jeevan ke pavitra nadi mein kabhi nahi aayegi
Police ki vardi aur khoon ki garmi aadmi ko bada khuddar bana deti hai
Seva, adarsh aur desh bhakti ki bhavna agar kitaabon mein hi bandh rahi ... toh phir hamare desh ki hasti bhi duniya ke kagazi naksho mein reh jayegi
Baaton ki talwar se gardan nahin katti
Hausle se har kaam mumkin hai ... hausle se insaan apni taqdeer jaise chahe waisi bana sakta hai
Is duniya ke tum pehle aur aakhri badnaseeb kamine hoge ... jiski na toh arthi uthegi aur na kisi kandhe ka sahara ... seedhi chitta jalegi
Zindagi ek natak hi toh hai, lekin zindagi aur natak mein farak hai ... natak ko jahan chaho, jab chaho badal do lekin ... zindagi ke natak ki dor toh upar waale ke haath mein hai
Marte toh sirf bekasoor hai ... kusoorwar toh hamari tarah aaish karte hai
Hamare phone ke baad interview nahin hota ... letter of appointment seedha milta hai
Rana na pyase pehda hue the ... aur na hi pyase marenge
Rana ki shatranj ka ghoda a-dai ghar nahin chalta ... seedhe raja ko marta hai
Gunaah chupane se gunehgaar nahi chup sakta
P.C. Mathur jisse dushmani karta hai ... uski jhadon ko khood kar hamesha ke liye khatam kar deta hai
Adalat toh sirf saboot par faisla karti hai
Aasoon bahane se dil toh halka ho jayega lekin gham ka bhoj halka nahi hota
Unke mujhpar itne ehsaan hai ... ki agar main apni chamdi ka joota banakar bhi unhe pehnata ... toh bhi kam hota
Sankat ke samay toh savdhani hi sabse bada dharm hai
Baat agar hadd se badh jaaye ... toh batangar bann jaati hai
Sher jab ek baar khoon chak leta hai ... toh adamkhor ho jaata hai
Nazar par bhi nazar rakhni padti hai
Izzat amiron ka shaunk hai
Mogambo khush hua
Indian God marta hai ... aur hasta bhi hai
Calendar khana lao! ... Calendar khana lao!
Gayi bhains pani mein
Aaj tak tum log baimaani aur zulm ka bazaar garam karte rahe ... magar ab tumhare zulm aur paap ke pyale chalak uthe hai ... ab tumhare ek ek jurm ka hisaab liya jayega
Shama bujhao ki sailaab-e-noor aaya hai ... ya phalak se koi tara hi utar aaya hai
Chaddaron par lage hue daag toh saaf kiye ja sakte hai ... lekin dil pe lage hue daag kabhi nahi mitaye ja sakte
Manushya ke jeevan mein sangeet ka staan asadharan hai
Jis desh ko hamare buzurgon ne apne pranon ki aahuti dekar azaad karaya ... ussi desh mein in kayaron ki fauj pal rahi hai

Hum mein ek misaal kayam karni hogi ... jis mein ek insaan ka dukh saare shehar ka dukh ban jaye ... chot padosi ko lage toh dard saare mohalle ko ho ... aur woh mohalla saara Hindustan ho

Yeh kaisa zamana hai ... har shaksh begana hai ... har aankh pe parda hai ... har honth pe taala hai ... par aaise zamane mein koi toh maseeh hoga ... khudgarz nahi hoga, bedard nahi hoga ... zulmon ke khilaaf apni awaaz uthayega ... woh shaksh yahin hoga, woh shaksh yahin hoga
Dil pahad thodi na hai ... jahan se awaaz takrakar wapas laut aaye ... dil ki awaaz toh dil se takrati hai ... phir wahi bas jati hai
Bazaaru cheezon se ghar sajaaye jaate hai ... basaaye nahi
Raah dekhongi sahiba ... laute toh bhi, na laute toh bhi
Kutta bhi lakh bura ho ... wafaadari nahi chodta
Juda hone se rishtey nahi tootte
Yeh saath pheron ka bandhan nahi hai ... vachan ka bandhan hai ... joh mujhe mitta toh sakta hai ... lekin toot nahi sakta
Nikal ja nahi toh tukdon mein bhijwa doonga tujhe
Hum kahan aaise ki soche koi ... tumne socha toh yeh ehsaan hua

Pehli baar jana ki chudi bhari kalaiyon ka matlab suhaag hota hai ... pehli baar jana ki subah ghar se nikle mard ke lautte kadamo ki aahat sunane ki koshish ko intezar kehte hai ... pehli baar jana ki biwi kehlane se hi aurat ke jism mein rooh padti hai

Duniya mein har aurat ek bikau maal hai ... woh chahe toh ghar mein bikke, chahe bazar mein ... kabhi woh paise ke liye bikti hai, kabhi ghar grahasti ke liye ... kahin woh khud bikti hai apni marzi se, kahin woh bech dali jaati hai
Kothe ki dehleez par aag hoti hai ... us par pair rakhte hi ladki ki izzat jal jaati hai ... aur woh izzatdar se tawaif ban jaati hai
Mil-julkar sharaab peene se dosti aur zyada badti hai
Pistol toh haath mein bachche bhi pakad sakte hai ... magar usse chalana bachchon ka kaam nahi
Maut ko daakhil hone ke liye kisi ki ijaazat ki zaroorat nahi padti hai
Is dharti par jab jab paap padta hai ... tab tab paapiyon ka naash karne ke liye koi na koi paida ho hi jaata hai
Jab suraj sar par hota hai ... toh parchayi bhi saath hoti hai
Jeevan mein teen cheezon se hamesha parez rakhiye ... shakkar, namak aur neta
Zukham kamzor aadmi ko hota hai
Beva ki aankh mein khwab toh hote nahi ... bas aasoon hote hai
Jiske dil mein pyar ka chand utra ho ... woh bahut khush kismat hai
Maska hai maska ... ekdum jhakaas!
Agar ladki akeli ho aur woh bhi aap jaisi khoobsurat ... toh badmaash toh kya, hum jaise sharif bhi aap par toot pade
Adaalat shaq par nahi ... yakeen ki buniyaad par faisla karti hai
Hum khatron ko paalte nahi, khatam kar dete hai
Joh kaam rishwat se na ho ... daan punya se ho jaata hai
Jab doosra koi kaam kar raha ho toh beech mein dhakal dena badtameezi hoti hai
Duniya mein joh aadmi jitna zyada chanda deta hai ... log usse utna hi sharif aur imaandar samajhte hai
Business mein main dosti nahi paala karta
Agar usne apna rasta nahi badla toh majboor hokar hum mein apna rasta badalna hoga ... aur woh rasta khoon ke darya se hoke guzrega

Yeh joh vote hai na yeh kagaz ka tukda nahi hai ... ki dabbe mein daala aur chal diye ... yeh vote tumhare parivar, tumhare desh, uski unnati ki parchi hai ... yeh toh do dhaari talwar hai joh dono taraf se kaatti hai ... theek jagah pade toh desh khushal aur galat jagah pade toh desh ka satyanash
Jab raajneeti pesha ban jaati hai, vyapar ban jaati hai ... toh kursi desh se badi ho jaati hai
Hamare desh mein samajwad kahan hai ... hamare desh mein toh afsarwad hai, jaat-paatwad hai, kursiwad hai ... arre samajwad toh tab aayega jab aap apne vote ki taqat mehsoos karenge

Woh log mujhe toh maar sakte hai lekin meri awaaz ko nahi kuchal sakte ... meri awaaz croreon mazdooron ki awaaz bankar un zalimon ke kaano se takrayegi ... mere khoon ke ek ek boond se hazaron lakhon croreon Kranti Kumar pehda honge ... joh is dharti se zulm, anyay aur baimaani ke rakshas ko hamesha hamesha ke liye khatam kar denge ... kranti hogi, poorn kranti, sampoorn kranti!
Zulm aur anyay ke khilaaf pehle hamesha ek hi awaaz uthti hai, ek hi haath uthta hai ... aur phir dheere dheere sarfaroshon ka caravan tayaar ho jaata hai
Kabab mein haddi toh suna tha ... yeh saala poora bakra kahan ghus aaya
Waqt, mauka, nazaqat, halat ... kuch toh dekh kar aaya karo?
Goli maar maarke ek ek aadmi ki laash ko sadak pe us tarah phekenge ... jaise juari jua khelte table pe taash ke patte phekta hai
Mera kaam tumhe sarkari mehmaan banana hai

Shera ki suvar ki khopdi mein lomdi ki tarah chalaak dimag hai ... pahad khodkar chuha nikaal leta hai ... kabar khodkar murda nikaal leta hai ... aur aatma ka gala dabakar parmatma ka pata nikaal leta hai
Zameen aur aasman ke beech jitni bhi cheezein hai ... mujhe dekh kar unki rooh fanaa ho jaati hai ... aag ghabrakar baraf ho jaati hai ... aur baraf ghabrakar pani
Jab khud ke latakne ki baari aati hai na ... toh chehra khud-ba-khud latak jaata hai
Pichle janam mein tum zaroor maachis ki dibiya rahe hoge ... is liye is janam mein baatein kam aur mooh se chingaariya zyada nikalte ho
Apun bhi apni marzi ka maalik hai ... apne mood ka badshah hai
Kyun meri Kashmir jaisi zindagi ko Kurukshetra banane pe tuli ho?
Is aadmi ki parchai bhi kisi pe padh jaye na ... toh wahi marr jaye ... itna zehareela hai yeh
Papaya jaisa chehra, chikoo jaisi aankhen, tarbuj jaisa badan ... ladki hai yah fruit ki tokri?
Tum jaisi auraton ke pair ke neeche swarg hota hai ... aur aaj kal ki auraton ke pair ke neeche sandal ... joh sadak pe kam aur mardon ke sarr pe zyada chalti hai
Jab aulaad jawaan ho jaati hai na ... tab naukrani ki nahi ... bahurani ki zaroorat hoti hai
Joh bhi apni zubaan nahi kholta hai ... main uske bheje ka dhakan khol deta hoon
Jis tarah cigarette peene ke baad tukde ko phek diya jaata hai ... uss hi tarah kaam khatam ho jaane ke baad chamcho ko khatam kar deta hai Shera
Haara hua pyar ghar-baar nahi bassa sakta ... aur bassa bhi le toh chala nahi pata

Jisne pyar na kiya ... woh jiya toh kya jiya ... aaj khule aam kehte hai ... rab se pyara hai piya ... yaar ke baahon mein jiye ... aur yaar ke kandhon pe mare ... yaar se yaari nibhayein ... dil se dildaari karen
Dulhan wohi joh piya mann bhaye ... aur dahej lekar aaye
Bharatiya naari ke jeevan mein talaak ya divorce nahi hota ... usse toh apne pati se sirf maut hi alag kar sakti hai ... divorce nahi
Pehle main tumhare pyar mein deewani thi ... aaj main tumhare izzat ki deewani ho gayi
Mujhe bhi giraftaar kar lo na ... pyar ki hathkadi lagakar dil ke lock up mein qaid kar lo na
Mere haath kanoon se zyada lambe hai ... jahan mera haath ja sakta hai, wahan kanoon ka haath nahi ja sakta
Siyasat ki duniya mein maa, baap, bhai, behen, beti, damad koi kuch nahi hota ... kyun ki aadmi jab upar uthna chahta hai, tab yeh sab rishtey aur jazbaat bojh bankar usse neeche ghaseet lete hai
Chal maafi maang nahi to sar, pair, mooh sab ek design ka bana doonga ... maafi maang!
Neta jab tak giraftar nahi hota usse naam nahi milta ... logon ki humdardiyan nahi milti
Agar tum mein se kisi ne apni jagah se hilne ki koshish ki ... toh tumhare tukdo ko sukhe patton ki tarah hawa mein uda doonga
Main toh apne us dafnaaye huye kal ko kabr se wapas nikaalne ja raha hoon
Maine duniya mein bade baimaan dekhe ... lekin aap logon ke takkar ka ek bhi nahi mila
Kaun bewakoof hoga, joh aapka mazaak uda karke apne mazaak ka mazaak udayega
Maa ka khoon chaatne wali kutte jaisi zabaan se main apna naam nahi sunana chahta
Auraton ke shareer ka sauda karke daulat kamane waale log toh maine dekhe the ... lekin apni maa ka sauda karne waala dalaal maine apni zindagi mein pehli baar dekha hai
Mooch ka baal nikla nahi, shuru ho gaya haram kaari karne
Main teri itni botiyan karoonga ... ki aaj gaon ka koi bhi kutta bhookha nahi soyega
Insaaniyat inteqam nahi ... insaaf chahti hai, aman chahti hai
Laundiya bhi garam hai aur malai ki tarah naram hai
Barood tumhare andhar bhi bhara hai ... bomb mere seene mein bhi sulag rahe hai ... dhamaka jab hoga bade zor ka hoga
Isaaniyat ka dhood pilane se saanpon ka zehar aur badhta hai
Aaisi bahut si aandhiyan aayi aur chali gayi ... lekin koi is pahad ke seene mein chhed nahi kar saka
Aandhiyon ke darr se log apne hi diyon ko apni hi phoonkon se bhujane lagenge ... toh mohabbat ki duniya mein sirf andhera reh jayega
Is ghar mein us waqt tak koi khushi nahi ho sakti ... jab tak hum dushman ke ghar mein khushiyon ke chiragon ko gham ke andheron mein na badal de
Zindagi band ghar ka diya banke reh gayi hai ... joh na achchi tarah se jal sakta hai aur na hi poori tarah se bhujne mein aata hai
Mujhe iska itna lahu bahana hai ... ki yeh safed ho jaye aur dharti laal
Hum yahan se door aur kahin upar behte hue taqdeer ke likhne waale ko nahi maante ... hum uska likhne waala kalam todh bhi sakte hai ... aur kalam se likhi hui taqdeer badal bhi sakte hai
Duniya mein jeene ke sirf do hi tareeke hai ... ya toh aadmi deewaron ke neeche dab jaye ... ya phir deewaron se upar uth jaye
Likhne waalon ke kalam toot gaye lekin meri kahaniyan phir bhi poori na ho saki
Yeh toofan toh soo raha tha aman ke badalon ko apna takiya banakar ... isse jagaya bhi tumne hai aur uthaya bhi tumne

Zulm ki talwar jab bhi mayaan se bahar nikalti hai ... toh pehla khoon insaaniyat ka behta hai ... fasaad ki aag jahan bhi lagti hai ... usmein saare ghar begunahon ke jalte hai ... khoon ki Holi khelte toh hai dushman ... lekin rang mazloomon ke lahu ka bahaya jaata hai
Aaj jee bharke mandir ke samne sar tek le ... iske baad yeh magroor sar na uthne ka kabil rahega na jhukne ke kabil
Yahi toh kamaal hai mohabbat ka ... woh insaan ko zulm ke andhere kuye se nikalkar aasman ki us chaukhat tak pahuncha deti hai ... jahan suraj bhi roshni ki bheek mangne aata hai
Zakhm teri chaati mein hoga ... aur khoon mere dil se bahega
Waqt ki chakki mein ek din zameen aur aasman pis jayenge ... lekin mohabbat ka nagma goonjta rahega ... hamesha goonjta rahega
Is ghar ko aag lag gayi ghar ke chirag se ... baat teri meri ban gayi tere dimaag se
Pyar woh sachai hai jiski dor mein sari duniya bandhi hui hai
Tum bahut khush kismat ho ... joh aaj tumne Shaka ki sirf muskurahat dekhi hai ... maathe pe padhe huye woh bal nahi dekhe ... joh zindagi ke khet mein maut ke hal chala dete hai

Mere andhar joh toofan uth raha hai is waqt ... jee chahta hai duniya ke saare diye bhuja doon ... mere dil ke andhar joh chitta jal rahi hai is waqt ... usmein sirf tumhari hi nahi, iski laash bhi chahiye
Mohabbat ke sailaab ke samne har deewar toot jaati hai
Aag se aag nahi bujhti ... naa hi zulm se zulm ka khatma ho sakta hai
Upar waale se dua maango ki duniya mein joh bhi toofan aaye sar se guzar jaye tumhare ... lekin is aandhi se tumhara paala kabhi na padhe
Tum Shaka ko zanjeeron ka jaal toh pehna sakte ho ... magar hamesha ke liye usse bandkar rakh nahi sakte

Jab tak tum jaise log is desh mein zinda hai ... tab tak sach bolne waalon ka dum ghutta rahega, hinsa ka gala dabta rahega ... lekin mere jeete jee main yeh nahi hone doonga ... main tum logon ke haath kaat daalonga aur gala ghoot doonga
Tumhari jaan mere liye bahut keemti hai ... magar meri jaan mere liye, tumhari jaan se zyada keemti hai
Logon ko apni cheezein cheenne dega ... toh log tumhari zindagi tak cheen lenge
Fiza bhi kuch nashe mein hai ... shabaab hai, sharaab hai ... joh yeh nahi toh zindagi azaab hi azaab hai
Dhan ko, hukumat ko mutthi mein rakhkar raj karne waale ameeron ko agar khatam kar diya jaye ... toh is duniya se ameeri aur gareebi ka farak hamesha hamesha ke liye khatam ho jayega
Ban gaya main bhi mazdoor aaj se ... aaj chutti hai, kaam karoonga kal se
Ishwar hazar gunah karne ke baad maaf kar deta hai ... lekin ek baar maa ka dil dukhao toh woh kabhi maaf nahi karta
Nahi dalenge hum haath izzat pe tumhari ... pehnayenge mangalsutra yahi khwaish hai hamari
Kiya aaj maine akalmandi ka kaam ... ticket lottery ka liya aur paya inaam ... sunke tum log hoge khushi se naach ... inaam mein mile mujhe rupai paanch

Jab insaan jawan hota hai toh usse samaaj aur society ki parvah hoti hai ... shaadi ke baad usse biwi bachon ki fikar hoti hai ... aur budhape mein toh sare parivar ki ... yahi toh insaan ki kamzori hai, yahi jeevan sangram hai ... jis mein rakht aur maas ka sangharsh nafrat aur mohabbat ke saath zindagi bhar chalta rehta hai
Agar baazuon mein imaan ki taqat, dilon mein sachai aur zubaan pe "Inquilab Zindabad" ka naara hai ... toh zindagi ki har maqsad hamare kadamon mein hoga
Bachche ka pet kharab hua toh usko julaab dena ... badhe ke dimaag kharab hua toh usko sharab dena
Bacha tha ek hi dost, uski bhi ho rahi hai shaadi ... yahan har mandap se ladki bhaagti hai, isse kehte hai barbaadi
Jabse dekha hai maine is daas ko ... na Shakespeare ko padha hai na Kalidas ko
Baandha na mangalsutra maine kabhi kisi ko ... tum ghabrao ya chillao, baandhonga main tumhi ko
Vishvas mat karna ispe, naqli hai iska jhanda ... kabhi kutte ke pet se nikla hai murgi ka unda?
Keechri uttare huye zeharilay saanp ko dekhkar reham khana ... aur paschatap ka dhong rachane waale zalim ko maaf karna jurm hai
Gabrana mat ab main loogna iski jaan ... isse gilori banake khaonga jaise ho Banarasi paan
Bina shaadi karvaye aap marne chale ... bandook haath mein li nahi jung ladne chale
Samundar ko reghistan mein badalna aur inquilab ki samadhi banana ... kisi ke bas mein nahi hai
Buddhoo samajhke karta hai meri maskari ... gusse mein aaonga toh kar donga teri kir-kiri
Jab tak yeh daulat sirf chand mutthi bhar logon ke haathon mein talwar bankar rahegi ... tab tak khudgarzi zinda rahegi
Bhoolkar bhi paise nahi deta mera baap ... kaise khareedon kaise padhon koi kitaab
Tum aadmi mamuli nahi bahut azeem ho ... agar yeh Anarkali hai toh tum uske Salim ho

Hamari jebon mein bhale hi daulat ki garmi na ho ... lekin hamare khoon mein bahut garmi hai, bahut jaan hai is mein ... tum logon ki tarah aircondition kamron mein bahetkar hamara khoon jam nahi gaya
Janam tera is duniya mein kabhi nahi hoga ... main shaadi nahi karoonga, tu paida kaise hoga?
Har aadmi ka kuch na kuch daam hota hai ... daam dedo, aadmi tumhara
Main marke bhi maroonga nahi ... tumhare andar zinda rahoonga
Halaat, kismatein, insaan, zindagi ... waqt ke saath saath sab badal jaata hai
Agar naali ke keeday ko duniya bhar ka sabun ikattha karke bhi saaf kiya jaye, usko dhoya jaye ... toh bhi woh gande ka ganda hi rahega
Itna maroonga, itna maroonga ki gali gali bheek maangti phiregi teri mundi
Main aapke ek ek paap, ek ek jurm ka pata lagaonga ... aur jab tak police aapko adalat nahi le jaati aur adalat aapko jail nahi bhejti ... main likhunga, main chaapunga

Maut zindagi ki har tasveer ka doosra rukh hai ... karam ache kiye ho toh maut achi milti hai ... pani ki tarah gale se utar jaati hai ... aur agar tumhare jaise karam bure kiye ho toh maut bhi buri hi milti hai ... ek sookhi roti ke tukde ki tarah gale mein atak jaati hai ... neeche nahi utarti
Insaan ke yeh do haath sirf do haath nahi hote balki uski poori zindagi hoti hai ... inhi do haathon se woh roti kamata hai, roti pakata hai aur roti khata hai
Paapi pet ka sawaal do dhari talwar hota hai ... joh dono taraf kaatta hai
Yeh duniya khel madari ka, chalaki ka, hoshyari ka ... jeevan ki bansi par dukh ka dumroo dekho deta kaisi taal hai ... bol madari kiske liye yeh behroopiye ka haal hai ... paapi pet ka sawaal hai
Talwar woh hathyar hai joh dost ke haath mein ho toh usse badkar koi dost nahi ... aur agar yahi talwar dushman ke haath lag jaye toh usse bura koi dushman nahi
Jinki ragon mein Rajputi khoon hota hai ... unke jism par dushman ke diye hue ghaav toh hote hai ... lekin unki talwar kafan ki tarah kori nahi hoti
Meri zindagi ek saaz ban gayi hai ... aur iske har taar par sirf tumhare hi pyar ka geet gaya ja sakta hai
Ek sacha musalman wafaa ke naam par jaan tak kurbaan kar deta hai ... magar gaddari ka taj pehenkar jee nahi sakta ... chahe us mein Kohinoor ka heera hi kyun na jada ho
Joh zanjeeron mein jakde hote hai woh hamesha gaddar nahi hote ... aur joh oonchi kursiyon par behte hote hai woh hamesha wafaadar nahi hote
Aapke liye main zehar ko dhood ki tarah pee sakta hoon ... lekin apne khoon mein aapke liye dushmani ke keeday nahi paal sakta
Mera dil us mandir ki tarah hai jis mein ek baar joh murti bitha di jaati hai ... zindagi bhar ussi ki pooja ki jaati hai
Ujhde hue gulshan mein dekho aaj kaliyan khil gayi ... ek ko chahte the hum aur do do mil gayi

Rajput ladki apne pyar ko keemti heeron ki tarah dil ki tijori mein band karke rakhti hai ... aur upar laga rehta hai sharam ka fauladi taala ... joh kabhi tootta hai toh sirf maut ke hathodon se tootta hai
Jisne mere bhai ka khoon bahaya hai ... main usse uske khoon mein nehlake rakh doonga
Sachai ki ek hi zaat hoti hai, ek hi nasal hoti hai ... sachai darbar mein bhi wohi hoti hai, bazar mein bhi wohi hoti hai
Yeh insaan nahi hai ... yeh toh machine hai ... aaisi machine joh sirf note chaapti hai aur note khaati hai
Sharaab ki botal pe agar main label ki tarah chipak gaya hoon ... toh is label ko chipkane waale aap hai
Kalakar sirf taarif ka bhooka hota hai ... paise ka nahi
Aaj itni bhi maisir nahi maikhane mein ... jitni hum chhod diya karte the paimane mein
Main ek kalakar hoon ... makkar nahi
Jigar ka dard upar se kahin malum hota hai? ... ki jigar dard upar se nahin malum hota hai
Aap bhi itna samajh le mujhko samjhane ke baad ... aadmi majboor ho jaata hai dil aane ke baad
Aaj ki duniya mein agar zinda rehna hai ... toh duniya ke button apne haath mein rakhne parte hai
Aaj kal ke daud mein hasi ki phasal ughti kahan hai
Jinka apna dil toota hota hai ... woh auron ka dil nahi todha karte
Mooche ho to Nathulalji jaise ho ... varna na ho
Jisne pee nahi whiskey ... kismat phoot gayi uski
Duniya ke samne haath nahi jodhte ... warna kaam nikal jaane ke baad duniya waale haath todh dete hai
Sharaabi ko sharaabi nahi toh kya pujari kahoge ... gehun ko gehun nahi toh kya jwari kahoge
Vaade aksar toot jaate hai ... koshishien kamyab ho jaati hai
Tofha dene waale ki neeyat dekhi jaati hai ... tofhe ki keemat nahi dekhi jaati
Dar badar sarr patakne se bhala kya hoga ... wahi hoga joh taqdeer mein likha hoga
Samundar mein tairne waale ... kuon aur talaabon mein dupkiyan nahi lagaya karte
Aapne mujhe woh sab diya jise bazar se khareed ke ek ghar mein sajaya ja sakta hai ... magar woh sukh kabhi nahi diya jise ek dil mein sajaya ja sake
Hamari zindagi ka tambu teen bambuon pe khada hua hai ... Poem, sharaab aur aap
Inki taarif kya karen ... yeh toh sarr se paun tak taarif hi taarif hai
Ishq ki kismat ka faisla khud ishq hi karta hai ... koi doosra nahi
Taqdeer ke likhe ko aankhon ka pani nahi dho sakta
Mohabbat kabhi nahi marti ... mohabbat ko koi nahi maar sakta ... mohabbat ke phool hamesha khile rahenge
Dil koi bartan nahi hai ... jisse apni marzi se banaya aur toda ja sake
Har manzil ek naye safar ki shuruvat hoti hai
Pyar ka naam hai judaai ... yahi judaai pyar ka inaam bhi hai aur pyar ki sazaa bhi
Tab tak mere samne mat aana jab tak meri aankhen na kamzor ho jaye
Vishvas aur himmat do aaisi taqatein hai ... joh namumkin ko mumkin bana sakti hai
Milna bichadna jeevan ki reet hai ... do pehlu hai ... ek gham ka doosra khushi ka
Hindustani businessman ki ek bahut badi khoobi hai ... woh kam se kam paisa dekar achche se achcha result maangta hai
Aapka kanoon kisi insaan ko ek hi jurm ke liye do baar sazaa nahi de sakta
Maine usse maara bhi nahi ... aur maar bhi dala
Allah re jism-e-yaar ki khoobi ke khud-ba-khud ... rangeeniyon mein doob gaya pairahan tamaam
Kanoon itna maila hai ... ki usse apne haath mein lekar main apna haath ganda karna chahta bhi nahi
Ek maut tere gunaahon ke sazaa ke liye kaafi nahi
Maut se kiski rishteydari hai ... aaj hamari kal tumhari baari hai
Aaj tak woh rassi hi nahi batti gayi ... joh mujhe phansi laga sake
Pyar bhari zindagi ka ek pal ... bina pyar ki sadiyon se kahi bada hota hai
