Pati patni ka rishta faulad se zyada mazboot hota hai ... joh lakhon hathodon ke zor se bhi toda nahi ja sakta ... aur kabhi kabhi ek phool se zyada nazuk hota hai ... joh saans ki garmi se bhi ulaz-julaz jaye
Duniya mein sabse buri aag badle ki aag hoti hai ... chahe woh kisi insaan mein ho ya janwar mein
Yeh aankhen kisi aur ko dikhana ... varna tumhare is chaupte se yeh do button nikalkar apne kurte mein fit kar doonga
Nastik ko aastik banana uparwaale ka bayen haath ka khel hai
Shaadi ek yagya hota hai ... jis mein aadmi ko sukh paane ke liye apne ahankar ki aahuti deni padti hai
Maika ladki ke liye ek sarai jaisa hota hai ... jahan aadmi raat bhar aaram toh kar sakta hai ... lekin zindagi bhar ka thikana nahi kar sakta
Aankhon hi aankhon mein ishaare ho gaye ... hum tumhare aur tum hamare ho gaye
Nagin ka nasha sharaab aur aurat ke nashe se zyada hota hai
Bhagyawan wohi hoti hai joh do kandhon pe savaar apne babul ke ghar se jaati hai ... aur char kandhon pe savaar apne dulha ke ghar se nikalti hai
Mard do zaat ke hote hai ... ek joh bewakoof pehda hote hai ... doosre joh bewakoof banaye jaate hai
Dharam ki aag se dil ke chirag jalte hai ... bhatakne waale issi roshni mein jalte hai
Insaan ki sabse badi daulat hai uski insaaniyat, uska character

Dhan daulat ko chalti phirti chaya kaha gaya hai ... aaj hai toh kal nahi ... fakr toh us daulat pe kiya jaye joh kabhi insaan ka saath na chhode ... aur woh hai sachai aur imaan ki daulat ... insaaniyat, daya aur dharam ki daulat
Yeh duniya than-than gopal ki hai ... jiske paas rupaiya nahi woh kuch nahi
Aadmi ki achchai, uska character tab puja jaata hai jab uske paas rupaiya ho ... jab rupaiya paas na rahe toh aam logon ki nazar badal jaati hai
Jise mile qadardan aaisi sundar ... woh prani hai naseeb ka sikandar
Woh pyar hi kya joh samay ke parivartan ke saath badal jaye
Zindagi bhi ajeeb hai ... koi kisi ke itna kareeb hote huye bhi kabhi kabhi kitna door nazar aane lagta hai
Tum jaisi patni pakar apni taqdeer ki aarti utaarne ko dil chahta hai
Zabaan aadmi ko neecha dikha deti hai ... usse zyada nahi chalana chahiye
Andhe paramatma ko pehchante hai ... aur aankhon waale aadhe ko bhi nahi pehchante
Sukh na rahe toh dukh apas mein milkar baant lena chahiye
Stree ka bhagya muskurata hai toh tum jaisa pati milta hai
Zindagi ki cricket mein draw nahi hota ... ya toh jeet hoti hai ya haar ... aur jeet ussi ki hoti hai joh upar hai ... aur upar wahi hai joh neeche nahi hai
Pyar paane ke liye koi bhi tareeka najayaz nahi hai
Begum, ishq ka mazaa hi chupke chupke se karne mein hai
Actor kya hai? ... director ke haath ki kathputli
Pati ke gunn dheere dheere pata chalna chahiye ... usse pyar dheere dheere bhadta hai
Climax mein pahuchakar Dramatic ke chutti mat karao
Joh hai woh nahin hai ... aur joh nahin hai woh, woh kaise ho sakta hai?
Jhinga machi, machi hai ... lekin machi nahin, jhinga hai ... khoa ki barfi, barfi hai ... lekin barfi nahin, khoa hai
Jitna bada jism diya hai ... utna bada dil bhi diya hai
Main aaj bhi phenke hue paise nahin uthata
Mere paas maa hai

Koi is liye pee raha hai ki din bhar kaam kiya, thak gaye ... koi is liye pee raha hai ki aaj din bhar kuch nahi kiya, bore ho gaye ... koi is liye pee raha hai ki aaj doston ke saath hai ... aur koi is liye pee raha hai ki aaj dost saath nahi
Aaj khush to bahut hoge tum?
Jab tak ek bhai bol raha hai, ek bhai sun raha hai ... jab ek mujrim bolega, ek police officer sunega
Main jab bhi kisise dushmani mod leta hoon ... saste mehenge ki parvah nahi karta
Isse apni jeb mein rakh le Peter ... ab yeh taala main teri jeb se chabi nikaalkar hi kholoonga
Zyada paisa aaye toh neend nahi aati ... neend aaye toh zyada paisa nahi aata
Sapne bhi samundar ki leharon ki tarah ... haqeeqat ki chattanon se takraate hi toot jaate hain
Jao pehle us aadmi ka sign lekar aao jisne mere haath pe yeh likh diya tha ... uske baad mere bhai tum jis kagaz pe kahoge main uspe sign kar doonga
Suna hai lift ki deewaaron ke kaan nahin hote
Aaj mere paas buildingey hai, property hai, bank balance hai, bungla hai, gaadi hai ... kya hai, kya hai tumhare pass?
Bhai, tum sign karoge ya nahin?
Tu abhi itna amir nahi hua beta ... ki apni maa ko khareed sake
Yeh duniya ek third class ka dibba ban gayi hai ... jagah bahut kam hai, musafir zyada
Car se aane waale aksar derr se aate hai
Jis raaste par main chal raha hoon uska anjaam shayad bura bhi ho sakta hai ... lekin jis raaste pe tum chal rahe ho uska anjaam sirf bura hi hota hai bhai
Paisa nahi toh kuch aur sahi ... har insaan ki koi na koi kamzori zaroor hoti hai
Uff tumhare ussool, tumhare adarsh ... kis kaam ke hai tumhare ussool ... tumhare saare ussoolon ko goond kar ek waqt ki roti nahi banayi ja sakti
Jis kaam ke liye aapne mujhe rakha hai ... woh kaam kaise kiya jayega ... yeh soochna bhi mera kaam hai
Tumhari jaisi ladkiyan apna naam ... kapdon ki tarah badalti hai
Meri maa mujhe wapas dedo
Achai ki koi seema nahi hoti ... aur burai ka koi anth nahi
Yeh aurat jaat hi aaisi hoti hai ... baat ka batangar bana deti hai, rai ka pahaad aur bedh ka sava-ser
Zindagi mein sirf khushiya baanti jaati hai ... gham ka bhoj har insaan ko akele hi dhona padta hai
Joh log talwar ke zor par zinda rehte hai ... ek din unki gardan uss hi talwar se katti hai
Chori chahe ek paise ki ho yah lakh rupaiye ki ... chori, chori hai
Main roz kanoon banata hoon aur roz todhta hoon
Inteqaam ek aaisi sharaab hai ... yeh jitni purani hogi iska nasha utna hi tezz hoga
Bhaagne ka naam jawani ... aur tham gayi toh thehra pani
Kanoon, kanoon, kanoon ... kaunsa kanoon ... main apne liye khud kanoon hoon
Is trigger ke har tick ke saath tere chehre pe maut ka naksha ubrega ... lekin maut is revolver ke kis ghar mein hai ... yeh sirf maut ka farishta jaanta hai
Maut hi ek aaisi sachchai hai joh atal hai ... jisse koi bhaag nahi sakta
Tumhare dil ki, mere dil ki, sari duniya ke dil ki ek hi awaaz hai ... rupaiya, rupaiya, rupaiya
Shut-up kehne waali ladkiyan toh sabse zyada pyar karti hai
Ladki hai ki whiskey ki botal ... dekhte hi nasha aa gaya
Abhe oh tan-tambure ... barsaati kan-khajure!
Humse poocho ki haqeeqat kya hai ... tum jisse apni mohabbat de do, usko daulat ki zaroorat kya hai
Uljhe dhaagon ka sera toh mil jaata hai ... lekin uljhi zindagi ka sera badi mushkil se milta hai
Aurat aur sharaab dono mein koi farak nahi ... dono ka kaam hai aag lagana
Poocha unse ishq kiya kya yeh koi paap hai ... usne kaha chup raho tere peeche khada mere baap hai
Mere khwaabon ke jharokhon ko sajane waali ... tere khwaabon mein kahin mera guzar hai ki nahi
Chale the zamaane se mooh pherkar ... yaka-yak tera saamna ho gaya
Taar is majnoon ka aaya mujhe Holland se ... Sonia ji sair karke aa gayi England se
Beheto toh mehbooba ki sar aankhon par beheto ... leto toh mehbooba ki aagosh mein leto ... varna kuch nahi, khade raho
Miya biwi ke Love ko censor board bhi nahi kaat sakta
Jhoot ki zubaan lambi hoti hai ... umar nahi
Mirchi mooh na lage toh bhali ... jitna kaatenge utna si-si karenge ... mirchi uff nahi karegi
Jaaneman tum mere itne kareeb ho ki main haath badakar tumhe chu sakta hoon ... lekin itni door ho ki dil ki baat hoothon se keh nahi sakta
Bina qazi ke kar liya raazi ... tauba tauba, yeh aapki jaldbaazi
Pyar aur sadbhavna ki badi se badi deewar bhi ... zindagi aur maut ke beech nahi khadi ho sakti hai
Char-aane kamane ke liye aath-aane ka jhoot bolna padta hai
Chook gaye do nain se aur thokaren kha gaye paon ... moorakh mukhiya bhool kare aur bhugte saara gaon
Punya kamaye kikri aur peepal daan kare ... jungle jaisa vaid kahan joh sabka dhyan kare
Kaam kare so soonth kare aur kuch kare afeem ... karmo ki gath prani bhukte theli bhare hakeem
Dosti achchi ya buri nahi hoti ... dost achche ya bure hote hai
Waqt ke saath saath aadmi thoda bahut zaroor badalna chahiye ... varna waqt burra maan jaata hai
Aaj kal achche chawal ki tarah ... achche ladke bhi black mein milte hai
Janam se Haridwar ka panda aur mooh mein murgi ka anda
Saanp ka kaata kam se kam mar toh jaata hai ... lekin aurat ka sataya na mar sakta hai, na jee sakta hai
Aaj raat ke baad jab subah ka suraj niklega ... toh hamare bistar ki shikan ko dekhkar badalon mein mooh chupa lega
Jisne sachche dil se Ramayan aur Gita ka paath kiya ho ... uske shabdon ki laaj bhagwan ko bhi rakhni padti hai
Aurat ka swarg uske pati ki charno mein hai, shaadi ke pavitra bandhan mein hai ... pyar ki khokli duniya mein nahi
Sukhi jeevan ka ek hi marg hai ... aur woh hai madhyam marg
Duniya mein pyar ka jawab pyar hota hai ... aur nafrat ka jawab hota hai nafrat
Jaise Bhagirathi aur Alaknanda ke sangam se Ganga ki pavitra dhara ka janam hota hai ... waise hi hamare milan se is aane waali pavitra santaan ka hoga
Khoobsurat ladki ki baat par aitbaar na karne waala mard nahi kehlata
Maut ko ek baar dhokha dene se ... zindagi lambi nahi ho jaati
Joh main hoon woh main nahi hoon ... joh main nahi hoon woh main bilkul nahi hoon ... joh main bilkul nahi hoon woh main hoon
Ajeeb nyay hai bhagwan ka bhi ... jinko bhook deta hai unko khane ko nahi deta ... aur jinko khane ko deta hai unko bhook nahi deta
Pet anaaj se nahi bharta ... pyar se bharta hai
Hum waqt ka intezaar nahi karte ... waqt hamara intezaar karta hai
Gabbar ke taap se tumhe ek hi aadmi bacha sakta hai, ek hi aadmi ... khud Gabbar
Basanti in kutto ke samne mat nachna
Tumhara naam kya hai Basanti?
Arrey oh Sambha ... kitna inaam rakhe hai sarkar ham par?
Kitney aadmi the?
Bahut yaraana lagta hai
Jab tak tere pair chalenge uski saans chalegi ... tere pair ruke toh yeh bandook chalegi
Aadhe idhar jao ... aadhe idhar jao ... aur baaki hamare saath aao
Tera kya hoga Kaalia?
Hum kaam sirf paison ke liye karte hai
Joh darr gaya ... samjho marr gaya
When I dead, police coming ... police coming, budiya going jail ... in jail budiya chakki peesing, and peesing, and peesing, and peesing, and peesing
Chal Dhanno ... aaj teri Basanti ki izzat ka sawaal hai
Mujhe toh sab police waalon ki suratein ek jaisi lagti hai
Hum angrezon ke zamaane ke jailor hai
Itna sannata kyun hai bhai?
Yeh haath humko de de Thakur
Yunki, yeh kaun bola?
Yahan se pachas pachas kos door gaon mein ... jab bachcha raat ko rota hai, toh maa kehti hai bete soo ja ... soo ja nahi toh Gabbar Singh aa jayega
Holi kab hai ... kab hai Holi, kab?
Dekho, mujhe befuzool baat karne ki aadat toh hai nahi
Tum agar ek maaroge toh hum char maarenge
Ab goli kha
Soowar ke bachcho!
Yeh Ramgarh waale apni betiyon ko kaun chakki ka pisa aata khilate hai re?
Loha garam hai ... maar do hathauda
Ramgarh waalo ne pagal kutton ke samne roti dalna band kar diya hai
Ek ek ko chun chun ke maaronga ... chun chun ke maaronga
Kya samajhkar aaye the ... ki sardar bahut khush hoga, shabashi dega?
Yeh haath nahi ... phansi ka phanda hai
Sardar maine aapka namak khaya hai
Iski sazaa milegi ... barabar milegi!
Thakur na jhuk sakta hai na toot sakta hai ... Thakur sirf marr sakta hai
Hamari jail mein surang?
Paise ... aaise kaise paise maang rahe ho?
Keemat joh tum chaho ... kaam joh main chahon
Woh badmash hai lekin bahadur hai ... khatarnak hai is liye ki ladna jaante hai ... burre hai magar insaan hai
Is story mein emotion hai, Dramatic hai, tragedy hai
Izzat ki maut zillat ki zindagi se kahin achchi hai
Is pistol mein teen zindagi, teen maut bandh hai ... dekhen kisse kya milta hai
Che goli aur aadmi teen ... bahut nainsaafi hai yeh
Saanp ko haath se nahi ... pairon se kuchla jaata hai
Jis din main bhaag nikla ... bahut pachtaoge Thakur
Bach gaya saala!
Hamare jasoos is jail mein charon taraf failay hue hai
Inquilaab bhookhe pet se pehda hota hai ... aur inquilaab ki aag bade bade rajmahalon ko jalakar khaakh kar daalti hai
Aurat maa ban sakti hai, behan ban sakti hai, biwi ban sakti hai ... lekin dost kabhi nahi ... aur jab woh dost ban jaati hai toh badi khatarnak hoti hai
Sadu, samay aur jal kabhi ek jagah nahi tikte ... suraj ki tarah chalte hi rehte hai
Joh talwar ke sahare jeeta hai ... woh talwar se hi maara jaata hai
Talwar insaan ki raksha ke liye hoti hai ... hatya ke liye nahi
Is duniya mein kabhi kabhi insaan itna majboor ho jaata hai ... sivah iske ke woh apne aapko kismat ke havale karde ... aur kuch nahi kar sakta
Jinki zindagi maut ki chaon mein guzri ho ... woh maut se kahan darte hai
Dukh toh sabhi ki zindagi mein hota hai ... kisi ko bin maange mil jaata hai meri tarah ... aur koi jaan-mooch ke modh le leta hai tumhari tarah
Tum mere jeevan mein us rog ki tarah ho ... jis mein aadmi ghulta rehta hai, tadapta rehta hai ... na jee sakta hai, na mar sakta hai
Dost ki galati bhi dosti ki saughat hoti hai
Shaadi shuda zindagi ki buniyad hai ... pati aur patni ka ek doosre par atal vishvas
Tera shaq tujhe kha gaya ... ek chingari aag bani aur ek insaan jal gaya
School aur college ka imtihaan khatam hone se student life khatam nahi hoti ... zindagi ke har modh par har insaan ek student hai
Jhoot ki raakh se sachai ki aag ko nahi bhujaya jaa sakta
Sachai par chalne waala insaan ... waqt aane par gundon se kahin zyada khatarnak ban jaata hai
Pahadon se bhid jaane par bhi hridhay utna dukhi nahi hota ... jitna swabhimaan ko thes lagne par hota hai
Kroadh ko hi tej manne waala tejasvi nahi ... usse jeetne waala tejasvi aur shaktishali hota hai
Pran dene se paap ka anth nahi hota ... punya ke prabhav se hota hai
Sansaar mein gangajal se paap dhone ke saath saath ... punya ki bhi dhaara bahao
Agyaanta mein kiye gaye paap ... shama ke yog hote hai aur punya phaldayak
Intezari ka waqt aur dil se bahut taluk hota hai ... jab humne intezar kiya toh unka dil nahi tha ... aur jab unhone intezar kiya toh hamara dil nahi tha

Ghar ek qila ki tarah hota hai ... aur us mein basne waale log maa, baap, bhai, behen, bachche uski deewar ... kisi bhi deewar mein zara si bhi daraar padh jaye ... toh deewar hi nahi gir jaati balki ghar hi toot girta hai
Agar ichcha mein bal ho toh woh azaad hoti hai ... aur shakti bhi azaadi se aati hai, bandish se nahi
Duniya mein har cheez bik sakti hai ... lekin gareeb ka samman nahi
Jis tarah ladki ka thopda bighad jaane se usse dulha nahi milta na ... ussi tarah gadi ka thopda bighad jaane se usse savari nahi milti
Issi ka naam zindagi hai ... koi jaata hai, koi aata hai ... koi khota hai toh koi paata hai ... lekin yeh zindagi apni raftaar se chalti rehti hai
Gareebi se sharmana, usse nafrat karna ... sabse bada apradh hai
Paise ka koi rang nahi, roop nahi ... koi dharam nahi, imaan nahi ... koi punya nahi, paap nahi
Ladki ke liye jail jaana ek aaisa daag hai ... joh maut bhi usse nahi mitta sakti
Aurat tawaif vichaaron se banti hai ... peshe se nahi
Chaku chalane ke liye kalai nahi kaleja chahiye ... joh bazaar mein nahi bikta
Armaan dabaye ja sakte hai, chupaye ja sakte hai ... lekin jalaye nahi ja sakte
Chaku aur churi ke bal pe jeene waale log ... ek din khud chaku churi ke neeche aa jaate hai
Petrol ka bhav badh gaya ... tarkaari ka bhav badh gaya ... tera bhav bhi badh gaya kya?
Inhe aaisa kadva aadmi hai ki agar ganderi khake thukenga ... toh uspe makkhi bhi nahi behethengi
Mujhe aaj tak kisi ka khoon karne ki zaroorat hi nahin padi
Maine revolver pehli baar uthaya hai ... lekin itna jaanta hoon ki trigger dabane se goli chalti hai
Ek taraf maut hai ... doosri taraf maut se battar zindagi
Itni aasani se tujhe maut nahi aane waali ... tujhe toh jail ki kali kothri mein maut ka intezaar karna padega
Ek khoon ki saza phansi ... aur do khoon ki saza bhi sirf phansi

column3: Apne kasoor ki sazaa se kisi bekasoor ko bachane ke liye ... main maut se bhi takkar le lunga

column3: Raghukul reet sada chali aayi ... pran jaye par vachan na jayi

column3: Humne toh sari duniya mein yahi suna tha ... Hindustan ki hasinayen aankhon se pilakar hosh uda deti hai ... tum yeh whiskey kyun pila rahi ho?

column3: Mard woh hota hai ... jiske choone se murda aurat ke badan mein bijli chamak jaye

column2: Pran Jaye Par Vachan Na Jaye
column3: Tum jaise namardo ko maarne ke liye ... meri maa ke paon ka ek kada hi kafi hai

column2: Pran Jaye Par Vachan Na Jaye
column3: Joh tu bhojan na kar raha hota ... toh aaj tu narak ka bhojan ban gaya hota

column3: Tujh paapi ke saath pal bhar ki zindagi se hazar baar marna behtar hai

column2: Pran Jaye Par Vachan Na Jaye
column3: Main vaishya nahi hoon ... mera naseeb vaishya hai

Insaan ko dil de, jism de, dimaag de lekin yeh kambakht pet mat de ... usse pet deta hai toh usse bhook mat de ... usse bhook deta hai toh do waqt ki roti ka intezam karke bhej ... varna tujhe insaan ko paida karne ka koi haq nahi hai
Aadmi ke seene mein khanjar bhokane se woh sirf ek baar marta hai ... lekin jab kisi ka dil tootta hai na toh usse bar-bar marna padta hai, har roz marna padta hai

Agar is samaaj aur society se paap aur gunaah ko hamesha ke liye khatam karna hai ... toh un shaitano ko khatam karna hoga joh chand sikkon ki khatir gareebon ki sharafat aur insaaniyat khareedkar unke dilon mein gunaah ka bheej bohte hai ... paap ke saaye mein unki parvarish karte hai ... logon ka khoon pilakar unhe badne par majboor karte hai

Roti roti mein bhi farak hota hai mere dost ... ek roti woh hoti hai joh cheenke khai jaati hai jis mein kisi ke khoon ki boo aati hai ... lekin mujhe woh roti chahiye jis mein kisi ke khoon ki boo nahi, balki mere paseene ki mehak aati ho
Kasoor mera nahi roti ki kasam ... bhook ki duniya mein imaan badal jaate hai
(Kaun ho tum?) ... Kahi naam hai mere ... gareeb maa baap mujhe apna beta kehte hai, mazloom ladkiyan apna bhai ... besahare yateemon ka dost hoon aur zalimon ka dushman
Joh aadmi chori karke bhaagte huye pakda jaaye ... woh zindagi bhar bhaagta rehta hai
Yeh mat socho ke desh tumhe kya deta hai ... socho yeh ke tum desh ko kya de sakte ho
Pyar ki kahani ek aisa pinjra hai jis mein mann ka panchi pharphara toh sakta hai ... magar nikal nahi sakta
Meri janam patri, meri kundli, yeh degree hai ... aur iski kismat mein kitne rahu hai kitne ketu, yeh koi jyotshi nahi jaanta
Khushi ke mauke par dard bhara geet chedna ... badi manhoos si baat hoti hai
Naukri mile toh degree, degree ... nahi toh bigdree, bigdree
Jiski zindagi par kalank lag jaye na ... usse duniya door bhaagti hai
Halaat jab jakad lete hai toh insaan buri se buri baat sochta hai
Joh insaan choti choti khushi ko dhoondta ho ... uske samne khushiyon ka bhandaar khul jaye ... toh usse yakeen nahi aata
Do pyar karne waale jab phir se mil jaaye ... toh teesra pyar karne waala kabhi dukhi nahi hota
Roti, kapada aur makaan par kabza karne waalon ke dil ... choohe jaise hai
Sach aur jhoot toh insaan ke chehre par likha hota hai
Pehle main akela tha ... aur ab bilkul akela hoon
Jab geet swayam ke liye gaya jaata hai ... toh sangeet ho jaata hai
Chahe mujhe zindagi bhar tumhe talaash karna padhe ... main tumhe dhoondunga zaroor ... aur phir joh tumhara haal karoonga ... usse dekhkar tumhare farishtey bhi kaanp uthenge
Jee toh janwar bhi lete hai ... lekin insaan ussi ko kehte hai joh samajhdari se jee sake
Khoj ek nasha hai, ek ishq hai ... jis mein khoj karne waala khoya rehta hai
Taqatwar se taqatwar insaan bhi kuch ghadiyon mein kamzor se kamzor ho jaata hai
Badle badle mere sarkar nazar aate hai ... aur mujhko barbaadi ke aasaar nazar aate hai
Mohabbat ek kaanta hai joh bas chukar toot jaye ... mohabbat ki bas itni dastaan hai
Prem naam hai mera ... Prem Chopra
Kisi khoobsurat ladki ko dekh kar koi chede nahi ... toh hamari society mein badtameezi mani jaati hai
Garmi mein garam chai, thandak pahunchati hai

Kunwari ladki ek patang ki tarah hoti hai ... joh shaadi se pehle apni marzi se khuli hawa mein idhar udhar udhti phirti hai ... lekin phir kismat ki patang se pech ladta hai ... aur woh katkar apne pati ki aangan mein aa girti hai
Chaand suraj apni jagah se hat sakte hai ... lekin Thakur apne vaade se nahi palat sakta
Ladki ki maang tab khoobsurat hoti hai ... jab uska pati us mein sindoor bhar deta hai

Joh aaj naya hai, kal purana ho jayega ... joh aaj purana hai, kal naya bankar samne aayega
Har dayaar mein aati hai phir bahaar ... khilte hai phool bhi wahan daur-e-fiza ke baad
Haste huye insaan ke saath saari duniya hasti hai ... lekin jab woh rota hai toh akela rota hai
Talash zindagi ka doosra naam hai ... kisi ko rozi ki talash hai aur kisi ko chain aur sukoon ki

Haya se sar jhuka lena, ada se muskura dena ... haseeno ko bhi kitna sehal hai, bijli gira dena
Chaman mein ikhtalat-e-rangboo se baat banti hai ... hum hi hum hai toh kya hum hai ... tum hi tum ho toh kya tum ho
Jee haan baza huzoor kiye ja raha hoon main ... aur maska laga lagake jeeye ja raha hoon main

Jise dost ka haath thaam le aur maa ka aashirwad mil jaye ... woh zindagi ki har manzil tay kar sakta hai
Ek maa ke dil ka sabse bada armaan ... bete ka byah hota hai
Jiyo toh sabke liye ... maro toh sabke liye
Main jhoot bolkar bhi pachtai ... aur sach bolkar bhi pachtati rahoongi
Ab mera rasta maut ki thokar bhi nahi rok sakti
Agar duniya mein maut se badi sachai koi nahi ... toh sach maniye aapko dhoka dekar meri zindagi bhi maut se kam nahi
Kanoon ka matlab agar mulzim ko sazaa dena hai ... toh begunah ko sazaa se bachana bhi
Is waqt meri maa, mera dharam, mera bhagwan ... joh kuch hai paisa hai
Zindagi ki mushkil marke asaan nahi hoti  hai ... himmat se asaan hoti hai
Main janta hoon joh kuch bhi isne kiya usse koi maaf nahi kar sakta ... bhagwan bhi nahi ... lekin ek maa maaf kar sakti hai
Main maut se nahi darti ... maut se usse darr lagta hai jise zindagi se pyar ho ... aur zindagi se usse pyar hota hai jise zindagi ne kuch diya ho
Jhoot bolkar khud pachtane waala ... sach bolkar kabhi kisi ko pachtane nahi deta
Mujhpar tere roop ka jaadu hai bekaar ... kaam hai tera naachna, naach bhare darbar
Payal waali ruk wahin, na ho bahut magroor ... moorakh hai joh chal padhe, apni hadh se door
Woh toh chalte hai seena ubharke ... kyun na loote maaze vasl-e-yaar ke
Basakar dilon ko mittati hai duniya ... hasakar hamesha rulati hai duniya

Tune sab paaya hai, aashiq ki nazar paayi nahi ... jabse dekha tujhko duniya ki taraf dekha nahi ... jabse chaha tujhko apni yaad bhi aayi nahi ... tukhjo paana zindagi hai, tujhko khona maut hai ... aur kuch iske sivah mere fasaane mein nahi ... maang loonga mein khuda se yah chura loonga tujhe ... tujhsa moti doosra uske khazane mein nahi
Laila ke aangan mein joh bhangra ho gaya ... Majnu naacha aur yoon naacha ke langda ho gaya
Kya milega bhala rulaake mujhe ... paoge kya jala jalake mujhe

Kyun matakti hai bahut ... aaj tanhayi khatakti hai bahut
Ishq jis mein basa nahi rehta ... aaise dil mein khuda nahi rehta
Kaunsi gutthi hai woh joh humne suljahi nahi ... aaisi fariyaad aaj tak darbar mein aayi nahi
Tu jab aa jaati hai paas ... bhook mar jaati hai, jaag uthti hai pyaas

Zara yeh raat dhalne de, nasha tera utaroonga ... jawaani bhool jaye ishq, tujhko aaise maroonga ... andhere mein agar maara toh kehlaonga main buzdil ... tadap le raat bhar, pehli kiran hogi teri kaatil
Sharmati hai kyun aaj meri baahon mein aake ... le jaonga ek din tujhe doli mein bithake
Kya khadi baatein banati hai ... khuda ka khauf kar, kyun aag is ghar mein lagati hai ... zara soorat toh dekh apni, tujhe Raanjha satayega ... tu jis raste se guzregi, woh us raste na jayega

Usse kehna ke tum mera ek khwab ho, joh chamakta hai dil mein woh mahatab ho ... usse kehna ke gehuyon ke kheton ka rang, tilmilati hui titliyon ki umang ... usse kehna ke jharnon ka chanchal shabaab, ghat ki taazgi, aabroo-e-janab ... usse kehna ke jhoolon ki angdaiyan aur udhte dupatton ki shenaiyan ... usse kehna ki chakki ke geeton ki aag, ladkhadati jawaani, machalta suhaag ... usse kehna ke dulhanon ke kajal ki pyaas, pehle bhose ki garm aur thandi mithaas ... itni ranginiyon ko jab ikhja kiya, Heer kudrat ne tab tujhko pehda kiya
Meri subahon ko roshni dedo ... meri shaamon ko chandni dedo ... mujhko tum meri zindagi dedo
Doli se main jab utroongi hairan na hona ... mar jaon khushi se toh pareshan na hona

Doori kabhi palbhar ko gawara na karenge ... agar jee na sake saath toh hum saath marenge

Ishq se joh bacha nahi rehta ... woh kisi kaam ka nahi rehta

Chandni aanchal mein bhar layi hai tu ... raat yeh chamki hai jab aayi hai tu
Meri nazar ne husn ka jadoo jaga diya ... tujhko sajaake aur bhi katil bana diya

Makkhiyan behte na kyun kabar pe saudai ki ... uski mashooq thi beti kisi halwai ki
Chand ubharta hua, bujhte huye chehre dekho ... chandni chhitki hai, cha jaye andhera jaise ... is tarah tootkar bhikre hai zameen par sapne ... lut gaya ho kisi baraat ka dera jaise
Kismat hai ki zinda bach gaye pyare ... na jaane dakuyon ne is jagah kitne jawaan maare

Yeh badi badi aankhen, yeh rasile honth, yeh gora gora rang ... jism hai ki samundar ki leheren ... yahan uthti hui, yahan girti hui, yahan uthti hui, yahan girti hui ... jee chahta hai bas dekhta hi rahoon

Tumhe dekhte hi mere dil ka diwala aaisa nikal gaya hai jaise kisi satodiya ka nikal jaata hai ... aur mere jeevan ka karobar poora beh gaya hai ... yeh tabhi chalega jab tum apne prem ka finance mujhe dogi
Haath bhi diya, zubaan bhi di, dil bhi diya ... ab haath chhodana nahi, zubaan se phirna nahi, dil todna nahi
Tumhe dekhne ke pehle mera dil is aaine ki tarah bilkul kora tha ... jabse tumko dekh liya tumhari tasveer is dil ne kheench li
Bhagwan aur chahe kuch banaye ... par aadmi ko pagal na banaye
Ladkiyan do tarah ki hoti hai ... ek tumhare jaisi jiske aate hi ghar mein ujala ho jaata hai ... aur doosri woh jiske jaate hi ghar mein diwala ho jaata hai
Yeh mitti pyasi hai, jis din iski pyaas bhuj jayegi ... yeh mitti sona ban jayegi
Mein kal ke bare mein kabhi bhi nahi sochti ... ho rahega kuch na kuch ghabrayen kya ... zindagi sirf ek ittefaq ka naam hai
Sahare insaan ko kamzor bana dete hai
Hamare haath se naseeb waale hi marte hai
Mann ko jalane se dukh door nahi hota hai ... dukh ko toh koshish karke bhulana padta hai
Apne bachchon ke khatir kabhi na kabhi har maa ko rona padta hai ... koi aasoon bahakar roti hai aur koi aasoon peekar
Prem mein mazaa hi tab aata hai jab ladki gusse waali ho
Yakeen nahi aata toh poocho in barfilay pahadon se, in nadi ki leharon se, in baharon se ... hum dono ke dilon ki awaaz ek hai, joh saath saath milkar in vaadiyon mein goonj uthegi
Ek chota sa zakhm bahut gehra daag ban sakta hai ... aur ek choti si mulaqat jeevan bhar ka saath ban sakti hai
Aaj main sari duniya ke samne sar uthake keh sakta hoon ... najane kitne janam lene ke baad, najane kitni tapasya ke baad ... tum jaisi maa, tum jaisi devi ka beta ban saka
Desh ke liye jaan nyochavar karne waalon se toh maut bhi darti hai
Kuch din pehle hum ek doosre ko jaante tak nahi the ... aur kuch hi dino mein do se ek ho gaye ... aur ab kuch hi dino mein teen
Ghar mein ghusne ke liye ghar ke naukar ko pehle patana chahiye
Sharif aadmi England toh kya kisi bhi land mein chala jaye ... apni motherland ko kabhi nahi bhoolta
Ek sharif aurat zindagi mein ek hi baar pyar karti hai ... yeh kali ek hi baar khilti hai ... ek baar nigahen milti hai ... ek baar mohabbat hoti hai
Naari aur sangeet ka bahut kareeb rishta hai ... dono mein narmi hai, loch hai, lachak hai, dard hai, soz hai, tadap hai, khichav hai, kashish hai
Yeh komal kali, naazon ki pali, misri ki gali ... hamare hi kul mein lagegi bhali
Aaj bajegi shehnai, ghar mein aayegi lugai ... main tere baap ka banoonga jamai
Tu mere samne hai ... teri zulfein hai khuli, tera aanchal hai dhala ... main bhala hosh mein kaise rahoon, kaise rahoon
Tera haath, haath mein aa gaya ... ke chirag raah mein jal gaye

Taleem aur libaas se aadmi ki appearance badli ja sakti hai ... uska character nahi badla ja sakta
Main ek aurat hoon mitti ka dher nahi ... jiski joh chahe shakal bana li, jahan jee chahe rakh diya

Door se main aap nazar aata hoon ... zara paas aa jaon toh baap nazar aata hoon ... aur bhi paas aa jaon toh phir potato chaap nazar aata hoon ... aur agar bilkul paas aa jaon toh phir chup-chap nazar aata hoon
Koi bhi pauda itni jaldi bada nahi hota jitni jaldi ke ladki
Tiranga ek nishaani hai ... Hindustan ke ekta ki, Hindustan ke izzat ki aur Hindustan ke taqat ki
Aandhi aaye ki toofan koi gham nahi ... hai yahi aakhri imtihaan saathiyon
Aye meri sundar aankhon waali mehbooba ... apni lambi kaali zulfein mat bikhra ... kyun ki in mein hazaron kaale naag bandhe hai ... in zulfon ke jaal mein mujhko mat uljha
Wahan ka zarra zarra apni halat par salamat hai ... tumhare ek na hone se wahan lekin qayamat hai

Jab bhi hamari tumhari mulaqat hoti hai ... koi na koi baat zaroor pehda hoti hai

Aye meri jaane-jigar, patthar ka seena cheerkar, sari deewarein todkar, sabko akela chhodkar ... toofano se lad jaonga, tujhko magar le jaonga aur apne ghar jake garam garam chai pilaonga ... aur reh jayenge sab taapte, ek dujhe ka mooh taakte ... band karke raste aur tumhare vaste gajar ka halwa laonga
Punjab, Sind, Gujarat, Maharashtra ... Bangal ho ke Hyderabad ... Hindustan ke hum hai ... Hindustan hamara
Ladki khandan ki ek band mutthi hai ... jab tak yeh mutthi band hai sharafat, sharafat hai ... jis din yeh mutthi khul gayi ... ek shareef ladki aur ek bazaari aurat mein koi farak nahi
Apne liye zinda rehna sirf zindagi hai ... aur doosron ke liye zinda rehna sirf zindagi hi nahi ... balki ibaadat hai, bhakti hai
Zevar utaarkar phir se pehne ja sakte hai ... lekin ghar ki izzat woh zevar hai joh ek baar utar gayi toh phir nahi pehni ja sakti
Sachai se kahin zyada kabhi kabhi masoom sa jhoot dil ko bada baahta hai
Dawa khali shareer ke hadh tak asar karti hai ... magar dua dil ke gehraiyon se hoti hui bhagwan tak pahunch jaati hai
Yeh desh ek ghar aur tamaam sube uski mili-jhuli deewarein ... agar yeh deewarein alag alag ho jaye ... toh chhat, chhat nahi rahegi ... dar, dar nahi rahega ... ghar, ghar nahi rahega
Agar koi jawan potti jawan potte ko maarengi toh ... potta mar jayenga lekin potte ka dil joh hai fadhakta rahenga ... fatafat-fhat fatafat-fhat

Bhagwan jin do aatmaon ko ek bandhan mein band dete hai ... wohi sansar mein janam lekar vivah bandhan mein bandte hai

Zindagi ki khushi duniya ko pa lene mein nahi ... apne aap ko kho dene mein hai
Insaan yaadon ke sahare nahi, umeedon ke sahare jeeta hai ... log mitt jaate hai, zindagi nahi mitati ... woh hamesha aage badti rehti hai, kisi naye sahare ke umeed mein
Wahin hai duniya, wahin hai swarg mera ... jahan tum ho, jahan tum ho, jahan tum ho
Zindagi ki asli khushi doosron ko khush karke haasil ki jaati hai
Jeevan ke sare sapne vishvas ke bal par hi toh sache hote hai
Jis desh ki ladkiyan besharam ho jaati hai ... wahan ke mardon ko sharam aane lagti hai ji

Zindagi mein jis cheez ki tamanna ho usse logon mein baant do ... dhan chahiye dhan do, sukh chahiye sukh do, pyar chahiye pyar do ... sirf do aur dete raho ... kabhi kisi se kuch maango mat bas aankh bandh karke diye jao, diye jao
Aurat ke aanchal mein kutumb ki, desh ki, insaan ki aabroo hoti hai

Is duniya mein jiske haath mein talwar hai ... wohi jee sakta hai

Dil sadda hai Hindustani, camera sadda je Japani ... te photo khichega suhani

Kasam lelo joh mehfil mein tumhe danista dekha ho ... nazar aakhir nazar hai beirrada uth gayi hogi ... tajub kya lagi agar aa gaye Meena ji seene mein ... hazaron dil mein angaray bhare the, dab gayi hogi
Inki sundarta ki tareef karna toh chand ko aaina dikhana hai
Poochte raho aur jagaye rakho mujhe din raat ... hazar saal tak main bookha pyasa rahoonga ... aur phir bhi main yahi kahoonga ki main begunah hoon
Is sansar mein joh dikhta hai, woh nahi hai ... aur joh nahi dikhta hai, samajho avasha hai
Zameen toh maa hoti hai ... aur maa ke tukde nahi kiye jaate
Aap hamare paseene se logon ka khoon chooste hai
Vishvas toh ek aaisa bandhan hai ... joh ek insaan ko doosre insaan ke kareeb lata hai
Shehar mein rehkar, nayi roshni mein palkar ... hamara libaas badal sakta hai ... hamari sabhyata toh nahi
Ration par bhashan bahut hai ... lekin bhashan par ration koi nahi
Logon ke paas tann dhakne ko kapda nahi ... aur inhe tann dhakne ka shaunk nahi
Yeh dharti ek aaisi hatheli hai ... jis par kisaan hal chalakar, insaan ke taqdeer ki lakeerein kheenchta hai
Teri tasveer mein tujhse bhi ek khoob nirali hai ... lipat lo jitna jee chahe, na gussa hai na gaali hai

Sarkari sadak hai yeh tera ghar toh nahi hai ... hum kyun na kare ishq, tera darr toh nahi hai
Nigahein woh ki raahgiron pe jinke vaar hote hai ... yeh achchi sooraton waale musafir maar hote hai

Na jaane log lakhpati crorepati kaise ban jaate hai ... apna toh pati banana mushkil ho raha hai

Bhagwan ne kitni achchi tarah tumko sajakar is duniya mein behja hai ... aankhen jaise jheel mein khile hue do kamal ... dekhti hai toh aakash mein indradhanush khil uthte hai ... sharamati hai toh kaliyon ka sar jhuk jaata hai
Aurat ki izzat uska dharam hota hai

Maine tumhari mohabbat ko ishwar ka vardaan samajhkar seene se lagaye rakha ... aur uske badle mein tumne mujhe kya diya? ... apni bewafai ka yeh zehar ... yeh zehar jisne meri nas-nas mein nafrat aur inteqam ke jwalamukhi bhar diye
Hazaron beh gaye in botalon ke bandh pani mein ... glasson mein joh doobe phir na ubhare zindagani mein

Kahin sher aur nagma bankar, kahin aasoonyon mein dhalkar ... woh mile mujhe toh e-dil, kahin sooratein badalkar
Pyar ki seema sirf issi duniya tak nahi ... pyar toh bhavnaon ka ek aaisa phool hai ... joh ek janam se doosre janam aur phir janam janam tak mahekta rehta hai
Dil ke paas rehne waala jab door chala jaata hai ... tabhi pata chalta hai hum usse kitna pyar karte hai
Aadmi kitna hi bura kyun na ho ... woh kabhi na kabhi zaroor pachtata hai
Naukri milne ke baad kaam rahe na rahe ... lekin naukri dhoondna bahut bada kaam hai
Joh paa lene ko pyar kehta hai ... usse hazaron lakhon janam lene padenge pyar ka matlab samajhne ke liye

Insaan par duniya pehre laga sakti hai ... magar pyar par nahi

Humko toh gardish-e-haalat pe rona aaya ... rone waale tujhe kis baat pe rona aaya?
Fakira jama nadi mein, sabki maange khair ... ho gayi dosti Mahesh se, ab na raha khandan ka bair
Fakira khada dukaan par, maange sabki khair ... na kahu usse dosti, na kahu usse bair
Ajeeb waqt mohabbat mein aaye jaate hai ... woh hum mein aur hum un mein samaye jaate hai
Dane dane par likha hai khane waale ka naam ... woh teri hai aur teri hi rahegi subah shyam
Yeh zindagi ki mehfil, mehfil mein hum akele ... daaman ko koi chume, zulfon se koi khele

Saaya palkon ka na chug jaye tan-e-nazuk mein ... unse kehta hoon joh aankhon mein basa karte hai
Duniya mein bahut si aaisi baatein hoti hai joh namumkin nazar aati hai ... lekin agar insaan himaat se kaam kare aur woh sachcha hai ... toh jeet ussi ki hoti hai
Milap ki teen manzilen hoti hai ... pehli manzil nafrat aur ladai ... doosri manzil dosti aur safai ... teesri manzil pyar aur sagai
Jab koi nadaan ladki pyar ki manzilon se guzar jaati hai ... apni izzat aur abroo kho beheti hai ... toh anjaam zindagi nahi, maut hota hai
Jab tak mehnat karne waale haath aur sapna dekhne waala dimaag ek nahi ho jaate ... ek hi manzil par pahunchne ke liye hum sab mein se koi aage nahi badh sakta
Ek din sabko marna hai ... nahi marta toh do cheez ... life aur death
Aap log kaun hai, kyun hai, kahan se aaye hai, kyun aaye hai, kisse milna hai, kyun milna hai ... agar is waqt nahi aate toh kya bighad jaata?

Kaam uska, naam tera

Main zubaan se lafzon ki tasveer khenchta hoon ... atith toh sab dikhate hai, main kabhi kabhi bhavishya bhi dikhata hoon
In logon ko mujhpe vishwas hai ... aur ab mujhe inke vishwas pe vishwas hone laga hai
Gandi naali se nikla hua pani ... kabhi Gangajal nahi ban sakta
Raat mein soote hue joh sapne aate hai, woh sache nahi hote ... lekin din mein jaagte hue joh sapne dekhe jaate hai, woh hamesha sache hote hai ... kyun ki unka doosra naam hai irrada
Ek achche hospital ke liye sirf pakki imaarat aur chamakte hue furniture ki zaroorat nahi ... zaroorat hai to kaam karne waale haathon ki aur mehsoos karne waale dil ki
Doosre ke ghar ka cheena hua diya ... apne ghar mein kab tak ujala de sakta hai
Duniya abhi tak woh bandook nahi bana saki joh sachai ka khoon kar sake, nekki ko khatam kar sake

Shaadi ke baad ka pyar hi zyada gehra hota hai

Joh insaan ki maut marna nahi jaanta ... yeh duniya usse insaan ki zindagi jeene nahi deti

Watan pe marne waale marte nahi ... amar ho jaate hai
Yeh veer kitne mahaan hai jinhone is desh ki mahaanta ko adarsh ka roop diya ... mahaan hai yeh desh jis mein aaise veeron ne janam liya
Apne desh ke liye ek baar marna ... sau janam ke barabar hota hai
Jinke apne ghar sheeshay ke hoon ... woh doosron par patthar nahi phenka karte
Waqt hi sab kuch hai ... waqt hi banata hai ... aur waqt hi bighadta hai
Kismat hatheli mein nahi ... insaan ke baazuon mein hoti hai
Hum wahan hai jahan se humko bhi kuch hamari khabar nahi aati ... aage aati thi haale dil pe hasi, ab kisi baat par nahi aati
Yeh bachchon ke khelne ki cheez nahi ... haath kat jaye toh khoon nikal aata hai
Main jitni mohabbat karta hoon ... utni nafrat bhi kar sakta hoon
Daulat gareebi ki taraf dosti ka haath toh bada sakti hai ... magar usse gale lagate hue hich-kichati hai
Mohabbat jisse ek baar gale lagale ... usse juda karte hue maut ke haath bhi kaanp jaate hai
Dhobi ki dhulai, darzi ki silai, Roopraja ki padai, us par itni mehangai ... aur sirf do sau ki kamai ... duhai hai duhai
Husn ki shaan mein ho jaye na kuch gustakhi ... tum chale jao, tumhe dekh ke pyar aata hai
Aaj sheeshay mein bar bar unhe dil ki moorat dikhai deti hai ... apni soorat nazar nahi aati, meri soorat dikhai deti hai
Hum mein apna ilaaj-e-dard-e-dil karna bhi aata hai ... hum aaise jeene waale hai jinhe marna bhi aata hai
Ab tak na khabar thi mujhe ujhade hue ghar ki ... aap aaye toh ghar be-sar-o-saman nazar aaya

Phoola chaman khushi ka jaane bahar aaya ... aankhon ka noor aaya, dil ka qaraar aaya ... dekhe joh khwab dil ne, tabeer hai yeh unki ... humko bhi zindagi ka ab aetbaar aaya ... joh phool-e-ilahi, hasta rahe hamesha ... joh bagh-e-zindagi mein bankar bahar aaya
Humne gareebi mein sapne dekhe hai ... yeh sapno mein bhi gareebi nahi dekh sakegi
Yeh mere do haath jab bhi uthenge pattharon ko tarashne ... yeh goonj har baar milan ka geet bankar sunai degi ... tumhe vishvas dilane ki tum mere paas ho, mere dil mein
Do akele mil gaye toh ek sansar ban jayega
Meri haseen mehfil mein, ishq patthar hai aur kuch bhi nahi ... apne nagamo se zindagi de isse, ya mitta apni zindagi bhi yaheen

Charon taraf dekhte hai toh har baat mein khot aur milavat ... nal ka pani pejiye toh us mein dawai ki milavat hai, saans lijiye toh hawa mein millon ke dhuan ki milavat hai, agar khana khaiye toh roti ke aate mein mitti ki milavat hai ... charon taraf har baat mein jhoot hai ... dua mein, salaam mein, pyar mein, nafrat mein, gusse mein ... sab mein jhoot hai
Aye haseen aasman ki malika, mera dildar mujhko lauta de ... tujhko apni nazakaton ki kasam, tu mera pyar mujhko lauta de
Doobti hui kashti mein bhaagne waale kabhi sahil ka mooh tak nahi dekhte
Jeet inki nahi hogi, jeet janta ki hogi ... jeet is jhoot ki nahi hogi, jeet sachai ki hogi ... jeet in khooniyon ki nahi hogi, jeet hum begunahon ke khoon ki hogi
Zindagi ka kya bharosa hai ... kaun jaanta hai kab maut kis darwaze se dhakil hoti hai ... kab in chalti hui saanson ka silsila toot jaata hai
Dukh tumne mujhe nahi diya hai ... maine apne aap ko dukh diya hai
Aaj itni derr ho gayi ... kabhi darwaze ko dekhte the kabhi waqt ko ... na tum aate the na waqt jata tha
Sab kuch khuda se mang liya tujhko mangkar ... uthte nahi hai haath mere is dua ke baad
Hum toh dil ke saudagar hai ... dil khareedte hai ... dil bechte hai
Sangam toh woh hai jahan dil, dil se milta hai ... atma, atma se milke paramatma ho jati hai
Roye toh yaar ke kandhe par ... jaaye toh yaar ke kandhe par
Aaj tak mujh mein sach kehne ki shakti nahi thi ... aur aaj tum mein sach sunne ki shakti nahi hai
Sookha jungle, geela parbat, jadugar ki kasam ... ek kadam bhi aage aaya, ho jayega bhasam
Moti chachi, lamba chacha jab aayenge home ... patthar jaisa dil dono ka ban jayega maum
Aatma woh vastu hai ... jise na talwar kaat sakti hai na aag jala sakti hai
Pati patni ghar banate hai ... bache us hi ghar ko swarg bana dete hai
Zindagi bhagwan ki di hui daulat hai ... usse apne hi haathon gavana insaan ki kamzori ke saath saath jurm hai
Kele ka chilka pair ke neeche joh aa gaya ... jalwe bhi unke saath saath par phisal gaya
Dono jahaan teri mohabbat mein haarke ... woh chal diya bechara baithakke maar maarke
Rishtey naate ke liye khazana nahi ... gharana dekha jaata hai
Kaam ki na kaaj ki ... dushman meri jaan ki
In cheezon se bhar chuka hai pet-e-natamam ... ab toh kuch aur hi khane ko jee chahta hai
Mujhko kyun dete ho zehar-e-zindagi ... mujhko marke nagahani chahiye ... dil abhi poori tarah toota nahi ... doston ki meharbani chahiye

Insaan ki izzat jab jaati hai jab woh sachai aur imaan ka daaman chhod deta hai ... insaan ki izzat jab jaati hai jab woh apne zameer ko bech deta hai, insaaniyat ko bech deta hai, sharafat ko bech deta hai ... eent aur patthar ke bane huye makaano ke bikne se insaan ki izzat nahi jaati
Mujhe gham khilao, mujhe aasoon pilao ... taaki mere johar par nikhaar aaye ... naqad nahi toh udhaar aaye
Joh main khana chahta hoon woh bazar mein milega nahi katan ... agar mangva sakte ho, do char mann gham mangvao foran
Zindagi se joh kasmasaya ho ... jisko marna hi raas aaya ho ... woh but-e-bewafa se pyar kare jisko kutte ne kaat khaya ho
Nazar ke milte hi hosh-o-awaaz kho behte ... yeh ibtida hai toh kya hogi intehaa meri
Husn kehte hai unhe, noor ka shola woh hai ... joh kabhi door se chamka tha, woh jalwa woh hai
Har daffa khaya hai milkar thappad tujhse ... mere mehboob kahin aur mila kar mujhse
Jabse thappad maine khaya, ek aafat ho gayi ... aye but-e-kafir mujhe tujhse mohabbat ho gayi
Zindagi ke safar mein ek aaisa muqaam bhi aata hai ... jab insaan kuch kho ke bahut kuch paata hai
Ranjhe ka dil pehlu se satka, Heer ki zulfon mein jaa atka ... lekar soti hum joh satke, maa ko teri behad khatke
Khuda bachaye teri mast mast aankhon se ... farishta ho toh bahek jaaye, aadmi kya hai
Sitaare doobte jaate hai hookah pee raha hoon main ... har ek dum par chillum ki aag madham hoti jaati hai
Himmat-e-marda toh madad-e-khuda ... aur inko de mila, na kar juda
Hirani jaisi chaal, khile phool jaise gaal, uspar sitam yeh ki sunhare baal ... arre phir kyun na ho bura haal ... malik vaake hi tune kiya kamaal
Meri zindagi ka maqsad, mera dharam, imaan sirf ek cheez hai ... rupaiya
Duniya mein insaan ki kadar daulat se nahi, uski khubiyon se hoti hai
Main tumhe itni aasani se nahi marne doonga ... main tumhare khoon ke ek ek katre se ... police ke har us zulm ka badla loonga joh mujhpar hua hai
Kuch adayein ho, kuch tevar ho, kuch jalwe ho, kuch toofan ho ... jis mein tum ho aur hum ho, hum ho aur tum ho
Ishq, mushq, khassi aur khushi ... chupane pe bhi nahi chup sakte
Kyun aag lagati phirti ho, jab garam hawa se darti ho ... dil pehle jalakar khaak kiya, ab thandi saansein bharti ho
Baat nazaron ki hai, baat kuch bhi nahi ... jisko dil chahe duniya mein hai woh haseen
Insaan duniya ki har cheez bhool sakta hai ... magar apni biwi ko nahi bhool sakta, apne ghar ko nahi bhool sakta ... un cheezon ko kabhi nahi bhool sakta jinpar uski zindagi ka daromadar hai
Mohabbat ki raah par chalne waalo ki taqdeer mein pyar ki hariyali nahi ... kaanto bhara raasta hota hai
Joh marr jaate hai woh sitare ban jaate hai ... taaki unke bachche unko roz dekh sake
Lipat jaate hai woh bijli ki darr se ... ilahi yeh ghata do din toh barse
Mazhab aur karobar do alag alag cheezein hai ... inko mix karne waala hamesha bhookha marta hai
Saawan ki raaton mein aaisa bhi hota hai ... raahi koi bhoola hua, toofano mein khoya hua, raah pe aa jaata hai ... aaisa bhi hota hai
Aankhon ke andhere se main nahi ghabrata ... mann ke andhere se darr lag raha hai

Haqeeqat mein hum sab andar se skeleton yane panjar hi toh hai ... farak sirf itna hai ki kisi panjar par makhan si chikni aur mulayam coating hai ... aur kisi panjar par gendhe jaisi moti khaal chadi hui hai
Nazuki tere lab ki kya kahiye ... pankhadi ek gulaab ki si hai
Hamare mulk mein ladke umar se pehle hi jawaan ho jaate hai ... aur ladkiyan pehda hone se pehle
Khoobsurati kapde ko char chaand laga deti hai ... toh kapda bhi ussi khoobsurati ko aasman pe uchaal deta hai
Moochein toh mard ki zevar hoti hai
Zindagi hazaron karvatein badalti hai ... aur ek din aapki zindagi ek aaisi karvat badlegi ... jiski lapet mein aakar aap apna tamaam business bhool jayenge
Daulat ka nasha bhang se zyada tezz hota hai
Gareeb ameer ka farak sirf haisiyat se hi nahi ... dil se bhi hota hai
Zulm ka badla lene ka mauka zindagi mein ek baar har insaan ko milta hai
Bachpan mein tu jab rota tha tab log samajhte the ki tu sur mein gaa raha hai ... aur ab main jab gaata hoon toh log samajhte hai ki main ro raha hoon
Ladke ko akal se aur ladki ko shakal se pehchana jaata hai
Patta patta, boota boota haal hamara jaane hai ... jaane na jaane koi na jaane, haal toh saare jaane hai
Maqsad-e-ishq ka dekha hai nirala dastoor ... ki hum fail huye, jab humne sabak yaad kiya
Sache premi ka usool badla lena nahi ... qurbani karna hota hai
Jab pyar kisise hota hai toh dil ki uljhane aur bhi badh jaati hai
Mohabbat mein kabhi aisi bhi halat paayi jaati hai ... tabiyat aur ghabrati hai jab behlayi jaati hai
Is duniya mein na koi pooch ke aaya hai ... aur na koi pooch ke jayega
Insaan gir sakta hai, usool jhuk sakta hai, aur khandan tabah ho sakte hai ... lekin mohabbat karne waale dil na jhuke hai ... aur na kabhi jhuk sakte hai
Makkhiyon ki aadat hi aisi hoti hai ... jitni baar udao, phir aa jaati hai
Zinda rehne ke liye sirf teen cheezein zaroori hai ... hansi, khushi aur phool
Mohabbat sirf ek se hoti hai
Bachche hasne se aam bachchon ki tarah chichore ... aur rone se buzdil ban jaate hai
Hasne waalo ko kabhi kabhi rona bhi padta hai
Aadmi jab tak zindagi mein kuch ho na jaye ... uske apne bhi paraye ho jaate hai
In haathon ki mehnat se joh pasine ki boond dharti pe girti hai ... woh moti bankar laut aati hai
Chota kaam kare toh mochi aur bada kare toh Bata ... chota kaam kare toh julaha aur bada kare toh khambata
Peet ka bhai kaam nahi aata ... pet ka bachcha kaam nahi aata ... aakhir pallu ka paisa hi kaam aata hai
Bholi bhali shakal waale hote hai jallad se ... bewafaaon se pyar kaun kare, husn ka aitbaar kaun kare

Kahan hai woh ladki jiske daaman mein mooh chupakar insaan sari duniya ko bhool sake ... kahan hai woh ladki jise dekhkar mann bol uthe, is paar yeh madhu hai, tum ho, us paar na jaane kya hoga ... kahan hai woh ladki jise dekhte hi yeh mehsoos ho, ki jise main janam janam se dhoond raha hoon woh yahi hai ... kahan hai woh ladki jiske baare mein Tagore ne kaha tha, teri neeli aankhen ek gehri jheel ki tarah hai, jee chahta hai main un mein doob doob jaon ... kahan hai woh ladki joh mere saath sagar ki machalti lehron mein kood padegi, kahan hai woh ladki joh mere saath jayegi
Deewana banana hai toh deewana bana de ... varna kahin taqdeer tamasha na bana de
Insaan toh paon se chalta hai ... lekin unhe chalane waala hota hai dil
Main bolonga toh bologi ki bolta hai
Pyar ek jazbe ka naam hai joh insaan ke mann mein hota hai
Woh sab kuch joh mujhe nahi kehna chahiye tha main tumse hamesha kehta raha ... ab jab kuch kehna chahta hoon toh kuch keh nahi pa raha hoon
Duniya ek dhol zaroor hai lekin awaaz bajane waale ke haath mein hai ... jaisa haath vaisi awaaz
Har maa ke dil ke kisi kone mein ek bahu chupi hoti hai ... joh ek din haathon mein kadhe, paon mein chhade ... cham-cham karti chali aati hai
Pyar duniya ki sabse khoobsurat sachai hai
Aadmi jab sant banta hai toh jaat paat, oonch neech, Hindu Muslim, desh videsh, rang nasal ke tamaam bedh bhav bhool jaata hai
Duniya kitni choti hai ... lekin do aadmiyon ke beech ka faasle kitne lambe ho sakte hai ... kitne bhayanak aur kitne kaale
Kahi bar marna aasaan malum hota hai aur jeena mushkil
Hawa hi aaisi chali hai ki jee bahal nahi ... varna hum toh bahut kam udaas rehte hai
Hai dekhkar aaina hairat ho gayi ... meri soorat unki soorat ho gayi
Jisse marna nahi aaya ... usse jeena nahi aaya

column2: Jis Desh Mein Ganga Behti Hai
column3: Hum uss desh ke vasi hai ... jis desh mein Ganga behti hai

column2: Jis Desh Mein Ganga Behti Hai
column3: Hum woh hai joh amir ko thoda sa gareeb aur gareeb ko thoda sa amir karte hai ... hum duniya barabar karte hai

Taqdeerein badal jaati hai, zamana badal jaata hai, mulkon ki tarikh badal jaati hai, Shahenshah badal jaate hai ... magar is badalti hui duniya mein mohabbat jis insaan ka daaman thaam leti hai ... woh insaan nahi badalta
Mohabbat joh darti ho woh mohabbat nahin ... ayyashi hai, gunaah hai
Mohabbat humne maana zindagi barbad kar deti hai ... yeh kya kam hai ki marr jaane pe duniya yaad karti hai
Phool toh murjha jaate hain ... lekin kaante daaman thaam lete hain
Salim tujhe marne nahi dega ... aur hum Anarkali tujhe jeene nahi denge
Duniya mein dilwale ka saath dena ... daulat waale ka nahi
Main tumhari aankhon mein apni mohabbat ka ikraar dekhna chahta hoon
Mera dil bhi apka koi Hindustan nahi ... jispar aap hukumat kare
Kaaton ko murjhane ka khauf nahin hota
Mera jism zaroor zakhmi hai ... lekin meri himmat zakhmi nahi
Hamara Hindustan koi tumhara dil nahi ... ki laundi jiski Malika bane
Tahkhane ke bhaari darwaaze talwaron se nahi taqdeeron se khula karte hai
Meri aankhon se mere khwab na cheeniye Shehzaade ... main marr jaongi
Taj un saron par nahin rehta jinke kareeb khauf aa jaye
Mohabbat karne waalo ka bas itna hi hai afsana ... tadapna chupke chupke, aah bharna, ghutke marr jana
Rajput jaan harta hai ... vachan nahi harta
Aaj ka kaam kal karo, kal ka kaam parso ... itni jaldi kya hai, jab jeena hai barso
Tum chokri log ka yahi toh musibat hai ... haar shringaar mein aadhi zindagi apni aur intezar mein aadhi zindagi doosre ka barbaad kar deta hai
Achcha dost aur achcha pati ... kismat waalon ko hi milta hai
Marzi ho toh sooli par chadana ya rab ... sau baar jahannam mein jalana ya rab ... lekin mashooq kahen aap hamare hai buzurg ... na cheez ko yeh din na dikhana ya rab
Jis insaan ko maa ki mamta naseeb nahi hui ... us jaisa koi badnaseeb nahi

Yahi hai zindagi apni, yahi hai bandagi apni ... ki unka naam aaya aur gardan jhuk gayi apni ... na bhut khane ko jaate hai, na kaabe mein bhatakte hai ... jahan tum paon rakhte ho, vahan hum sar patakte hai ... hum ishq ke maaron ka itna hi fasana hai ... rone ko nahi koi, hasne ko zamana hai
Tum aa rahi ho zamane ki aankh se bachkar ... nazar jhukaye hue aur badan churaye hue ... khud apne kadamon ki aahat se jhebti, darti ... khud apne saaye ki jumbish se khauf khaye hue
Achcha dost aur achchi patni ... kismat waalon ko hi milti hai
Jinka intezar hota hai woh kahan milte hai ... aur jinko khawab mein bhi na socha ho woh baar baar milte hai
Sangeet cheez hi aaisi hai ... joh us mein kho nahi jaata woh usse paa bhi nahi sakta
Akhiyan bhool gayi hai sona ... dil par hua hai jadoo tona
Ulte seedhe daanv lagaye ... hans hans phenka paasa ... arre bhagya ki chaal bhi dekh deewane ... kaisa tujhko phaansa
Insaan har cheez se door bhaag sakta hai ... lekin apni kismat se nahi
Film line ki yahi reet hai ... naam aur shohrat milte bhale hi der lag jaaye ... naam aur nishaan mitate der nahi lagti
Filmy duniya mein insaan ek baar gira ... toh girta hi jaata hai
Joh insaan kamzori ka shikaar hoke gir jaye ... woh insaan, insaan nahi rehta
Khoob parda hai ke chilman se lage baithe hai ... saaf chupte bhi nahi, samne aate bhi nahi
Jis dhan ke liye aap duniya se dokha kar rahe hai, apne azeezon se, apne doston se dokha kar rahe hai, apne saathiyon se dokha kar rahe hai ... ussi dhan ke haathon aap khud bhi dokha khayenge
Insaan patthar ki chot seh sakta hai ... lekin yeh buri nazar ke vaar se bachna bahut mushkil hai

Rupaiya kya hai? ... mitti ki tarah ek bejaan aur bekaar cheez hai ... lekin jis tarah mitti mein mehnat ka beejh ugaye bagair paidawar nahi ho sakti  ... ussi tarah rupaiya ke saath jab tak mehnat ka mel nahi hoga ... duniya mein kabhi koi tarakki nahi kar sakega
Insaan apne maa baap ke naam se nahi ... apne ghuno se achcha ya bura samjha jaata hai
Agar woh bechara ek din kaam par nahi jaata ... toh us bechare ke ghar mein chula nahi jalta ... aur jis din chula nahi jalta ... uska pet jalta hai, uski aatma jalti hai
Mohabbat kisi ke kehne se nahi ki jaati aur na kisi ke hukum se todi ja sakti hai
Agar aaj hum sab aapas mein milkar aur apne kaam ko apna dharam samajhkar kare ... toh kal hamara desh bhi duniya ke sare mulkon ke aage apna sar ooncha karke khada ho sakega
Pet ki awaaz ke samne aatma aur parmatma dono ki awaaz gayab ho jaati hai

Hum toh sirf yeh chahte hai sethji ... ki hamara aur aapka amir ya garib ka rishta na rahe ... malik ya mazdoor ka rishta na rahe ... balki hum dono ke darmiyan ek insaan aur insaan ka rishta kayam ho
Kisi insaan ka yun khatam hona achcha nahi ... khatam toh honi chahiye uski burai, uska chotapan, uski khudgarzi
Insaan ki zindagi tarazu ka ek palhada hai ... joh kabhi upar aur kabhi neeche
Mehnat se din raat padhoonga ... pehla number pass karoonga
Baimaani ke chocolate se imaandari ki chane hazar gunah zyada achche hai
Jab main dushmani pe utar aata hoon ... toh insaan ko pataal mein bhi chain naseeb nahi hota
Aatma gandi hone se aadmi ke chehre par bhi laanat baratne lagti hai
Insaan burai chahe khud kare ya kisi ke kehne par kare ... magar burai, burai hi rehti hai
Toofano se nahi daroonga ... himmat se main nikal padhoonga
Hindustan ki shaan banoonga ... desh ka ooncha naam karoonga
Main tum bin adhoora, jaise namak bin daal ... daal bin bhat, bhat bin Bengal
Kab tak bolo chupi rahogi oh meri Asha ... maine padh li aaj tumhare naino ki basha

Tumhare hi liye paida hue duniya ke nazare ... chamakte hai tumhari roshni se chand aur taare ... tumhara gham hai gham, auron ka gham khawab-o-kahani hai ... tumhara khoon hai khoon, hamara khoon pani hai
Na ched ab mujhko, rehne de yahin tak dastan meri ... kahunga sach toh jal jayega dil tera, zabaan meri
Roman kanoon faulad ki tarah sakht aur waqt ki tarah atal hai
Aye khuda tu jis haal mein rakhega khush rahenge ... teri khushi mein khush tera khidmat guzar hai ... banda hoon tera tu mera parvardigar hai
Nikal chalne ki yeh hasrat badi mushkil se nikalegi ... kaleja cheer degi baddua joh dil se nikalegi
Tareef us khuda ki jisne jahan banaya ... unko haseen banakar mujhko jawan banaya
Doob maro is insaaf par, aasun bahao is kanoon par ... joh kamzoron ke liye talwar ki dhaar, aur zabardast ke liye bank-e-bahar hai ... joh apne liye nagme-e-saaz, aur hamare liye maut ki awaaz hai
Hamari adalat ka hukum maana nahi ... manvaya jaata hai
Jise paala tha khoon-e-dil se zaar aur nathavan hokar ... khabar kya thi wohi degi daga ek din jawan hokar
Aurat zindagi mein ek hi baar, ek hi mard ko apna kehti hai
Ghar ki shobha toh ghar mein rehne waalon se hoti hai
Bhagwan ne tumhe overtime karke banaya hai
Mujhe yeh aalishan makaan nahi, ghar chahiye ... mujhe daulat aur shohrat nahi, sukh chahiye ... mujhe logon ki tareef nahi, tumhari mohabbat chahiye
Aasoon ki buniyad par khushi ka mahal khada nahi ho sakta
Main beta de sakti hoon, laaj nahi de sakti
Tumhari chhaya mein main kadi se kadi dhoop sehan kar loongi
Raasta dikhana sehel hai, par raaste par chalna bahut kathin
Bina murga bane vidhya nahi aati
Jab pet ki roti aur jeb ka paisa chin jaata hai na ... toh koi samajh wamajh nahi reh jaati hai aadmi ke paas
Jiske dil mein daga aa jaati hai na ... uski aankhon mein daya kabhi nahi aati
Aaj ki duniya mein machine ne tarakki nahi ki hai, aadmi ne tarakki ki hai ... aaj tak aadmi machine banate aaye hai ... machine ne kabhi kisi aadmi ko nahi banaya hai
Jab amir ka dil kharab hota hai na ... toh gareeb ka dimaag kharab hota hai
Jab hum chale toh saaya bhi apna na saath de ... jab tum chalo zameen chale, aasmaan chale ... jab hum ruke toh saath ruke shaam-e-bekasi ... jab tum ruko bahaar ruke, chandni ruke

Tang aa chuke hai kashmakash-e-zindagi se hum ... thukra dein jahaan ko kahin bedili se hum ... hum ghamzada hai laaye kahan se khushi ke geet ... denge wohi joh paayenge is zindagi se hum ... ubhrenge ek baar abhi dil ke valvale ... maana ke dab gaye hai gham-e-zindagi se hum ... lo aaj humne todh diya rishta-e-umeed ... lo ab kabhi gilaa na karenge kisi se hum
Zindagi ki asli khushi doosron ko khush rakhke haasil ki jaati hai
Gham is kadar badhe ke main ghabra ke pee gaya ... is dil ki bebasi pe taras khake pee gaya ... thukra raha tha mujhko badhi der se jahaan ... main aaj sab jahaan ko thukra ke pee gaya

Mujhe kisi insaan se koi shikayat nahi hai ... mujhe shikayat hai samaaj ke us dhanche se joh insaan se uski insaaniyat cheen leta hai ... matlab ke liye apne bhai ko beghana banata hai ... dost ko dushman banata hai ... mujhe shikayat hai us tehzeeb se, us sanskriti se jahan murdon ko puja jaata hai ... aur zinda insaan ko pairon tale raunda jaata hai ... jahan kisi ke dukh dard pe do aansoon bahana buzdili samjha jaata hai ... chupke milna ek kamzori samjha jaata hai ... aaise maahaul mein mujhe kabhi shanti nahi milegi, kabhi shanti nahi milegi
Garmi chahe mausam ki ho ya daulat ki ... sirf gadhe hi magan rehte hai us mein
Zindagi ke do hisse hote hai ... ek sawal doosra jawab
Mera daata mujhpar meherban hai ... mere mooh mein chandi ki zabaan hai ... mere haath mein sone ki kamaan hai ... joh bhi mere aage aayega ... muft mein joote khake jayega
Kabhi tera dar, kabhi darbadar, kabhi arsh par, kabhi farsh par ... arre gham-e-aashiqui tera shukriya, main kahan kahan se guzar gaya
Aankh jhukakar baithne waale, aankh uthakar dekh zara ... hum bhi hai tere chahne waale, teer chalakar dekh zara
Jisne tan diya usne dhan nahi diya
Insaan mar sakta hai ... karza nahi mar sakta
Kangi ko narangi kahein ... bane dhoodh ko khoya ... chalti ko gaadi kahein ... dekh Kabira roya
Vishvas, dharam, sanskar ke mamle hi badhe nazuk hote hai ... insaan ki bhavnaon se khelna koi mazaak nahi hai
Duniya ki har jagah mohabbat ki nigahon mein pyari hoti hai
Bekaar aadmi phatte huye tube ki tarah hota hai ... lekin mushkil toh yeh hai ki tube ka puncture phir bhi judh sakta hai ... lekin bekaari ka puncture nahi judhta
Uda de neend aankhon ki kahani usko kehte hai ... jalakar khaak kar dale jawani usse kehte hai
Zindagi ki raahon mein thokarein wohi khate hai ... joh oonche hokar chalte hai

Aye jawaano zindagi resham bhi hai talwar bhi ... muskurata phool bhi hai aur khatakta haar bhi ... chaand suraj ki tarah yeh garam bhi hai sard bhi ... apni aankhon ka hai aasoon doosro ka dard bhi ... raaste mein aman ki mashaal jalane ke liye ... hum toh jeete hai watan ke kaam aane ke liye
Duniya mein tumhe sab kuch mil jayega ... lekin mohabbat bhara dil nahi milega
Aulad ki taqdeer maa ke aasoonyon se hi chamakti hai
Zindagi milti hai kaanton se guzarne ke liye ... phool khilte hai gulistan ke savarne ke liye
Tere golden face ki beauty ne mere gentle heart ko loot liya ... teri zulfon ke net mein faskar maine night sleeping chhod diya
Kismat aadmi ko dokha de sakti hai ... lekin bhagwan aadmi ko dokha nahi deta
Tarakki karne waala ek hota hai aur uske dushman hazaar hote hai
Mohabbat ki ek manzil nahi hoti
Prithvi ka dil hai aur sanjogta ka pyar hai ... bas yahi tareekh hai, baki toh sab bekaar hai
Mere piya ka laal kabootar parbat parbat udta hai ... pooch lo usse sara naksha saanj bhay woh udta hai
Kambakht dil nahi badalta ... magar dil ke tukde badal jaate hai
Zindagi ki har ghadi aakhri ghadi hoti hai ... aur har saans aakhri saans hota hai
Har khel mein ek ki jeet aur doosre ki haar hoti hai
Ek peshawar mujrim jab yeh kehta hai ki usse sharafat ki talash hai ... toh usse badkar koi zaleel nahi hota hai
Joota khane ke baad garam chai penicillin ka kaam deti hai
Yahan ka har sauda raat ke andhere mein hota hai
Duniya bahut bada hai ghera ... kahin na kahin toh hoga mera
Kaun kambakht hai joh bardaasht karne ke liye peeta hai ... main toh peeta hoon ki bas saans le sakun
Tum ruki kya dil hamara ruk gaya ... gham ke maare aasman bhi jhuk gaya
Maine zindagi mein prem ka karobar bahut dino tak kiya hai ... lekin prem sirf ek baar
